name: Resurfacing BHA Mask for Brightening and Dark Spots
about: What it is:A mask that banishes dullness and refines the look of pores to reveal healthy-looking skin..Skin Type:Dry and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Pores.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of toxins, fillers, artificials, synthetics, and GMOs. This product is vegan, cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This natural BHA and enzyme-powered mask restores glow and refines the look of pores for smoother, healthier-looking radiant skin.
ingredients: -Natural BHA from White Willow Bark Extract: Provides chemical exfoliation that cleans, clears, and minimizes the look of pores..-Pomegranate Enzymes: Sloughs off dead skin cells and smooths uneven skin texture..-Pink Clay: Gently absorbs oil and buildup to refines pores. .. Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Water, Lactobacillus Ferment, Maltooligosyl Glucoside, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Beta Vulgaris/Beet Root Extract/Extrait de Racine de Betterave, Kaolin (White Clay), Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Aroma**, CI77491 (Red Iron Oxide), Sodium Phytate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool. *Ingredients from organic farming. **Clinical grade essential oils blend. .......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use up to three times a week..-Leave on for 20 minutes, then rinse with warm water. .-Apply a thick layer over face and neck... Precautions:.-Avoid direct contact with eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Snatched in a bottle! This is amazing! Love this product and I will never be without. Thank you for your service Tata Harper!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty professional who prioritizes glowing, healthy skin, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a must have in any skincare routine. This 100% natural mask delivers an instant boost of radiance, making it ideal for anyone looking to improve dullness, uneven skin tone, or texture. Itu2019s especially beneficial for those preparing for a special event or needing a quick pick me up for tired skin. Suitable for most skin types (yes, including sensitive) this mask is gentle yet effective, thanks to its unique combination of BHA and enzyme technology. This is why itu2019s a staple for every single one of the makeup clients who sits in my chair.   This mask includes willow bark and pomegranate enzymes. This combo provides a gentle exfoliation that reveals smoother, brighter skin without irritation. I really love how it reduces the appearance of pores and gives a refined, glass like finish in just 20 minutes. Itu2019s a favorite among my clients who want a spa quality finish. It works wonders for oily or congested skin types by clearing excess sebum and impurities, leaving the skin feeling clean and refreshed.  This mask offers a versatile and luxurious experience. It can be used as a full face mask or as a spot treatment for stubborn areas needing extra attention. For those new to clean beauty, itu2019s a great introduction to high performance, non-toxic skincare. Whether youu2019re preparing for a photoshoot, a night out, or simply indulging in self-care, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a skincare gem worth adding to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Resurfacing Mask is like getting a mini facial at home. Itu2019s made with natural BHAs from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes that gently exfoliate your skin, leaving it smoother and more radiant. The jelly-like texture goes on easily, and after 15-20 minutes, my skin looks noticeably brighter and refreshed. You can use this few times a week but Itu2019s perfect when you need an instant glow like before a big event or when your skin just feels dull. I love that it works so well without any harsh chemicals. Itu2019s definitely a splurge, but totally worth it for a weekly glow boost!

reviews.review_title: Great mask for an amazing glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This resurfacing mask is something I have never tried before. It this lightweight gel mask that moisturizer your skin so nicely but makes you feel like you donu2019t have any mask on your face. I have to put the timer to remind myself to remove it but I wish I could keep it overnight. It smells amazing, super luxurious feeling. It is not sticky at all and not heavy whatsoever. I wish I could use when I prep my skin for my make up because I feel it leaves my skin extremely moisturized from within. The container is small but you only need a little bit. In the beginning I use a lot because couldnu2019t feel it on my skin. I definitely recommend it to be used a couple of times per week. Your skin will feel more glowy and nurture. Your make up will look flawless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a glow-boosting gem that has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. Itu2019s everything youu2019d expect from Tata Harperu2014luxurious, effective, and packed with clean, natural ingredients. This mask is like a spa treatment in a jar. After just 15u201320 minutes, my skin looks visibly brighter, smoother, and more refreshed. After using for a few weeks, my skin is way less red! It's my go-to before special events or anytime I want an extra boost of radiance. The combination of enzymes and BHA resurfaces the skin without irritation. My pores look smaller, and my skin feels softer and more even after each use.  The gel-like texture spreads easily, so you only need a thin layer. Despite the higher price point, the jar lasts a long time, making it a worthwhile investment. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a luxurious addition to any skincare routine, delivering professional-quality results from the comfort of home. Whether youu2019re dealing with dullness, uneven texture, or just want a radiant boost, this mask works wonders. Itu2019s worth every penny for the healthy, glowing skin it delivers. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my thirties and have combination skin that means oily. I look for products that may moisturize and at the same time help my oily T zone. This small but mighty face mask by Tata Harper is very effective at accomplishing both things. The mask has a gellish texture and a little goes a long way. I applied it with my fingers all over my face and my neck. As time went by, the mask started to dry into a shiny and tight veil. I waited twenty minutes for it to fully dry. I was amazed at how clear and soft my skin felt and looked after rinsing it out with warm water. I used it once or twice a week with great alike results. I think it makes a great addition to a routine for a home spa experience. I have seen my skin less congested and even made some scarring heal quicker. My only con is the price for the size of the jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mask the past two weeks, I have really noticed an increase in the plumpness and evenness of my skin. My dark spots have definitely faded and in effect, my whole face looks so much more glowy. Especially in the morning, I feel my skin is usually dull and any dark spots are very noticeable. 20 minutes of this mask every few days has made such a difference! The only reason Iu2019m giving this 4 instead of 5 stars is because I did notice some mild irritation on my neck, however that is normal for me this time of year, as my dry skin gets exacerbated by the cold and dry weather and in turn becomes very sensitive. The smell of the mask is incredible and the gelatinous texture felt so cooling and relaxing! It truly felt like a facial in a jar and I will be recommending this to all of my friends. It feels very powerful if that makes senseu2026 I actually feel like itu2019s doing its job while itu2019s sitting on my skin which I love.

reviews.review_title: Another member of the dream team
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask once a week for two weeks as part of a broader Tata Harper nighttime routine. Already I am noticing a positive improvement in my skinu2019s texture and pigmentation.  You can see the diffusion of the hyperpigmentation at the top of my forehead in the before and after pics and my flaky cheeks are almost 100% smooth!  The Resurfacing Mask can be used up to 3 times per week, which speaks to the gentle, skin-friendly nature of the product. The texture in the jar is bouncy, kind of like gelatin, but it spreads easily and melts right onto the skin during application. The mask dries evenly and gradually creates a feeling of tightening/toning. The scent is earthy with a cooling note and rinses cleanly with warm water.   I love that this mask uses natural and certified organic ingredients, the oil and minerals and sustainably and ethically sourced, and even the packaging is planet friendly.  Tata Harper has really created a skincare dream team with their lineup of products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this mask was a moisturizer sometimes. Wow, it's very hydrating and smells so good without overwhelming my senses. I have to set a timer to rinse it off since I kept forgetting. This mask is so different compared to many I've used before. To me, it's more like a gel moisturizer, very light, hydrating & soaking into my skin, and I feel like I have nothing on my face. My skin feels so nice after rinsing, it's cool to touch & feel plumped. Can't help but keep touching my face. My skin tone looks better and brighter. I love the cute green jar and the short ingredient list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has really been in need of some TLC lately! From lack of sleep to these dry and harsh Ohio winters, my skin has been taking a beating and it shows. Enter the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask! This stuff is literally a spa in a jar! Iu2019ve always heard amazing things about this brand and now I know why. After just one use, my pores were deeply cleansed of all their gunk and appeared smaller and my skin was smooth and glowing. Itu2019s like having a mini facial at home. I slather on a layer and enjoy some tv for 20 minutes and after I rinse it off I have brand new glowing skin! As someone with a full time job who is always on the go, I appreciate that I can completely revamp my skin in only 20 minutes. While this gives great results, itu2019s still gentle on the skin unlike other masks that make similar claims. While this is on the pricey side, itu2019s a great investment for your skin and I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask for Brightening and Dark Spots and have used this so much to reduce my acne scars. As someone who suffers from hormonal acne, I tend to break out a lot by my chin, resulting in acne scarring afterwards. I implemented this Tata Harper resurfacing mask and the BHA truly was a chemical exfoliant that cleared my pores and cleared my skin. I have dry skin, especially in the winter months so I'm fairly cautious as to what I use for my acne treatments but I did not have any irritation after using this product. The mask has a thick clay like texture which is great to absorb all the excess oils on your skin. I enjoy using this at night once a week as I have the most buildup on my face at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this mask as soon as I applied it to my skin I felt an instant cooling and refreshing sensation. I love to store my mask in my mini fridge to enhance feeling. the texture of the mask is jelly like and bouncy, it was very easy to apply and it wasn't messy at all. After rinsing the product off my face look like I drink a gallon of water everyday! My skin was so glowy and hydrated even without moisturizer. The only downside to the product is that it doesn't come in a bigger size lol. I use it at least twice a week but you really don't need much to cover your whole face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. This mask left my skin so hydrated and glowy it was crazy. I love that I feel like Iu2019m at a salon when using this product because the product smells and works so well. The mask starts off like a jelly texture when applied then dries down and slightly tightens on the skin. Once time to remove itu2019s come off super easy just warm water and I really enjoy how user friendly it is makes me really want to use the mask and do my skincare. This is awesome! Products sent to me for review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great skincare mask can change your life. Tata Harper has created a great Resurfacing Mask. This mask changes the whole texture of your facial skin.   I used this mask after cleansing my face. Itu2019s really easy to apply and rinses clean. It has a nice clean smell and leaves a nice fresh feeling.   The results are amazing. My pores are less noticeable. It makes them look like they have shrunk. The texture of my skin is smoother.   My skin feels really soft after using. It makes my foundation makeup apply easier and look much better. Before, my skin even with foundation, looked textured.   Pros: Softer skin, pores less noticeable, smoother appearance and texture, gentle   Cons: wouldnu2019t advice using everyday   Overall, this is a great addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Tata Harper resurfacing glow mask a few times a week and I like the way it feels on my skin. I will continue to use it for ongoing results, especially with my dark spots, which you can see more now that the weather is colder and I am not as tan. It is not a huge jar but a little goes a long way. I like that you can feel the product tighten and peel a bit before rinsing it off. I used their daily cleanser and scrub to take it off but I didn't have any issues with burning or redness from the mask. The packaging is lux and it has a nice scent to it; just note it is glass and a bit heavy so don't drop it. My skin is normally oily and can get some congestion around my chin and nose, and this mask helped with both. I also didn't strip my skin or dry my face out after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is indeed a game changer. I love how it refines my pores and my  blemishes. This cream is so luxurious. I love how amazing it is when it comes to make my skin looks young and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is so nice. It comes in a jelly form so it's a little weird on your skin at once but.... when you get the hang of it, it melts to this really cool paste. I Left it on for only 10 minutes maybe less. Then rinsed it off. Only downside is that it's super small.

I tried the resurfacing mask by Tata Harper.  I really liked it!    Itu2019s in a small glass jar and also I use my fingers to dip in and apply.  I find that it has a cooling and gel texture.  I apply a thin layer of the mask and rinse it off after 10 min.  It leaves my skin super soft and also smooth.  I donu2019t find it to be too harsh or drying.    I like that it has clean ingredients and also herb and plant ingredients.  It agrees well with my skin and also I like that it doesnu2019t make my skin breakout or sensitive.    I use it twice a week and it helps my skin glow.  It is also easy to rinse off and also apply without much hassle.    I will pick this up again once I finish my bottle and also keep it as a regular in my skincare routine.  I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is a widely acclimated brand so I was super excited to try this mask and let me tell you- it did not disappoint. This mask was perfect for my super oily skin as it left it glowing but clean and not greasy at all. The texture of the mask was different from my other masks as it was a jelly like consistency. You only need a small dab so the jar will last quite a bit of time. I put this on for 15 minutes or so and then dry it off and my skin feels porcelain and so smooth. This is perfect for oily skin people who want a silky smooth skin texture. The exfoliating pomegranate beads were also a nice touch to get rid of impurities while the clay is also great to really clean out those clogged pores. Overall this is a wonderful addition to my skin care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just like every other Tata Harper product I have tried this is a great mask. It is very easy to apply. It spreads very easily across your skin and it feels so pleasant as it gets to work doing what it's supposed to do as it sits on your skin. I use it as a little self care moment before bed every three or four days. I wake up to refreshed, brightened skin and I can see a definite difference in my dark spots. Highly recommend this mask and the Resurfacing Serum as well as the cleansers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve become such a huge fan of the Tata Harper brand! They seem to have so many products that work for me. While they are on the pricier side, Iu2019m always pleasantly surprised at what they do for my skin. As an esthetician, Iu2019m used to only using certain brands that my spa has and lately Iu2019ve been branching out. This resurfacing mask is one that Iu2019m now raving to my clients about! It seems to have helped with sun damage after a few weeks. I also continue to work on it with regular treatments as well. This seems to be working alongside them! A little goes a long way so even though itu2019s pricier, youu2019ll have this product for a while. I love that it feels cool on my skin. Itu2019s more of a jelly like texture which I love. It makes my skin look refreshed and renewed after each use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This resurfacing mask is equivalent to drinking a refreshing tall glass of ice-cold water on a hot, sunny day. My skin felt super plump and rejuvenated after applying this mask. I loved the texture and how easy it was to distribute the mask across my face. I experience a lot of dryness during the cooler months, so I followed the three steps for glow recommendation on the Tata Harper website a few times a week, and Iu2019ve seen very good results in how glowy my skin was. The mask doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin at all even though it's scented. I love how intentional Tata Harper is about producing luxurious products with natural ingredients and active ingredients to nourish the skin. This product instantly transformed my skin. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a mask to elevate the look and feel of their skin.

reviews.review_title: Use This If Your Skin Needs A Pick Me Up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I reach for the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask about once a week, but I definitely will start using it a couple times a week. Anytime my skin needs a pick me up this is my go to! This mask leaves my skin soft, glowing, and vibrant. You can say goodbye to dullness and uneven texture after using this mask. The consistency of this mask was a little different (my best comparison is jell-o like). I scooped a little out of the jar and then applied to my face. You really donu2019t need a ton of product (a little goes a long way) and it spreads really well onto the skin. I set a timer for 20 minutes and then rinse it off with warm water. There is a pleasant natural earthy citrus scent to this product. I donu2019t always do masks, since they can be time consuming and sometimes I just want to wash my face and go to bed but oh my goodness this one is so worth it. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask will leave your skin feeling silky smooth and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this mask 5 times now in the past two weeks, and Iu2019m not really sure it does anything. The texture is jelly-like, and glides on smooth. Itu2019s really easy to remove and doesnu2019t get stuck in your eyebrows, or leave little sneaky patches of mask like almost everyone I own, lol.   I applied it and left it on per instructions, and didnu2019t feel anything. I was expecting to feel some tingling or something given its name and promise. It was very soothing and calming- I would recommend it for that. The mask has Arnica, Rose Otto, and Calendula in it which are all super soothing. My skin was already looking pretty glowy from the Regenerating cleanser Iu2019ve been using as well, so maybe it just has a very subtle effect in general, and didnu2019t do much for me. I think my before and afters reflect the regenerating cleanser the most, but no doubt that my skin looks brighter after using both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for a mask that instantly adds radiance to your skin and leaves you glowing, the Resurfacing BHA Mask by Tata Harper is for you!! Like all their products, the resurfacing mask contains high performance botanical ingredients that smooth and soften skin texture, refines pores, and gives your skin a beautiful glow. Tata Harper is dedicated to providing products that are 100% naturally derived and made largely from certified organic ingredients. The formula has a gel like texture that spread easily onto the skin and smells absolutely amazing. After 20 minutes, it rinses away easily with warm water and leaves my face looking refreshed vibrant. Iu2019ve been using it on its own twice a week as a mask but Iu2019ve also used it overnight as a spot treatment and once a week I layer it on top of Tata Harperu2019s Regenerating Cleanser for five minutes to give my skin an immediate pick-me-up mid week.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s a no for me- maybe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to have more of an oily prone skin during the summer months and lean more combination during the cold winter months so I always have to adjust products for each season.  Iu2019ve been using the Tara Harper regenerating cleanser to help with my dull, textured skin at night and the clarifying cleanser in the morning to help with oil control. This mask is also available intended to be used to boost dull and textured skin into even and glowing skin but I honestly donu2019t know if it did anything for me. I use to have dull skin but now itu2019s not as dull but my red spots have come out in full force. Like before I would wash my face and it would look tamed but now I feel like itu2019s showing my redness more and Iu2019m not fond of that. Going to be slowing down on the exfoliating cleanser a bit too hoping to give my skin a chance and maybe using the mask only once a week instead of twice.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While overall I felt this was an okay product, it's very expensive for the amount you get. It did work well with my dry and sensitive skin. The scent is the same as other Tata Harper products, a mild but pleasant floral. I liked using this product one or two times a week to get an extra glow and brightness in my face. This is also excellent in combination with the Resurfacing Cleanser from Tata Harper. I think when combined, those two products will provide new life to your skin. Another thing I appreciated about this product was the quality packaging. It genuinely felt so luxurious and made me feel excited to use this mask. Overall I did see positive effects on my skin tone, including extra brightness. However, this gets four stars because the positive impact wasn't enough to wow me for the price per oz. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Super refreshing mask brings life back to skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been wonderful for my very sensitive skin, I have seen amazing results in the luminosity in my complexion, I struggle with a lot of dullness and post-acne scarring pigmentation so using this mask on a weekly basis for the past 2 weeks has been really good for my skinu2019s recovery journey. I have always loved Tata Harperu2019s formula when developing and using their products and I feel the care and quality of the ingredients they use on each formulation is really great. As someone who does struggle with hyper pigmentation I can definitely attest to the brand and the functionality of their products, when it comes to the regenerative mask I have seen a key difference with my texture and skin glow when using this consistently. I can definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to reduce their dullness and pigmentation.

reviews.review_title: A mask that I can be proud of using
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the resurfacing mask from Tata Harper and here are my thoughts.  When I apply the mask to my face, itu2019s very easy and straightforward.  I also like I donu2019t have to keep it on too long(20 minutes) and only need to apply it 3 days a week. After using the masks for a period of time, I have noticed my complexion suddenly change where it just glows consistently.  Having this glow makes me feel more confident, and I can take on any challenge head on during the day.  Additionally my face feels really stretchy, smooth, and cool after I rinse my face.  I also like that the product is certified vegan and is cruelty free.  With me being an animal lover and a vegan-in-progress, I find this commendable and want to support Tata Harper as much as I can.  Lastly, the smell has that coolness effect and is not too strong or too weak.  It is a very pleasant smell that I can continuously smell hours on end.  I recommend this product to anyone that wants glowing skin and feel great about themselves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a highly acclaimed skincare product. This luxurious mask is formulated with a potent blend of natural ingredients that work synergistically to exfoliate, brighten, and revitalize the skin.  One of the key ingredients in the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is pink clay, which helps to draw out impurities and toxins from the skin, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The mask also contains pomegranate enzymes, which gently exfoliate my skin to reveal a smoother, more radiant complexion.  I have noticed a variety of benefits after incorporating this product into my skincare routine, including visible improvement in the texture and tone of my skin, with reduced appearance of fine lines and hyperpigmentation. I have also noticed that is is great at unclogging pores and minimizing the appearance of blemishes, resulting in a clearer and more even complexion.  In addition to its impressive performance, the  Resurfacing Mask is also lauded for its clean and sustainable formulation. The brand is committed to using only natural and non-toxic ingredients, ensuring that the mask is safe and gentle for all skin types.  Overall, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a standout product in the realm of skincare, offering a luxurious and effective treatment that delivers visible results. Whether you're looking to rejuvenate dull skin, improve texture, or simply pamper yourself with a spa-like experience, this mask is sure to impress with its transformative effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask for two weeks now, and it has already made a noticeable difference in my skin! The gel-like texture feels lightweight and refreshing, and it applies smoothly without any mess. Itu2019s like a jelly, or rather, a bouncy texture. Itu2019s pretty cool! Iu2019ve been using it twice a week, and every time I rinse it off, my skin feels incredibly smooth, soft, and has a subtle glow. It doesnu2019t make me look oily, and it doesnu2019t feel greasy.  It gently exfoliates without irritation, even on my combination skin. In the winter, my cheeks get dry, so my makeup doesnu2019t sit well, and I just look blah. I especially love how it clears away dullness and gives my face a subtle, natural glow. On days when my skin feels congested, it helps to refine my pores and calm any redness, making it a great multit asking mask. Iu2019ve even used it before special events, and it leaves my skin prepped and radiant, making makeup go on flawlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to be honest and it did not u201cwowu201d me at all. I used it in conjunction with the regenerating cleanser which is a standout star on its own. Based on the results, I would say that it might have added more hydration than the cleanser by itself. I really liked the gel consistency. It almost seemed like water for the skin. My skin drunk all the goodness up. It did not dry out my skin at all. The mask was easy to spread on the skin. I wish that it came with a little spoon to scoop the mask out of the jar or even one of those push mechanism where your fingers are not in the product at all. I would find it more hygienic and a smoother application process. The scent was not memorable. It is just not a product that I would continuously reach for. I would use once in a while for a pick me up.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a powerhouse for achieving an instant glow. This clean, all-natural mask is designed to refine, brighten, and smooth the skin using a blend of natural BHA (from white willow bark) and enzymes from pomegranate.  The texture is lightweight and gel-like, making it easy to apply evenly. After leaving it on for 15-20 minutes, my skin felt noticeably softer and looked radiant, with a reduction in dullness and uneven texture. Itu2019s especially effective before special events or when your skin needs a quick pick-me-up.  One of the standout aspects is its gentle formulationu2014while it exfoliates effectively, it doesnu2019t leave the skin feeling stripped or irritated, making it suitable for sensitive skin when used sparingly. However, at its luxury price point, it might feel like a splurge for some.

reviews.review_title: Did help with brightness and exfoliation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Tata Harper Resurfacing mask is a gel-like liquid formula that disolves on your fingers when rubbed. It aims to boost glow with the power of BHA and other ingredients. On my dry and sensitive skin, I have to be strategic on the use of this mask. What I did at first is use it 3 consecutive nights as a part of a routine after the Regenerating Cleanser and found that to be a bit much for my skin type. At first, I knew I was purging. But knowing that some skincare products could do that I switched to every other day but still ended up only using it 2x a week. I found this to be the most effective for me. It worked well with micro peel that is not visible unless you look very very closely. I know that it aided in removing and exfoliating my dead skin cells. It might come in a small jar but with the amount that you need and the number of times you would need to use this is making it worth it. If you consider cost per use and its effects it is definitely worth the splurge. I would suggest to be more conservative in the usage of this because its effectivity did not rely on how many times I have used it but with the correct amount needed that my skin type will be able to handle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. However, it has been leaning more dry due to medication and weather. Because of this, my skin sometimes looks dull because it lacks glow. This Tata resurfacing mask not only provides my skin with a glow, but it also makes my skin feel smoother. It contains BHA from white willow bark extract, which is a good exfoliation. It also contains pomegranate enzymes to help remove dead skin and pink clay to help with absorbing oil. Though my skin has been leaning more on the dry size, I still have a very oily tzone, so I like to concentrate it more on this section. As for my other areas, I still use the mask, just not as long. The smell of the mask I actually didn't quite like. However, I know it's a natural formula, and it doesn't linger on the skin, so I put up with it since it's only temporary. It has a gel texture as well, and i do not need a lot of products, which means this will last quite a while for me. For me personally, I reach for this one to twice every 2 weeks due to the medication I am on being very strong. When I do use it, however, I do like the effects it gives me. I do recommend this product if you are looking for glowy smooth skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin with large pores, and this mask has been a total game-changer for me. The jelly-like texture feels incredibly silky as it glides onto the skin, and it absorbs quickly without any sticky residue. After leaving it on for 20 minutes, it dries down so gently that you barely notice itu2019s there.  The best part is rinsing it offu2014just add a little water and massage it into your skin, and it transforms into a silky texture that feels luxurious. Once itu2019s fully washed off, my skin feels unbelievably smooth, soft, and glowing. Itu2019s like hitting the reset button for my face!  This mask is especially amazing during the winter when my skin becomes extra dry and dull. It brings my skin back to life, leaving it brighter, more even-toned, and incredibly refreshed.  Although the jar is only 30ml, you donu2019t need much. Just a small dab covers your entire face, so it lasts longer than youu2019d expect. If youu2019re looking for a product to combat dullness and refine your pores, I highly recommend thisu2014itu2019s worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The **Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask** is a transformative addition to any skincare routine, especially for those targeting dullness and dark spots. Packed with natural BHAs and pomegranate enzymes, this mask gently exfoliates and resurfaces the skin, revealing a radiant, even-toned complexion. The lightweight, gel-like texture is easy to apply and dries comfortably without any tightness.  After just one use, the skin feels noticeably smoother and looks brighter, making it an excellent option for a quick glow boost before special occasions. With regular use, it helps fade dark spots and refine skin texture, living up to its brightening claims. True to Tata Harperu2019s ethos, the mask is formulated with clean, non-toxic ingredients, making it suitable for those who prioritize natural skincare.  While itu2019s on the pricier side, the visible results and luxurious experience make it worth the splurge for anyone seeking a high-performance, clean beauty mask. Whether youu2019re addressing uneven tone or simply looking for a radiant refresh, this mask delivers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this mask. It feels kind of like jelly. Itu2019s very easy to apply and dries quickly. I have oily combination skin and this mask really helps to control oil and minimize my pores. I use this a few times a week and Iu2019ve seen very good results for skin texture. My skin is smoother and softer. My pores are smaller and my face is less oily. I really like that this has natural ingredients and natural active ingredients. It doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. It has really helped to improve my skin. I like to use this after using a gentle cleanser. I usually follow this with a moisturizer and skip any serums when I use it because of the strong effect this has on my skin. It has a pleasant natural scent too. The packaging is also very beautiful and luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! I remember sampling this while I worked at Sephora and itu2019s one of my favorite products from the brand. I used this right after the regenerating cleanser and my skin feels so refined, yet supple with chemical and enzymatic exfoliants. This is definitely a great prepping treatment before makeup because the radiance is incredible and I donu2019t feel irritated or super sensitive afterwards. Iu2019m sure I can thank the calming botanicals, like arnica and calendula, for that. I do wish the size was SLIGHTLY larger for the price but I do understand the luxury that is, Tata Harper. I love that during the wear, my felt tightened, but not TIGHT, in an uncomfortable way. I think adding and applicator to the packaging would be a nice touch for sanitary purposes and to add more value to the ulcerous of the product, itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time Esti and Skincare lover who has worked in both clinical and high end retail settings Tata Harper is a brand I know and love. This brand is not only luxurious inside and out they have high performance, quality ingredients at levels that are safe for the every day consumer but effective enough to use in a spa room. Tata Harper uses natural ingredients with a focus on being gentle to even the most sensitive skin. I got to try another of the Tata Harper masks, this time it was the resurfacing mask. This is labeled as a glow treatment mask with BHA and Pomegranate enzyme. I love this combo as it will be exfoliating but gentle and willow bark will help control any active breakouts. This is definitely best for oily, acneic or congested skin but safe for all skin types like most other Tata Harper products. Willow Bark is the second ingredient on this mask, the label says use up to 3x a week but if you have dry skin I would probably use it once a week or even every other week depending on what other exfoliation products youu2019re already using. This mask is a gel consistency and comes in a jar so you have to scoop out what you need. I like to leave this in the shower so I can leave it on during hair conditioner or treatments and the steam from the shower helps the exfoliation like you're getting a spa facial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this resurfacing mask for a few weeks now, and I am really impressed with the results! After each use, my skin feels noticeably smoother and looks alot more brighter. It has been super helpful in evening out my skin texture, and I have seen a reduction in dullness and dark spots on my skin. I love how light the mask feels, and it has a pleasant, non-irritating feel. I will say a little goes a long way with the jelly-like texture.  My skin can be sensitive, but I havenu2019t experienced any discomfort while using this which is a big plus. The only reason Iu2019m not giving it 5 stars is the price point u2013 itu2019s a bit on the higher side. But overall, itu2019s definitely worth it if youu2019re looking for a skin-smoothing treatment! I would definitely add this to your skincare routine! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Letu2019s face it, sometimes we are all a little guilty of using and abusing our skin. We forget to drink water, or we go out in the sun too long without protection. Whatever the cases, we all try to find a way to reverse the damage caused by ourselves. I am a 28 year old woman who loves to be out in the sun. So my skin has slight signs of aging. I recently discovered the brand Tata Harper and was happy to have tried the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask. Like all other Tata Harper products, itu2019s pricey, but worth it! My only complaint on this one is how small of an amount of product that you get in the jar. Other than that, it smells amazing and works wonders. My face feels totally rejuvenated after each use. I look forward to each time I use it. Itu2019s not harsh on the skin either. Itu2019s a jelly that you put on your skin and leave on for 20 minutes before washing off. It smells amazing and leaves my skin glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is an instant glow-giving treatment that has become a favorite for refreshing my dull skin.   This mask is formulated with natural BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes, which work together to gently exfoliate and clear away dead skin cells. The result is noticeably brighter and smoother skin that looks rejuvenated.  The mask has a lightweight gel texture that spreads easily. Iu2019m a fan of how it visibly improves skin tone and texture, providing an almost instant radiance boost without any harshness or irritation.   Overall, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a fantastic treatment for anyone seeking brighter, smoother skin without the harsh effects of conventional exfoliators.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, and Iu2019m seriously impressed! My skin was glowing after just one useu2014it totally banished that dull look I had. The mask itself feels really light and smooth going on, and itu2019s packed with natural BHA and pomegranate enzymes that left my skin looking super healthy and refreshed.  Iu2019ve got combination skin, and it handled my oily areas so well thanks to the pink clay that helps absorb buildup and refine pores. I also love that itu2019s free from any toxins or syntheticsu2014just pure, clean beauty. The scent is amazing too, very fresh and earthy, like youu2019re putting a bit of nature right onto your face.  All in all, this mask gave my skin an instant glow boost, and itu2019s definitely going to be a regular part of my routine now! This review was collected as part of a promotion

I tried the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask and really enjoyed using it!    I love that itu2019s a rinse off mask.  It feels nice and cooling on my skin and I let it sit on my face for 15 min before rinsing off.    It makes my skin smooth like butter and also makes it soothing.  My skin looks more radiant and glowy afterwards.    I also like that itu2019s in a small glass jar and itu2019s easy to scoop with my hands.    The mask doesnu2019t make my skin sensitive or irritated and it helps my skin feel calm.  I used it once a week so that it helps not over exfoliate and also help keep the dry skin and flakey skin from occurring.    I like that the ingredients are clean and gentle and not too harsh for a chemical exfoliant.  Itu2019s one of the gentle resurfacing masks that I used!   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Great mask to achieve a glowy complexion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask did exactly what it said it would do. It transformed my dull skin into glowy skin. I have been using this mask two times per week snd I could see results since the first use. I have oily acne prone skin, but sometimes it just looks dull. I was able to get instant glow after the first use. This face mask has a gel like texture, or like a fruit puree and it even smells kind of fruity. I just apply a layer of this mask and leave it on for 20 minutes and then rinse off. After it dries it does not feel tight on the skin at all. After rinsing, my skin feels hydrated and looks healthy and glowy. No more dull skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Use this once a week and you'll see magic!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As an esthetician and skincare expert, I find clay masks are the best for acneic skin! This mask has pink clay which absorbs excess oils from the surface of the skin while also blurring pores. It works best on oily and combination skin, however, it is also good to use it on other skin types as a spot treatment use it once a week and my skin has never felt better! My acne has significantly reduced and my pores have shrunk. My overall skin health has improved so much since using this mask. The mask comes in a luxury, glass bottle and using the product really elevates my skincare routine! The only downside I could mention is that the mask does not have a long shelf life unfortunately; my jar expires 14 months from now which is a very little time. Overall, it is a great choice to calm acneic skin!

reviews.review_title: She Puts in Work. Just Keep the Moisturizer Ready!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm Ki, a freelance businesswoman in my mid-30s and skincare lover since my teens, when I finally said enough to my problematic skin. The texture of the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask was interesting, a little difficult to dip into the jar and get onto your fingers at first. When you open the jar, the mask actually looks like a smooth lip balm. It goes on feeling moisturizing but dries down very quickly. Left my combination, dry-leaning face a bit drier than I like, so if you are dry combinatiom or dry, make sure you have that moisturizer ready. For all skin types to transform your dull complexion to glowy with BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes. I can see how effective it is at resurfacing as she is putting in work when drying down. Vegan, cruelty-free, and Forest Stewardship Council approved packaging. Next-generation skincare, indeed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and sensative do to weather change, I also have oily T~Zone and some portions are dull.  This is a gelly type texture that's a mask for the skin.  The color is peach with an amazing aroma. It's a citrusy smell that isn't overpowering. I use about a dime portion for my skin at nighttime as I love using  masks only in my nighttime skincare routine as it works better when my skin is not stressed out.  I leave it on for 20 minutes. As I rinse with lukewarm water as my skin is being restored it's radiance look,  while it  unblocks my pores.    This mask has made my skin more radiant with a healthy glow. My skin doesn't have it's dull patches as it's smoother and softer.    An ingredient that I like in this product is white willow bark which helps remove dead skin cells and excessive oil from the skin.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all things Tata Harper, and this resurfacing mask was no different. It left my skin feeling so clean and looking bright. I feel the price is a little hard to stomach, especially since itu2019s such a small jar. I know itu2019s probably warranted since Tata Harper only uses the best natural ingredients in their products. Iu2019m not really a fan of the consistency of this mask. It has a weird gel texture to it. It does glide on nicely to the skin and has a nice light scent to it. Using this mask still feels like a luxury after applying and sitting and relaxing while waiting for it to dry for 20 minutes. It washes off very easily. I was happy that this mask did not dry out my skin and that it helped clear up my whiteheads. I would still recommend even with the high price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the vegan and cruelty free brand Tata Harper and I was more than happy to try this mask. The resurfacing mask by Tata Harper. From the packaging to the product, this brand uses sustainable products that you can feel good about using. The mask is a BHA + Enzyme Brightening Mask with botanicals like pomegranate and lemongrass. The scent is a lovely floral combination. I found the 20 minute mask to be a tad long, and I think that pink clay is a tad drying. I still loved the experience, and I loved the overall texture of this mask. My skin felt tighter after use but also softer. It stays like a gel and does not dry or flake off as far as texture goes. I used this twice during a week to keep my skin balanced, brighter, and pores smaller after use.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use with glowing skin afterwards!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic mask product! I really appreciate that it goes on fairly drily and without a lot of heft to it - while you feel it working and drying on your face, it's not a thick mask or messy like some products, or one that changes the color of your skin while it's on. I definitely feel the difference after I use it, feeling rejuvenated and with clear, glowing skin. The mask comes in a lovely container and it's easy to dispense, put on your face and use, with clear instructions on its use. The ingredients are mostly natural ones that I recognize, and the cruelty free and vegan certifications are a nice bonus. I'll definitely continue to use this on a regular basis, for a bit of extra skin care beyond my daily routines! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily, acne-prone skin. I try to stay clear of any products that may be too abrasive for my skin or clog my pores.  This jar is elegant and environmentally-friendly. It screams luxury. You can tell it is very high quality. I also really appreciate the earthy scent it gives off.  This mask may brighten the skin and lessen the appearance of dark spots. It is a lovely, creamy texture that does not feel harsh to the skin. However, I'm afraid this product is clogging my pores leading to further acne breakouts. My skin has had far more blemishes since using this brand.  I would recommend this for people that enjoy earthy scents and are not prone to acne. I also would advise against pregnant women from taking this as it contains willow which is similar to salicylic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for oily skin and large pores.  It not only helps to get rid of lots of oil but makes my pores less noticeable. Makes my skin smoother and tighter. Smells good too!

reviews.review_title: A mask I will actually use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been good about using masks because it seems like an extra step or I don't like the process or feel of them. I don't feel like sheet masks do anything but make my face feel slimy and while I have oily skin, I don't like many clay masks because they dry my skin out too much which probably produces more oil and it feels so uncomfortable on the skin. This is an odd texture, kind of like jello but it works into the skin well. It does dry down but not in a way that dries out my skin. It was also really easy to rinse off which was nice. My skin felt super fresh and deeply cleaned afterwards. It does suggest to leave in on for 20 minutes and I'm usually in too much of a hurry for that but I waited about 10 minutes and it still worked really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mask for a little while and I even added the cleanser that was recommended to use together for a even brighter glow and all I can say is wow this product is amazing. My skin has always been red and uneven I've always wanted a more all over even glow but never found a product that really worked without causing issues to my skin but this one really worked! My skin is so glowy and youthful looking and way more even complexion with less redness, smaller pores and my fine lines have even became less noticeable. This really is a miracle mask that helps skin look and stay healthy I can't stop praising about it; this is the best my skin has looked in a long time and I will continue to use it for even better results! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is one of my favorites so far! I love how nice the bottle is and the whole packaging. The subtle scent and how lightweight this mask is as well. I was using this 2 or 3 nights every week and I woke up with smooth and bright skin. I love the texture of this mask and a little bit does go a long way. This smells really nice and was easy to apply. Over the course of using this, I noticed that my skin kept getting more smooth and even. I noticed brightening as well. The quality of this mask is really nice and it was working for me. I would really like to see this in an even bigger size. I did refrigerate this for that extra cooling effect and it tightened my pores. I recommend this to people that are struggling with acne prone skin and large pores. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Tata Harper resurfacing mask provides an instant glow treatment - transforms a dull complexion into a vibrant, glowing one with BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes. Formulated with 18 high performance ingredients. It's made for all skin types and is supposed to be left on for 20 minutes upon application and can be used up to 3 times a week. I appreciate that Tata Harper products are cruelty free and made with natural and organically sourced ingredients. This is a quick and effective way to give you skin and boost as needed. I have acne prone skin with a lot of scarring and texture and can tell this product with regular use will help with my skins texture and overall health. The packaging itself is super luxe as they use thick glass bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this glow-giving treatment, and itu2019s absolutely incredible! ud83dude4cu2728 This product instantly transforms my skin, restoring radiance and leaving it looking so fresh and vibrant. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a dual-licensed beauty professional that has been struggling with oily and textured skin all my life, I couldn't be happier to review the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask. This mask is a product to help even the complexion of my skin without compromising my skin barrier. The resurfacing mask is a cocktail of the best ingredients to help refine your skin and lessen the appearance of pores on the face. With the use of this mask, I am happy to say that it does not irritate my skin as normally products with active ingredients tend to cause some sort of reaction and erythema. After incorporating this mask into my routine 2x a week, I can see that it helps add a nice glow to my face and visibly brightens the skin. My skin texture is unfortunately still bumpy in my opinion. It is at a higher price point but worth the money to try it and see if it works well for your skin! Please ignore the red spot on my lower lip area that is a mosquito bite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, and it's quickly become one of my favorite skincare products. This mask is designed to give you that fresh, glowing skin look, and it really delivers.  First off, the texture is a bit like a gel, which makes it super easy to apply. Itu2019s got a lovely, slightly sweet herbal scent that feels very luxurious and spa-like. I use it a couple of times a week, and I can instantly see a difference. After about 20 minutes, you rinse it off, and your skin looks brighter and smoother. It's like an instant pick-me-up for my face.  The mask uses natural BHA from white willow bark to exfoliate, and pomegranate enzymes to give that deep clean. What I love is how it manages to do all this without being abrasive or irritating. My skin feels soft and fresh afterward, not red or irritated like with some other exfoliating products.  One of the standout effects for me has been how it helps with texture and tone. I have some unevenness and rough patches, and this mask smooths everything out. Plus, it seems to help keep breakouts at bay because of the gentle exfoliation. It really gives you that glow-from-within look.  If youu2019re in need of a good resurfacing treatment thatu2019s gentle but effective, this mask is definitely worth a try. Itu2019s perfect for when your skin needs a little extra love and radiance.

reviews.review_title: A Wonderful Mask for your Beauty Regimen!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask, and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed with the results. This mask is specifically designed for those with Dry and Combination skin types, targeting common skincare concerns such as Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Pores. One of the key ingredients that caught my attention is the Natural BHA derived from White Willow Bark Extract. This ingredient provides gentle chemical exfoliation, effectively cleansing and clearing the skin while minimizing the appearance of pores. Additionally, the inclusion of Pomegranate Enzymes works wonders in sloughing off dead skin cells and smoothing out uneven texture. The Pink Clay in the mask helps absorb excess oil and buildup, refining pores for a more radiant complexion. What sets the Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask apart is its commitment to quality and transparency. I appreciate that this product is free of toxins, fillers, artificials, synthetics, and GMOs. Furthermore, knowing that it is vegan and cruelty-free gives me peace of mind, aligning with my values as a conscious consumer.  if you're in search of a product that delivers visible results without compromising on quality or ethics, the Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask is a must-have in your skincare arsenal. Experience the transformation firsthand and say hello to luminous, glowing skin that speaks volumes. I did have some stress acne form toward the end of my trial but I have no doubts this product will help me clean up any left behind marks from it. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata harperu2019s skincare line is undoubtedly exceptional with this product being one of them. The resurfacing mask is a must have for anyone wanting to achieve glowy, radiant skin. It contains BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes to refine pores, smooth and soften skin texture. The texture of the mask is a gel like consistency that was easily workable into the skin. I used this after cleansing my skin and left the mask for at least 20 minutes as instructed. My skin looked and felt amazing afterwards. Not only was it very soft to the touch, but my skin looked healthier and less dull with less pronounced pores as well. This would be a great addition to use with the regenerating cleanser for maximum glow. The only drawback is the small amount of product that you get for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with Tata Harperu2019s Resurfacing Mask instantly. At first glance, the packaging is very luxurious and cute. The texture is one of my favorite qualities of this mask, it is like a jelly, and I have never tried a product with that type of consistency, making it very easy to apply to my face and neck. The product also has all-natural ingredients, and as someone who is very conscious about what they put on their face, I love it. After applying, when the mask is drying on my face, it feels like it tightens, which I also enjoy about facemasks when I use them. After washing off the mask, my skin looks so clean and healthy. After using the product for a week and a half, I notice that my skin is glowing, and my texture feels smoother. The only issue I do have with this mask is the quantity of how much you get. I am sadly already almost out of this mask.

reviews.review_title: Radiant, Smooth Skin in Just a Few Days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After two weeks of using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Gel Mask, Iu2019m highly impressed with the results. The gel-like texture absorbs quickly into the skin. After 20 minutes, my skin looks brighter and feels smoother.  The combination of pomegranate enzymes and white willow bark gently exfoliates and brightens my complexion without irritation, making it perfect for my sensitive skin. I've noticed smaller pores and a more even skin tone after each use.  This mask not only delivers instant results but also helps maintain my skinu2019s natural moisture. It has become an essential part of my skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: a must for my combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this mask. I love the beautiful scent, the pink jelly texture, and how soft and glowy it makes my skin feel every time I use it. I'm able to keep it on for the full 20 minutes without any irritation even though it's potent. I'm starting to see slight improvement with my texture after a few weeks of use and will continue with it being a part of my weekly routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a first timer to this brand, I can say that I am blown away. From the packaging to the scent, this brand screams luxury. reviews.review_text: My skin has been changing a lot since I have gotten older. I havenu2019t been taking care of my skin like I should. Because of my ignorance I started looking more of the ingredients I put into my body and on my skin. I have researched and found that Tata Harper was a good and safe brand to use because itu2019s Eco Cert, Cruelty Free and Certified Vegetarian (AVA). The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a wonderful mask that helps the skin resurfaces the skin to make it look brighter. This wonderful mask has some amazing ingredients including Pomegranate Enzymes, White Willow Bark, Calendula, Arnica and Rose Otto to help with leaving a nice glowy skin. To refine the pores the mask has Pink Clay, Meadowsweet, Alfalfa, Lemongrass and Bergamot. And lastly refine and smooth the skin texture the mask has Beet Root Extract, Barley, Olive Oil, Elderberry and Cassava Tapioca, all I know is that all the ingredients are a potion of amazingness. The mask has a jelly consistency and goes on smooth on my skin. I leave it on my skin for 20 minutes and rinse it off. My skin feels and looks amazing after I use the mask. The texture of my skin is so much more smoother and even. Not to forget that the scent of the mask is glorious. This mask will become a regular in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, and Iu2019m thoroughly impressed with the results. This mask is a game-changer for anyone dealing with dull, rough skin. After just one use, my complexion looked noticeably brighter and more vibrant.   The mask has a gel-like texture that feels incredibly soothing when applied. I left it on for 20 minutes, and after rinsing it off, my skin felt soft, hydrated, and smooth. It didn't strip my skin at all; instead, it left my face looking glowy and refreshed.   I particularly loved the natural ingredients like pomegranate enzymes and white willow bark, which work to refine pores and improve skin texture. Itu2019s great knowing that 100% of the ingredients are of natural origin, with 82% from organic farming.  Overall, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is now a staple in my skincare routine, and Iu2019m excited to continue using it for even better results.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has become a transformative product in my nighttime skincare routine. This mask gives an instant glow, leaving my skin looking radiant, nourished, and refreshed. The gel-like texture is easy to apply and feels soothing on my face, and I could feel a cooling sensation that is welcoming in hot summer weather. Packed with natural ingredients like BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes, it gently exfoliates and unclogs pores without irritating my skin. Overall, this resurfacing mask is a luxurious skincare product that delivers spa-like results at the comfort of our own home. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has a unique jello texture that sets it apart from any other brand I've tried. This mask's consistency makes it easy to apply, and it feels incredibly soothing on the skin. The botanical scent is absolutely delightful, adding an extra touch of luxury to the experience.  From the moment I applied it, my skin felt refreshed and nourished. The exfoliating agents in this mask are gentle, ensuring that my skin never felt dry or tight, which can be a common issue with many exfoliating products. Instead, this mask provided a balanced exfoliation that left my skin feeling smooth and soft.  After 20 minutes, the results were nothing short of magical. My skin looked glowy and noticeably brighter. It also felt significantly more hydrated, which is a huge plus. The mask works wonders in revitalizing the complexion, giving it a more youthful and radiant appearance.  One of the standout features of this mask is how it combines effective exfoliation with hydration. It's rare to find a product that does both so well. My skin didn't just look better; it felt healthier and more resilient. This mask has become a staple in my skincare routine, especially when I need a quick pick-me-up before a special occasion or after a long week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product a few times, I must admit that my texture seems a bit smoother. The consistency of this mask is different than a typical one, in that itu2019s a little more gel-like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I have a beauty products addiction, this was my first time trying anything from Tata Harper, and now I totally understand the hype!  Iu2019ve started using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, and I think Iu2019m in love! The vivid Kelly green packaging is really attention grabbing and finding the beautiful green and gold pot inside feels very luxe. For some reason, I was expecting a thick and goopy mask but found a lovely jelly consistency within the pot. She smells divine. I am not always a fan of skincare scents, especially something designed for resurfacing. I fill like some of the hydroxy acids out there trigger a bad scent reaction from me, but not Tata! Itu2019s light and herbaceous, with hints of citrus and floral.   I am an herbalist and I really love the combination of botanicals here, especially the anti-inflammatory properties of calendula, arnica, and meadowsweet. I enjoy that this mask doesnu2019t burn or irritate like other resurfacing masks Iu2019ve used.  My skin feels moisturized and refreshed after using.  I look forward to seeing the texture of my skin after using for a month or more.

reviews.review_title: Instant Glow After Just a Few Uses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite attribute of this product is the glow it gives you. It made ALL the difference going from somewhat dull skin to glowing-if not radiant skin! It works well without any burning or stinging. The mask is easy to apply, it is lightweight, and does not drip after applied which is something I notice with other lightweight masks. I applied in the shower right before I got out, let sit for 20 min then rinsed off at the sink.   I noticed the glow that the resurfacing mask gave me but also the size of my pores shrunk (especially on my nose) after about a week of using it every other day.   I paired this after my normal cleanser and I think to get even better results I would have paired it with the Tata Harper regenerating cleanser, that is on my next to purchase list!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is awesome! After the first use my skin was instantly brighter and felt sooooo soft. I now use this mask every 3-4 days, and when I just want to look great before a special event. After about a month my skin tone is absolutely more even and I look rested! Note that the product has to be on your face for 20 minutes, and I give my skin another 10 minutes to fully dry before applying moisturizer and make-up, so youu2019ll have to figure out the best time to work it into your routine. I personally love how great my skin looks immediately after I wash it off, so I apply it in the morning. And as others have noted, the jar is small. The instructions say to apply a thick layer, but I discovered that applying a thin, even layer and essentially letting it dry has been very effective. I love everything from this mask smells delicious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, I was very excited to try a Tata Harper product, as I have never tried the brand at all before. My first impression was how the packaging was very luxurious. It's in a glass container and the mask has an interesting jelly texture. I kind of wish there was some kind of spatula included. But maybe that's not necessary and it's more eco-friendly to not include one! I'm a really big fan of the fact the ingredients are 100% natural and how it's an enzyme and BHA exfoliant because this type is less common. Enzymes are especially nourishing and brightening for the skin. I will say that the price point is pretty steep: $68 for 1 ounce. And the directions say to use a thick amount so this would only last you a few uses if you're following it like that. I used a thin amount, personally; but to each their own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing that I immediately noticed about the Tata Harper Skincare Resurfacing Mask was the texture of the mask. I was in no way expecting it to be so jello like. It was interesting at first to apply the mask. It states to apply a generous layer and all I kept thinking was how small the jar was and how would someone get their moneyu2019s worth from this product. Upon application of the mask, it does have a cooling sensation and feels nice. I can say that after using the mask, my skin felt nourished and refreshed, but not anything extraordinary that I would say you absolutely have to get this mask. Especially given the price point, I feel as if Iu2019ve used much better masks with better results at a much more affordable price point. It is a nice mask and my skin felt good, I would not recommend given the size of the jar and the price point as I did not experience extraordinary results.

As Iu2019ve been progressing through my 30u2019s, Iu2019ve been focusing more on my skincare routine. Itu2019s hard to find an effective resurfacing mask with clean ingredients, but the natural ingredients in the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask are extremely  effective. I used this resurfacing mask 5 times over the course of 14 days and noticed several things. The white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes are gentle while exfoliating well. The mask also is not stripping- my skin felt healthy, hydrated, and bright after each use. My skin also looked smoother, and the dark spots were less visible. I also noticed that after using the mask, my makeup application looked much smoother. This is a great product that I will definitely recommend and I will definitely repurchase. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A glow that no one can deny! This mask is life changing. It has helped to reverse fine lines around my mouth and I feel more confident.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harperu2019s Resurfacing Mask is a BHA + Enzyme Brightening face mask that you leave on for 20 minutes, 3 times per week. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my (yikes) late 30s and I am starting to get more texture, fine lines and all the fun things we dreamed about as kids on my face. Using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is such a luxurious experience from start to finish. I love the cooling sensation that you feel on your face when you put it on, and then as it dries it tightens and there is a slight tingle. Then as you wash it off it's still thick and almost gel-like so getting to massage it in one more time is nice before it washes away. I was hoping to see a change in the overall texture of my skin and pores, especially the pores on my nose since those are the most noticeable, but so far I have not noticed much of a difference.   HOWEVER, I swear now looking at the before to after photos the smile lines on my face look way less and this has been the only change I have made to my skincare routine so - consider me sold because I am too scared to get botox so if this works instead, sign me the heck up!   Photos - After (blue shirt) & Before (Black tank)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I am in my mid-twenties and consistently looking to perfect my skin care routine and give my skin the life and love that it deserves.  When I first received this product, I was instantly obsessed with the high quality, beautiful packaging. The floral detail on the lid is so delicate and sweet. I also love that the gold product color mixed with the green packaging reminds me of a caramel apple. This instantly set my standards for the product high.  Personally, I deal with dull skin that comes from having normal to dry skin. I also experience texture on my forehead area. I crave the radiant, glass skin look. In total, I will get 4-5 weeks of use out of this product for which I personally could not justify paying. Overall, I would recommend it as a great, high-end product to treat yourself to if it is in your budget.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Over the years Iu2019ve found chemical exfoliation crucial to not only keeping my skin soft and smooth, but also a major step in keeping away blemishes and brightening my face.
