reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have known this brand as a luxury brand. I am trying this product first time. There are few negatives and  positives experience when I used this product. I was very excited to receive this product but my excitement turned into unpleasant experience when I opened the product. There was no secure tape outside or on the jar itself that which prevent tampering. I  was surpired to see there is no seal of security on the lids as majority of skin products now comes with a seal on lid that makes sure that product is reached with out tampering to the customer. I took the jar out, the product was  leaked out,  gloopy, dried out products under the rim of lid. Look like the product is used and then sent back and I received it now. The absence of seal and leaked product raises doubts.   When I opened the lid the product was smeared inside of lid and falling off. There was a small transparent lid that supposed to sit on the top to prevent this accident, but it was struck in the top of lid. There was spatula or brush provided with the mask. Not at all a pleasant experience of unboxing. Luxury was missing.   The  mask  comes in a 30 ml glass pot. Love the green colour ans golden lid combo and it looks beautiful. The outer packaging is deceptive as  this pot comes in a 50 ml box. They should have used a small pack instead if putting an insert and fixing the 30 ml pot in a 50ml I have dry to nornmal skin and some pigmentation spots. The mask is very gentle on my face . I had no irritation on face . I love the fragrance . It has gel formula and I applied it with a silicone spatula which makes application easy and smooth. It felt like a peel off mask as it was drying and I noticed some tightness while it was drying. After 20 minutes I washed, skin looked clear and it was not dry. I didnu2019t not see any big difference that was noticeable. I used twice a week.  I like the product itself but in whole it not worth the money neither the quantity nor the experience

reviews.review_title: A gentle yet effective resurfacing mask to die for

reviews.review_title: An absolute must have enhanced add on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast with a penchant for face masks, I have tried a plethora of products, each promising to rejuvenate, brighten, and refresh the skin. Among the many, the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask stands out not only for its impressive results but also for its luxurious experience from start to finish. It is an absolute must try experience. The difference in my skinu2019s texture, tone, and radiance is immediate and remarkable. My complexion appears brighter, more even, and visibly more radiant. The mask has effectively resurfaced my skin, smoothing out rough patches and giving it a healthy, luminous glow. Itu2019s as if my skin has been given a fresh start, with a newfound clarity and vitality that is hard to achieve with other products.  As someone who has tried countless face masks, I can confidently say that the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a standout product. It combines the best of nature and science to deliver results that are both immediate and long-lasting. If youu2019re seeking a mask that will leave your skin looking and feeling its best, look no further. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a true skincare treasure, worthy of every bit of praise it receives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first experience with Tata Harper products! Now I know why so many people rave about them. The resurfacing mask comes in a cute fancy glass jar. Initially I was worried that I wouldn't get a change to see results in my skin because the jar is 1 ounce, but I quickly realized a little goes a long way. I can easily spread a thin layer over my entire face and what I love is how fast it dries! I was very surprised by the scent, it smells like Citronella which I do like. As it was drying I felt some tingling, but nothing too bad. It was pretty easy to wash off and I definitely did notice a difference in my skin after the first use. My face looks brighter and clean after every use. My skin has pretty bad texture so I have been using the mask up to three times a week as recommended on the box. My nose area has improved the most so far. I don't think this would be good for people with sensitive skin it's on the strong side and the scent is strong so probably not good for people that don't like fragrance either. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Best for dull and rough skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this face mask a lot, I already got some improvement after applying it couples times. I use my silicone brush to scope and spread a thin even layer on my face with the brush. I really like the smell of all botanical ingredients, sounds like a relaxing spa treatment. I usually use it after I showered, I left it on for 20 minutes and washed it off with warm water. The jelly texture when I washed it off left my skin feeling so refreshed. My skin was so smooth and there were no more dry flaky skin. I finish off my skincare with my serum and face moisturizer. In general, this glow  treatment mask that instantly remains radiance to skin, itu2019s for blocked pores, dull, or rough skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: a beauty enthusiast, and more importantly, what I like to call myself, a u201cskinfluenceru201d, as I have been working with various skincare products and brands for many years I feel Iu2019m fairly qualified to discuss the good, not so good, and the ineffective skincare products. I have been a fan of Tata Harper skincare products for many years and have had the pleasure of trying most of her products. In addition I have loved nearly every one. As far as the resurfacing mask I cannot say itu2019s a u201cloveu201d for me. I enjoyed using it as it has some wonderful ingredients in it, it has an amazing spa-like scent, and a lovely, comfortable, gentle texture. In addition, the packaging is extremely luxurious as well as sustainable. Unfortunately I havenu2019t found it to be super effective. Itu2019s not a u201cbadu201d product and itu2019s not totally ineffective, just not effective enough for me to justify giving it a 5 star review which then encourages potential consumers to purchase and possibly be disappointed. If you donu2019t mind shelling out nearly $70 for a very small 1 oz jar, then by all means- do your thing girl!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an easy mask to use and results are immediate, softer skin and texture. Smells good and the jar lasts a while, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry, sensitive skin, I was looking for a mask that could help clear up my hyperpigmentation and dark spots for me as I scar easily from acne and the sun. I came across the Tata Harper Resurfacing BHA Mask and Iu2019m so happy I did. Not only is this product clean, but itu2019s something I feel good using on my skin.  This packaging is heavy and feels luxurious. The product is a beautiful whipped gel texture that felt good upon application to my skin. It has a very light, pleasant scent to the product that I personally love! After leaving this on the first time for 20 minutes and rinsing it off, I immediately saw a difference in the glow of my skin - it looked brighter and my pores were noticeably smaller.  I love that this product self neutralizes - Iu2019m sure weu2019ve all done it - leaving a mask on longer than we should because we forgot. You donu2019t need to worry about that potentially happening with this mask. This was incredibly gentle on my sensitive skin and I feel comfortable using it the recommended 3x a week. I recommend giving this a try if youu2019re looking for a product to revitalize your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a thirty-one year old beauty enthusiast and also a single parent with a very busy schedule. It is very difficult to find the time to add an extra step to my routine and I must admit that I was pretty skeptical before trying the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask. I hadnu2019t heard of Tata Harper before this introduction. My first impression was the elegant gold and green packaging. After applying the mask, I could feel my face tightening. I left the mask on for 20 minutes and then rinsed my face with warm water. I am truly impressed with the results after just one use! My complexion appeared softer and more even, and my skin appeared tighter. I could see the immediate differences in my before and after photos. It was worth adding the extra 20 minutes to my routine and I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to regain some firmness in their face.

reviews.review_title: Love this mask for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've worked in many beauty retail stores such as Ulta and Sephora I've also represented many skincare brands. I love seeing brands that actually put a lot of work into their products and aren't in the industry just for the money. I've never thought a mask was necessary but it is!! Dealing with hormonal cystic acne and clogged pores, TATA HARPER's Resurfacing Mask has been a game-changer. This mask effectively targets both my oily skin and stubborn clogged pores, also known as sebaceous filaments. The gentle yet potent formula exfoliates and clarifies without causing irritation, leaving my skin smoother and more radiant. Despite struggling with acne, I've noticed a visible improvement in the texture and clarity of my complexion after using this mask. It's a must-have for anyone with oily, acne-prone skin looking for a solution to stubborn clogged pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 35 year old beauty enthusiast who not only loves helping others with their purchasing decisions but also has a passion for finding my next holy grail, so I was definitely super excited to try this mask as I have heard and read so many great things about it and this brand. It comes in a gorgeous glass jar with a gold lid that has a very luxurious feel and look to it, but you don't get alot of product for the price and I was totally expecting to see more which I find very disappointing. It has a peachy tinted gel-like texture that applies and spreads smoothly to my skin and a very distinctive rose geranium fragrance that is thankfully non-bothersome. It gently exfoliates my skin, removing dead skin cells while absorbing and controlling my excess oils without causing me irritation or breakouts. It leaves my skin smooth, fresh, and with a stunning radiant glow. It also makes my pores appear smaller and doesn't dry my skin out. I absolutely love how healthy and rejuvenated this mask leaves my complexion, but I do wish it came with a spatula and more product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask is my go-to secret weapon for achieving a radiant complexion without any fuss. This mask is like a mini facial in a jar, effortlessly transforming my skin from dull to luminous in just one application. I love how it gently exfoliates away dead skin cells and reveals smoother, brighter skin underneath. The gel texture feels cooling and refreshing on my skin, making it a treat to use, especially after a long day. Plus, knowing that it's formulated with clean, non-toxic ingredients gives me peace of mind. While it might be a splurge compared to other masks, the results are definitely worth it. Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask is a skincare essential that I can't recommend enough for anyone looking to unlock their inner glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the mask you need if you are looking for an instant glow in a jar. I am 44 years old and I often can feel like my skin looks dull. This instant glow mask provides the most insane transformation of the skin I have ever experienced. When I first read the claims on the packaging I was skeptical at just what that would look like for me. I applied a thick layer of the mask to cleaned skin and left it on for 20 minutes. I then rinsed with warm water and the results this mask provided to my skin was nothing less than spectacular. I went to bed feeling absolutely radiant and woke up the next day even more impressed. I incorporated this mask into my routine twice a week and the results continue to show in my skins health! If you are looking for a mask to give you that renewed complexion definitely try this resurfacing mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is a wonderful face mask that I use weekly. It helps unclog pores, brighten your skin, and evens out skin texture. It applies easily onto your skin and does not dry out like other masks. It washes off easily & does not sting your face. You can see results within just a couple uses of the mask. I have noticed my skin is immediately glowy after using this mask. It does not have a strong scent to it, just a natural, earthy scent. I have also noticed a decrease in my blemish when using this mask, as it does have exfoliating properties. Overall, I throughly enjoyed this face mask & have seen impressive results with continued usage. My skin is healthier, glowier, and overall brighter. Canu2019t say enough great things about this mask!

reviews.review_title: Refines pores, smooths and softens skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an avid runner, battling sweat and the elements can leave my complexion looking dull and rough and leave me blemish-prone. Add in the challenges of middle age, and it's a double whammy for my skin. Thatu2019s why Iu2019m in love with Tata Harper skincare and so glad I discovered the Resurfacing Mask. As a skincare enthusiast, I appreciate that it is formulated with BHA from white willow bark and pomegranate enzymes, that turn over dead skin cells to give me more radiant looking skin. With each application it further delivers on its promise to refine pores, smooth and soften skin. The combination of ingredients like pomegranate enzymes, pink clay, lemongrass, beetroot extract, and barley breathes life back into my weather-beaten, dull skin while going to work to prevent blemishes from sweat and grime. My skincare routine now includes applying this glow-inducing mask every other day, immediately after my morning run. While I tend to chores around the house, it works its wonders for 20-30 minutes before I rinse it off in the shower. Afterwards, my complexion is revitalized- it gives my skin a youthful glow despite my age and the battle against sweat and the elements. I alternate using the Resurfacing Mask one day with Tata Harper's Water Lock Moisturizer the next, right after my daily run while my pores are still open from sweating. This duo is my new frontline defense against the toll running and age take on my skin. I highly recommend this mask for anyone who wants to achieve the youthful glow that healthy skin provides, and particularly for athletes who want to treat their skin after a grueling workout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a verified beauty expert and skincare & beauty content creator, I always get the chance to try new products so I constantly hunt for the best matches to add to my collection.  It is my first time trying Tata Harper brand and I am really impressed! This resurfacing mask came in a glass jar (1oz) which is kinda small to me. It has a gel texture in peachy color. It goes on my face very smoothly and then dries clear later on which I can feel it tightens my skin. My skin also feels really soft and it provides a healthy glow to my dull skin. I am pretty happy with the results so far!  This mask has a herbal and rose combined scent to it as it made with 100% natural ingredients. The key ingredients are pomegranate, willow bark, enzymes and beet root extract. All these can help with refining pores, softening skin, improving dullness and enhancing skin textures. It is recommended to use together with Tata Harper Regenerating cleanser for better results.  Besides the little jar, I am 100% satisfied with this mask. I hope they can make a bigger size jar so my neck can enjoy some too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a skincare lover in my mid thirties who loves trying new skincare. For the last few weeks, I have been using Resurfacing Mask a few times per week. The green, glass packaging is so beautiful and looks and feels so luxurious. The mask has a beautiful, bright fruity scent and a jam like texture. It feels and looks like something I could add on toast. This product feels amazing on the skin and really dries down after a few minutes. This mask gives the most beautiful glow after itu2019s washed off and makes my face feel so hydrated and smooth. I love that this is packed with eighteen high-performing natural ingredients that truly make a difference in how my face feels and looks. This resurfacing mask is a game changer in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one Tata Harper product Iu2019ve tried that Iu2019m just not sold on. Iu2019ve used it a few times now and Iu2019ve yet to see a difference in my skin after I use it.  To be fair, Iu2019m not sure how much better my skin can look right now. Tata Harperu2019s cleansers and moisturizer have done SO much for my skin, truly. I have a beautiful glow that I didnu2019t have before and my skin looks more even.  The jar is tiny - 1 oz, which is fine, but itu2019s a very expensive product for what you get. Which again, would be fine if it gave any kind of good results. The directions also say to apply a thick layer so I canu2019t imagine this will last that long.  I am giving it 2 stars because it smells nice and feels nice on the skin, but i think it needs to be more potent. Maybe it would be different if I didnu2019t already have a great skincare routine going on, but it is meant to be used in addition to other Tata Harper products and itu2019s still not delivering..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This whole line of Tata Harper is so luxurious and beautiful. When I initially saw the price points I thought it was more on the pricey side, but I see why now. It really does feel and look luxurious.  I think this is a great mask for anyone looking to really amp up the brightness in your skin and rid of dull, lackluster appearance. It truly is a glow up in a bottle! Once again it contains BHA and Enzymes to help eat away at the dead skin revealing a baby smooth surface.  I am a fanatic about natural ingredients so I absolutely am in love with all the different types of foods, herbs, and botanicals it has such as arnica, lemongrass, pomegranate enzymes, bergamot etc.  what a lovely lush line of products.  Bravo Tata Harper, you continue to impress!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The very first time I heard about Tata Harper was a very long time ago when a friend of mine was launching Tata Harper line at Neiman Marcus stores. She was generous enough to give me several different samples of then launching products and I was pretty intrigued!!! Nowadays I am just looking for clean and effective way to take care of my skin and are always would like to be in the know of what new and exciting things are happening in beauty and aestetics world.  Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is coming in a glass jar and has a golden lid like most of the products in the line I received. This mask did not dry me out and was pretty calming on my skin which is a huge plus for somebody having skin sensitivities and reactiveness.  I would recommend this mask to anybody looking to indulge themselves into a nice not overly fragrant textural mask getting rid of congested pores, promoting smoother facial skin and radiance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a Beauty lover TATA Harper Resurfacing Mask is a something I've never tried before. An instant glow treatment mask . Suitable for dull skin. Want an instant glow give TATA Harper Resurfacing mask. It literally transforms your skin while replenishing your skin's texture. 100% organic. Safe to use for all skin types. No clogging pores. An instant glow. Generously apply a small amount onto your skin leaving it on for 20 minutes or so then begin to rinse the TATA Harper Resurfacing mask off. Leaving you with a luminous beautiful complexion. TATA Harper Resurfacing mask is a gentle formula that goes on smoothly and effortlessly. My skin feels hydrated and replenished. Why not give this a try. It's amazing. Instant glow provided when using TATA Harper Resurfacing mask. Ready for the compliments. Go grab yours. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

After a week of using this mask ( 3 times) I loved the results. My skin truly is brighter all around. I feel cleaner as well. Even after a long day at the salon. Great mask, great results, fabulous ingredients!

reviews.review_title: Amazing mask for dull and dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to get my hands on Tata Harperu2019s resurfacing mask. Lately I have felt that my complexion feels dull and dry. I am always trying new things to bring the glow back to my complexion. Tata Harperu2019s resurfacing mask is formulated with only organic ingredients. It is safe to use on your skin and great for the environment also. This mask instantly refreshes your skin. It left my skin feeling clean and with a healthy glow. If you want a cruelty free, green and clean skincare brand that offers immediate results then this is the best fit for you. Get yours today!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let's talk about how absolutely wonderful this resurfacing mask is by Tata Harper! First off, I want to say that this is truly the best mask that I have ever used! I always have some sort of irritation and dryness following the use of facial masks. When using Tatas mask 3x a week, I haven't had any irritation whatsoever. I love the texture. It's gel like but not sticky. It glides on my skin like silk, and there isn't much scent. Like the clarifying cleanser, it has a nice cooling sensation when first applied. It's also vereasy to use and not time-consuming at all. I apply it to my face and neck, and over the next 20 minutes, it slowly dries. It's easy to remove with warm water or a disposable towel. Afterward, my skin feels hydrated and plump but also has a beautiful glow. I've been using Tatas' resurfacing mask three times a week for the past two weeks, and I can honestly say that I've noticed my skin texture is much more even. It's less bumpy and just overall looks smooth and healthy.  I'm truly amazed at the results that I'm seeing, and 100% would purchase this mask over and over as it's the best that I've ever used.

reviews.review_title: A must have for pampering time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who loves masks, I am very impressed with the Resurfacing Mask by Tara Harper. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. This formula is amazing for adding radiance to your complexion and giving you a plumped finish.i enjoy using it for some me time and it has been the perfect addition to my weekly skincare routine. It goes on so nicely to my skin and feeling very hydrating as I apply it. I leave it on for a bit and after I rinse, my skin feels so soft, smooth, hydrated, fresh and plump. The scent also makes it even more enjoyable as you wait. It is not too over powering and leaves my skin feeling amazing after. As someone who has combination skin and is prone to break outs, I would highly recommend this formula. You will truly enjoy the feeling of your skin after and it is a great way to make some time for yourself!

As a skincare specialist, I am always eager to try new and innovative products in skincare. I was recently introduced to the cosmetic company Tata Harper. I was given the opportunity to try their Resurfacing Mask with a sample for my opinion.  Having mature skin, I was very eager to try because I am always looking for products that address anti-aging. This mask is formulated to improve the texture of the skin as well as refining the look of pores. It is recommended for dry and combination skin. I was excited to try. The first time I tried the mask, I really liked the herbal scent. I applied the mask on my face and neck. The mask has a nice gel consistently and very easy to apply. I left it on for 20 mins. During the 20 mins., I could feel a nice firming and tightening to my skin.  After I removed the mask with warm water, my skin felt amazing. My skin looked soft smooth and radiant! I am now using the mask 3x's a week. Love this mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After discovering Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, I couldn't be more pleased with the results! I'm blown away by the soft citrus scent! It kind of comes across as a sweet and juicy grapefruit. As far as appearance goes, the mask has brighten my face tremendously; helping with the dark circles underneath my eyes. The mask is gentle on the skin and a smidgen of the content is needed. I tend to let the mask sit whilst taking a much needed bath after a long day ( before rinsing off with lukewarm water). I have come to terms that I will apply once a week, considering it is such a small jar. The end result of the resurfacing mask has my face glowing and softer than ever! It's definitely a must for those who are seeking a clean and cruelty free peoduct that brings out the radiance of their faces.

reviews.review_title: Great mask, wish there was more product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, I am always on the look out for new and innovative skincare products! I am loving the evolution of skincare to include more organic ingredients and plant-powered oils and extracts. I was pleasantly surprised when reviewing the ingredient deck for the Resurfacing Mask! It is packed with extracts and ingredients such as elderberry, lemongrass oil, calendula, bergamot oil (one of my favorites!), white willow bark (a great BHA-betahydroxy acid), meadowsweet, and white clay. There is also a key ingredient for fighting redness-an extract from the fermented form of pomegranate fruit. This mask left my face glowing and refreshed, especially since the BHA and enzymes encourage cellular turnover-definitely something this 35 year old could use! After thoroughly rinsing, I followed with the Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer to keep that transepidermal waterloss (TEWL) at bay, and my skin was glowing! My only quibble with this product is that I wish there was just more product and that the jar was a little larger. Other than that, Iu2019m in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello Iu2019m a 35 year old beauty enthusiast from northern Kentucky! This Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has been a game changer! It has made my skin feel as smooth as a babyu2019s bottom! No joke! Itu2019s a mask that banishes dullness and refines the look of pores to reveal healthy looking skin! Itu2019s for dry and combination skin. And this mask address these skin concerns dullness, uneven skin texture and pores. Itu2019s free of toxins , fillers, artificials, synthetics and GMOS. This product is vegan and cruelty free.This mask works so well because of the ingredients in it which areu2026Pink clay which gently absorbs oil and buildup to refine pores! It also has pomegranate enzymes to slough off dead skin cells and smooths uneven skin texture! Then we have Natural BHA from white willow bark extract which provides chemical exfoliation that cleans and clears and minimizes the look of pores! Get this Tata Harper Mask ! You will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a licensed cosmetologist specializing in skincare and pro makeup artistry for over 25 years.I'm absolutely obsessed with the Tara Harper Resurfacing Mask! After I wash it off, my skin feels so soft, smooth, and glowing. The scent is just right, not too strong for me but it is definitely fragranced.I have dry, mature skin and sometimes deal with flakiness, but this mask works wonders for me. Just apply a small amount, leave it on for about 20 minutes, then wash it off for a radiant glow. It's a gentle formula that leaves my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed. Trust me, give it a tryu2014you'll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Tata Harper's resurfacing mask for a while now, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations. The luxurious glass bottle in green and gold packaging is a sight to behold and adds to the mask's charm. The thick gel-like texture of the mask feels incredibly smooth and comforting on the skin, making it easy to apply without any mess. Once the mask dries, it tightens the skin and has an amazing natural fragrance that is sure to soothe the senses. After washing it off, my skin feels incredibly glowy and bright, like it has been rejuvenated from within.  The mask has a unique blend of BHA from willow bark and pomegranate enzymes that work wonders on dull skin by providing a radiant glow. It's perfect for all skin types that need a boost of radiance and a touch of luxury. I highly recommend this mask to anyone looking for a magical radiant skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being a skincare enthusiast, this was the first Tata Harper product I ever tried and it is still one of my absolute favorites. This mask is a miracle worker. My skin looks so refreshed after using this, so I always use it when my skin looks dull and congested. I love the ingredients like pomegranate enzymes that get rid of all the dead skin cells, but then the ingredients like beetroot extract and barley help smooth the skin. I feel like most products that have any kind of vitamin C or enzyme that exfoliates always set off my rosacea but I have never once had an issue with this product irritating my skin. I love to use this along with the regenerating cleanser for extra bright and dewy skin. Knowing it is all natural too, this product is tops on my list. Definitely add this to your skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to clean skincare products, Tata Harper does it best!  Resurfacing mask is has an unusual jam-like texture and a delightful, natural scent. Utilizing a small skin spatula (not included) makes it easy to take the mask out of its jar.  The standout ingredients, natural BHA from White Willow Bark Extract and Pomegranate Enzymes, gently exfoliates the skin without causing irritation. Resurfacing Mask has become a staple in my self-care routine and always makes my skin look amazing. After each use, my skin feels remarkably smooth and has a radiant glow.  Although it dries on the skin, the mask doesnu2019t feel tight at any point. Removal with just water is a little time consuming. I highly recommend using a damp washcloth rather than your hands to remove the mask after 20 minutes of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and major skincare lover, I was super elated to try Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask which is a Resurfacing BHA Mask for brightening and refining pores. Tata Harper is an amazing natural luxury beauty/skincare brand! This resurfacing mask is a glow treatment that instantly restores radiance that helps with blocked pores, dull, or rough skin.  My first impression is that this resurfacing mask came in a really small jar (1 fl oz) with a hefty price tag for $68. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has a nice peachy colored gel texture that smoothly applied to my skin then dried clear! It tingled a little bit and I could feel the mask firming my face and neck! It had a beautiful pleasant rose and herbal plant scent. This mask uses nourishing ingredients 100% from nature! It contains high performance botanical ingredients such as willow bark, pomegranate enzymes, and beet root extract! These high performance botanical ingredients help create an amazing rosy glow, refines pores, and soften skin texture!  After rinsing off the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, I noticed immediate positive results on my aging dull skin with dark spots! My skin felt and looked incredible soft, my skin was noticeably brighter, glowing, and my pores looked less visible! This mask definitely delivers instant results! It is recommended to also use the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask in conjunction with the Tata Harper Regenerating cleanser.  I highly recommend the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask if you are looking to revive your dull dry skin with an instant glow. However, the price tag is pretty hefty for such a small jar and you donu2019t get much for the price. It is still worth the price tag if you are able to afford this mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask Apr 16, 2024   So let me start with my positives about this product. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask packaging is really pretty and classy and looks good sitting on your countertop. The mask is very gel like an easy to apply and has a pleasant but hard to place smell to it. Itu2019s some thing you would expect to smell in a spa setting. As a medical aesthetician in a spa, a lot of our botanical products smell similar to this mask. my biggest negative about this product is itu2019s very small for a product. They recommend you use 2 to 3 times a week and its price point is $68. Itu2019s only 30 mL which is not very much at all maybe five or six masks worth which when you divide that out by the cost is a pretty expensive mask. I think honestly a lot of people would be turned off by the price of that when they see how big the mask actually is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Beauty Enthusiast and lover of skincare. I love using high quality skin care products that provide visible results.  Recently I have been using the Resurfacing Mask by Tata Harper. And honestly it's not as amazing as I was hoping it would be. This mask comes in a very esthetic 1 fl oz/ 30 ml glass jar. Its priced at $68, definitely a luxury product with a high price tag that not all may be able to afford.   I like that this mask is easy to apply. It has a jelly like texture and once I started to apply it went on very smoothly on my skin. The jelly like texture feels very soothing and gives a cooling effect on my skin. The mask dries fairly quickly and forms a clear film like texture which is easy to wash off.  I also really liked the fragrance of this mask. It smells really beautiful. The combined smell of willow bark, rose, bergamot, lemongrass, and pomegranate all provide for a delightful experience.  Now as far as results are concerned I am a little disappointed. Because I did not notice a vast difference in my skin even after having finished the entire jar of this mask. Yes my skin felt clean after washing my face but honestly that can be accomplished with using any regular face mask. I was hoping that as promised this mask will transform dull complexion into vibrant, glowing one. However, I did not find this to be true in my case.  To conclude I would not recommend this mask to others because I feel this mask is very expensive for the amount of product that you will be get. As stated above the jar is only 1 oz and you will only be able to get 3-4 uses out of it before the container is empty. I don't consider this a must-have item rather a splurge item because in my opinion there are far better face mask in the market that provide instant results with half the price of this mask.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: I loved Tata's Clarifying Mask and when re-purchasing it I was given a sample of the eternally popular 'Resurfacing Mask' to try out. The sample size was 3ml - just enough for a single use to cover my face and neck, whilst still leaving a small amount in the sachet to try out as a spot treatment. The mask is a gel-texture which has a peachy/pink tint and a distinctive Rose Geranium fragrance. Funnily enough it tingled within 3 minutes after applying, but only for a minute or so, after which I felt nothing at all. At just under 20 minutes I noticed it was starting to dry-out and lose adherence on certain areas of my face (chin and between eyebrows especially) and so I figured it was a good time to remove before it starts to flake off and create a mess! It does leave a slightly 'slimy' feel on the skin as you wash it off, and which took me a good few minutes to remove completely. So what did it achieve? Well unfortunately my pores were exactly the same as they were 20 minutes prior, whilst my skin on the other hand had a nice subtle glow to it. There was no other discernible difference, in texture, clarity etc. I did also use it on a couple of acne bumps overnight as a spot treatment. It helped, but the difference was not as pronounced as Paula's Choice 10% AHA or The Ordinary's Niacinamide. For me this was just an averagely good mask, although I much prefer Tata's Clarifying Mask over this.     ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. reviews.review_text: As a licensed skincare professional this is one of my absolute favorites. If you have sensitive skin I would say this may not be the best option for you. It does have a scent that isnu2019t overpowering which is nice. Iv found it works best with the (what I call) Tata Trick. Applying the regenerating Cleanser and then this on top. If I have a breakout and use this I find it is significantly reduced the next day. Itu2019s an absolutely wonderful Mask that does what itu2019s supposed to. I will say that for anyone who is saying u201cmy pores look the sameu201d or u201cmy blackheads are still thereu201d. Yes, and they will be. Pores do not shrink however, their appearance can. And as far as blackheads go there is no topical product on this earth that will remove your blackheads, the only way to remove them is having them professionally extracted. So yes, I do think this product lives up to its standards and beyond.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I got this mask during back to back clinicals so admittedly my skin was not in its usual form, but I really donu2019t think its effectiveness had anything to due with my low expectations. Pores were minimized, skin tone was evened out, those little annoying bumps on my forehead were gone, and it made me look like I drink a ton of water- which can be tough wearing so much PPE! I doubt I will be purchasing the full size because I havenu2019t been able to work outside practicums, but if you have the luxury I would definitely recommend this for tired, stressed out skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially got a sample of this mask and loved it so much- It made my skin clear, bright and glowy. I spend a lot on skincare but thought the price for this product was very high, considering the small quantity and the amount to be used each application. I went ahead and purchased it anyway. It was good for the first few uses. As I mentioned, I spend a lot on skincare and I have a lot of masks that I use in rotation. Hence I was using this on special occasions, necessary appointments, and not every week. However, in even just a short period of time, it became like a water pill. I saw no effectiveness of the product whatsoever. It just didn't do anything anymore. I tried applying more each time, but it was the same. I fathom that the natural ingredients Tata Harper uses lose their efficacy extremely quickly. I ended up finishing the product but only getting a few good uses out of it. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone who wants to use it past a couple to few months because of the issue I faced. I'm not sure if anyone else had this issue. I decided to give it a 3 star ranking because it did work effectively at the beginning, so the product is not lacking, but the preservation of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a small sample of this that lasted me three uses, loved it every time, and I really hate that I love it. The mask is really good. There is no sting so I wasn't sure it was doing anything at first, but it does feel cool and tightening while it's on. After washing off, yes, I notice a beautiful glow and my skin feels tighter and pores look smaller. I have lots of other products I'm using that help with glow, dullness and texture though (like other chemical and enzyme peels, AHA and vitamin C products, retinol) but for skin tightening and pores, nothing exciting. I also use a BHA serum from The Inkey List, which helps with blackheads but still, not noticing anything impressive for pores. What's the magic ingredient(s) in this? The pink clay, the willow bark? Could I find another product for cheaper, maybe probably, but I don't currently know what that is. Maybe I can score this on sale. Or maybe I need another sample to decide if it's worth it. But purchase this at $65 for only one ounce? Right now, I just can't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s awesome and I love it... my skin looks amazing... but dude itu2019s $65 for ONE OUNCE. And it says to apply a thick layer. Iu2019ll enjoy it while it lasts but I wonu2019t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free trial in my last order and I am absolutely in love. During the winter months, my skin is so sensitive and temperamental. It took me a few passes of warm water to completely rinse off the mask, but I didn't experience the typical tightness that you feel afterwards. I have really sensitive skin and break out in hives even when products are hypoallergenic, but this mask calmed and soothed my winter skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask gifted by Tata Harper is exceptional in value and performance. It gave my experience of using this mask a relaxing feeling and this product is exceptional in providing added benefits to the skin.  I highly recommend this Resurfacing Mask for it is amazing and has great performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. Another Tata Harper win! I love this Resurfacing Mask by Tata Harper Skincare. Itu2019s initial gel was thin and spread on my face easily. I add a thick layer each time as directed. It dries quickly and has a tight feeling. One of my favorite features is that it doesnu2019t have to peeled or scrubbed off. It quickly rinses off with no effort in the shower. Post shower, my face felt soft and looked bright. It does not feel harsh at all on my skin, so I am able to use it as much as I want. Another huge plus for me is the clean ingredients; I prefer to use only products that wonu2019t harm me or my skin. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Leaves my skin so soft & smooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can I just say how much I love Tata Harperu2019s products? Itu2019s the epitome of a company that cares about what theyu2019re putting out there & I think with an over saturated beauty market we need to be smart consumers & buy from companies that take pride in what they make & what they put into their products. Every product is crafted with care & qualityu2014from the overall product itself, itu2019s ingredients to its packaging. And Tata Harperu2019s Resurfacing Mask is no different. Because they formulate, manufacture & package their products directly on their farm in Vermont you can tell that the quality is there in the product. I spread a thick layer of the mask on my face & it spreads like butter. It is so smooth & glides across my face like a dancer. It is a strong mask, so I want to give notice to those with sensitive skin types that it may be too strong for you to use or at least use on a more regular basis because of it being a BHA based mask. But for me it was perfect & clears away the debris of the week & gives me a clean canvas to work with. My pores look & feel smaller, my skin feels softer & more even & my face has a glow that wasnu2019t apparent before I used it.  It has helped other products work better because it gets rid of all the junk on my skin without irritating, damaging, or drying it out. In fact it feels like itu2019s more moisturized & glowy than ever.  Iu2019ve taken to using it 2-3 times a week to give me a spa like experience at homeu2014bc this product definitely screams luxury.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Tata Harper skincare this amazing resurfacing mask. I've never been so excited to try out a face mask as much as this one. The Tata Harper resurfacing face mask comes in a elegant gold and green container. The mask is a thick consistency and a little goes a long ways. I use this mask two to three times a week to give my face some pampering when needed. It only takes 30 minutes for this resurfacing mask to do its magic to my skin. After using this product for awhile now, I have defintley seen amazing results. My skin looks so much brighter and healthier. My chin acne has gone down dramatically and this mask has evened out my skin's texture and discoloration. I'm in awe at how much plumper and more hydrated my face looks and feels. This is now my favorite face mask thanks to its incredible fast results. I would highly recommend this product to everyone. I will definitely be trying out more products from Tata Harper soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

This mask needs to be used 3 times a week for better results. Omg, my skin after I used this mask feels so soft like baby skin, and looks more glowing, this is the best maks that I ever used. I have received this mask complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A very light chemical peel mask
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #tataharperskincare gifted me this amazing resurfacing mask. This is a natural glow-giving treatment, which transforms a dull complexion into a vibrant and glowing one, with powerful BHAs and fruit enzymes. The gentle formulation provides the results of a chemical peel with none of the irritation or downtime.  It's packed with high ingredients designed to boost glow, refine pores, and smooth and soften skin texture. -Pomegranate Enzymes provide gentle exfoliation to loosen dead, dry skin to help clear clogged pores and encourage cell renewal. -Pink Clay helps to refine pores by absorbing oil and buildup to clean the skin gently. -Beet Root Extract helps to support skin's natural moisturizers, helping to boost hydration and smooth roughness. Just apply a thick layer over the face and neck for 20 min and rinse with warm wateru2728, and you can see it makes your skin super soft and very glow, with no irritation at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Tata HARPER skincare, I love this mask so much because its clean beauty !! The smell has my hook its smell so delicious and can't believe I waited till my 20's to discover this brand. I apply a little amount so it doesnt run down my face and let it sit for 20minutes and rinse it off with lukewarm water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #TataHarperGiftedMe their Resurfacing Mask and I cannot say enough good things about it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper gifted me their resurfacing glow mask and I couldnu2019t have been happier. Iu2019ve wanted to try tata Harper products since forever and I finally did! The resurfacing mask is a lovely cooling mask and leaves the skin refreshed and soft. I have oily skin and loved using it. The texture is gel like , although the quantity is a bit less for the price but then the quality speaks! The packaging is beautiful too .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Resurfacing Mask complimentary from Tara Harper in exchange for my review. These opinions are my own.  Iu2019ve heard a lot about Tat Harper and this brand can really be hit or miss. For me, this mask wasnu2019t a complete hit or a miss. It was just a basic product.   The texture is gel like but as soon as you rub it onto the skin it dissolves instantly like water, which I definitely enjoyed. After letting it dry down you could tell there was something on the face but the feeling didnu2019t linger for long. I rinsed off after the stated 20 minutes and did notice a nice glow to the skin. The smell is the only thing that sort of bothered me. It isnu2019t horribly strong but I could get a citrusy fragrance out of it and it bothered me enough to cause me a headache after about 10 minutes of having it on.   If you have zero issue with smells, this could definitely be the mask for you! But if youu2019ve got a nose as sensitive as mine, definitely beware!

reviews.review_title: A good cooling mask not glowing mask
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has a gel like consistency. It feels very refreshing when applying to the skin that I even think would make a very nice cool mask for the summer (especially if you put it in the fridge:)). It has a very clean and fresh scent which I like since scents on the face just seem to stick longer. When you apply, it applies smooth and when it starts drying, it gets a bit harder. It's easy to wash off with just some water and leaves you skin feeling soft and smooth. I have oily skin and it still left my skin very soft and refreshed however, I did not see any improvements in brightness at all so I would not buy this based off that. I think it's just a nice cooling mask. As far as exfoliation, it gives you a cleaner feel but I don't think it removed any dead skin since it's very gentle and jelly like. I would probably used this as a refreshing and cooling mask after having gone through other treatments. I do love that this product is marked as Clean Beauty but I would most likely not purchase this in the future. This was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by the Tata Harper Skincare resurfacing mask. I love how the mask feels when applied.  After letting it sit for a few minutes  and rinsing it off my face felt so refreshed . I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest opinion and I love it. This resurfacing BHA glow mask is a must-have for your skin care routine. Itu2019s a game changer! I have dull skin complexion and I use this mask twice a week as part of my skin care routine. I apply a thick layer over face, leave on for 20 minutes and then rinse it off with warm water. Iu2019ve used other BHA resurfacing masks before, but this one is my top favorite. It helps my skin look glowy, removes any dullness, helps get rid of small blemishes and leaves skin feeling refreshed and very soft. I love that 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin and I feel safe to put it on my face. I do definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: I use this a few times a week
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This resurfacing mask is great when my skin needs a little extra pick me up. reviews.review_text: This resurfacing mask was gifted by Tara Harper Skincare to me and I was pleasantly surprised with this mask! Itu2019s texture is so unique, applies like a jelly but dries and tightens similar to a clay mask. It feels so refreshing on the skin but I wish it was fragrance free. My skin was not immediately smoother than before but was definitely brighter after using the mask for 20 minutes. It didnu2019t break me out either which is a plus! On the day after using the mask, I did notice my skin was slightly smoother but not a huge difference. It also helped mattify my skin which I loved. Overall, I would recommend this mask if you have the money for it!

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare and I absolutely love it.  I use this product several times a week and have noticed a difference.  My skin has been so much softer and smooth. Also, my skin is dry this product adds an extra glow to my skin, which I love. The scent from this products smells light and smells amazing! I will for sure be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This is a good facial mask. The consistency is thick and jelly-like, but it was easy to apply and smooth over the face. I left it on for twenty minutes before washing it off. The mask had dried in some areas where I didnu2019t apply a thick enough layer but it was easy to remove with warm water. My skin felt soft and smooth after using it. Although my skin felt clean, I didnu2019t notice a visible glow to my face. For me this was more of a gentle alternative to harsher exfoliating products. Also the amount of product that is required for each application is quite a lot given the the overall size of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me from Tata Harper. Wow my skin feels great! It felt a little tingly at first use but left my skin looking super glowey! The. Only downside is how little product you get for how much youu2019re paying.

reviews.review_text: This Resurfacing Mask was gifted to me by Tata Harper as a gift. It is of jelly texture and a bit of cool when applying to my face. It dries out quickly with thin layer so I have applied thick layer since the second time. I keep it for 20-30 minuets and then wash it away. I feel my face is very clean and bright after the mask. I think the product is good but the amount to use each time is a lot to avoid drying out too quick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper. This BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acid) mask is perfect if you're looking to cleanse and minimize pores, and correct uneven skin tone.  Made with 100% natural ingredients, including Witch Hazel and Willow bark extract. The scent is a bit strong for some people but this is because of the natural ingredients not chemicals,  this is something I enjoy. This product can be used in multiple ways including masking, applied with regenerative cleanser for a boost,  or overnight spot treatment of blemishes! I used this mask 3 times during the process of one week and it left me with visibly smoother, healthier, looking skin. I experienced no adverse reactions to my normal/ mildly sensitive skin.  Overall I enjoy this product and would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This resurfacing mask gifted to me by Tata Harper is great. It has an amazing and relaxing herbal smell. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. Honestly, this is the best face mask I have tried. This gives my skin an instant glow and hydration to my tired skin. It is gentle on the skin, and this natural treatment helps to clear skin, refine pores while smoothing and softening the skin texture. It is easy to use, just apply a good amount of layer of this mask onto the skin with your fingertips, leave it on for at least 20 minutes and then rinse it off with lukewarm water. My skin is already glowing just after using it a few times. It feels softer, moisturized, and amazingly beautiful. I would recommend this to everyone to try it.   Itu2019s is packed with powerful ingredients like: White Willow Bark that cleanses and refines the pores. Pomegranate Enzymes that exfoliate and cleanse the skin.  Pink Clay that it pulls out the dirt including excess oil and pollutants which keeps the pores clogged. Beet Root Extract effectively moisturizes the skin.  All in all, I am very impressed with this mask. I am using it twice a week and so far I loved the results. It not only makes my skin smoother but it also improves my skin texture. Ensure to apply the moisturizer after the application!

reviews.review_title: Painful to say, but its worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was blessed enough to try this beauty out, as I recieved this mask complimentary from tata harper. LET ME TELL YOU. SHE DOES WORK! Definitely a very high functioning aha mask, this left my face smooth and glowy! I was surprised that it felt as though it was almost soaking in as it was on my face. I guess i kind of expected it to sit in the skin, but no, she goes deep.. as it dried it got a bit tacky and almost made my face feel tightened in areas, nothing unpleasant or uncomfortable. It smells like roses, and for being an all natural product with no artificial fragrance, i was surprised at was how potent the smell was.. It smells good but it is very pungent, and personally I do prefer a lighter scent. Overall i was very pleased with the performance of this mask and although it pains me to say it, I could see spending the money for this. I do feel like I get similar results when I use my less expensive aha mask, but not in one use like this one. Definitely recommend if you want to glow to the high heavens and splurge a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest opinion. My first time, trying this mask was at night before I went into bed. First off, I love the bright colors of the packaging and the bright scent directs my kind before I even try the actual product! Next, the jelly consistency covers my face with just a dab (a little bit goes a long way!). At first I thought it was going to absorb into my skin because it's clear but after a few minutes I could see and feel a smooth, thin layer over my skin! After about 10 minutes (half way through), I could feel my skin tingling, almost but not quite stinging. After washing it off, my face felt so light, cool, super smooth and it was definitely brighter!!! I definitely can't use this daily and even a few times per week may be too much. I will most likely use this once a week or for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Tata Harper. This mask felt so good on my skin. When I washed it off my skin was so glowing, very soft and smooth. The scent is citrusy which I loved and wasnu2019t overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper.  The resurfacing mask has a citrus aroma that I couldn't help but breath in as I waited for the product to seep into my skin. After removing the mask, my skin felt so fresh and soft.  The mask exfoliated and my skin doesn't look dull.  Lack of sleep and stress is a big contributor to how my skin looks and feels, but Iu2019m so happy to be able to use clean products on my skin so that it doesnu2019t add any more junk onto my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really think this mask is unique and I do consider myself somewhat of a mask expert.  It goes on and dries a little.  Itu2019s not slimy at all.  Once you wash it off though your face feels amazing, all velvety and smooth.  Iu2019ve literally never had my face this soft from a mask.  I also love this brands transparency with their ingredients.  This was complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate the recycled packaging.  The hardest part for me to  review is the scent for any product, mostly because I do not find many products to have a welcoming scent (for me).  This has to be hands down the best smelling skincare product I have used to date.    To use: Apply a light layer of the 'jelly' mask on clean dry face.  Sit back and relax for 20 minutes.  The mask has a cooling effect.   Rinse off and pat face dry with clean dry towel.  My face feels amazingly soft and hydrated.  I still smell the scent lingering after for a bit of time, so I was happy!    This is noted to be gentle enough to use a few times a week.  Good for oily and combination skin and targets dullness, pores & uneven texture.    This is my first product i have tried from Tata Harper and am very happy so far.  I have a couple favorite skincare products I actually love to use.  A mask is one of them.  I truly enjoy the whole process of using it.  I received this mask complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare for review .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is the BEST face mask I have ever used. My skin tone is more even, polished, and bright after using it twice a week for three weeks. I'm totally obsessed. It's better than Drunken Elephant's Baby Facial (and hurts alot less). This is a gentle mask but somehow it offers MAJOR results. I am a HUGE fan and this is going to be one of those products I use for the rest of my life.

reviews.review_title: harmed me--not good for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes too much of a good thing--the 347 or so ingredients boasted on label--makes skin react badly.  I put on small amount even though they said to put on a lot for 20 minutes, and when it prickled after three minutes I took it off, but it had already made red marks and old scars get bright and vivid on my face.  I had not even seen those injuries for years, and this made them look new.  I will go back to the products from other companies that use five or eight organic ingredients, since they make me look great and younger.  This company's approach does not work for me at all, like having 347 ingredients in the kitchen doesn't mean they would make a good stew all together.  Oh well--I wanted to love it but it isn't for me.  The smell was interesting, like an upscale store where they sell leather goods and fragrance all together.  maybe others will have better luck with it, but I had to return it.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s alright, but not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that 100% of the ingredients are natural! As for performance, itu2019s alright. I did notice my skin was more glowy after a couple days, but the product didnu2019t do much for unevenness. I donu2019t think itu2019s worth the $80+.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use a lot of T. Harper products and I love the way they perform. I suddenly broke out one time when using multiple new products (during Quarantine), so I had to start over and individually try them all separately to see which one was the culprit... today I just used this and I'm sad to say the Resurfacing Mask was it. I never usually break out on my forehead or cheeks, but after using this (and nothing else new), I had a bunch of tiny bumps all over my forehead and upper cheeks. Not good at all. PLUS I didn't see any glow afterwards. I'll use this up on my nose only to finish it off, but I shan't be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! I've been using it for about 3 years now and feel it is well worth the price tag. I have combination skin and cystic acne. I usually use this mask right after flying and/or anytime I notice I'm getting small under-the-skin acne. I like to use this with the Glow Recipe overnight mask for a really immediate glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea what is in this mask, but it is year long friendly. It exfoliates without causing harsh peeling or too much stripping, while enhancing the effectiveness of your other skincare. I have bought this mask for all of my closest friends.  It does not draw out like a clay- but rather exfoliates and thus even reduces acne and any redness on your face.  I have the most sensitive skin, and this mask is just sensational. Iu2019m on my sixth jar.

reviews.review_text: This is a great product. Right after application and rinse, it gives you a beautiful glow. It doesnu2019t smell delicious, kind like burned plastic but the ingredients are natural and it gives you that miracle glow. I highly recommend, even for sensitive skin. It comes in a very small package but I am at the second bottle after a year. You donu2019t need to apply a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cons: In the beginning, the product had a pungent scent (the closest comparison is akin to mosquito repellent odor and strength) but after multiple uses the smell became more tolerable (but did not shift in scent).   I purchased this because I have very large pores and a blackhead problem, I do not feel satisfied with the level of treatment with this product, *especially for the price* because the change was minimal for me. Furthermore, the texture is like minced jello or pectin jelly, so, if you do not like slimy textures please be aware (I was cool with it tho).   Pros: I really appreciate that this formula is easily build-able  and has the flexibility wear time of short term or long term (overnight). I did notice a change in softness and tightness after an overnight use- but there are other products that do this as well, so it's not a unique quality of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a game changer! My skin is sensitive and it does not irritate it at all.  It provides an amazing glow and makes my skin so soft. I've been using it regularly for a couple years, and overall my skin has improved drastically - definitely not as sensitive anymore! Highly recommended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely mask to apply and mix with cleansers. It doesnu2019t irritate or leave the skin feeling stripped or dry. After immediately removing the mask, your skin does have a nice glow too. However, I donu2019t see my skin looking as renewed the following day. So itu2019s more of a nice spa item to apply and not to replace an exfoliant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a veteran avid user, so I thought this wouldnu2019t do anything when I got the sample. To my surprise, this stuff is amazing!! I have fungal acne and have to watch what products I use, and this doesnu2019t bother my skin at all. When I wake up the next morning, my skin is glowing. (After I got the sample, I bought more and the effect is consistent.) I really wish it wasnu2019t so expensive, or I would this more frequently.
Gives a glow that lasts a few days! Took one star off because it does make me really red for a few hours before calming down. Best for instant glow as in a few hours if you get redness from it...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing! It smells great and definitely improves the texture of my skin. I always look so refreshed after using it. While it is priced kind of high for the amount, it is worth every single penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had very high hopes for the resurfacing mask. After 10 uses, I see no difference in my skin.  Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow Iu2019m so glad I did not pay almost $70 for this mask and instead bought a set that brought a smaller version of it. I got 5 uses out of the mask and NOTHING happened, like my skin wasnu2019t softer, brighter, absolutely no improvement. I have mild acne and some scarring with visible pores because of my oily skin and the mask also didnu2019t do anything in that department. I expected great results from reading the reviews and the price but I can honestly say you are wasting your money, please donu2019t buy it! Get a sample or invest in the gift set instead if you want to try it that bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has been amazing - brightens my skin, tightens pores, makes skin look/feel super clear (I have acne prone skin) - doesnu2019t feel like a ton of product for the price, but worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used a lot of resurfacing masks; for me, this is just u201cOK.u201d  Iu2019ve gone through the whole (tiny) jar and would have expected a lot more at such a high price point.  Will be going back to Herbivore Blue Tansy, The Ordinary BHA peel and Andilou Pumpkin Enzyme masks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this mask but I felt it was too weak for seasoned acid and retinol users.No doubt the ingredients are high quality but it's not as effective. So research well or try a sample before spending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product but is so expensive. Hard to justify buying such a small bottle for the price. It makes my skin so soft, clear and bright. I got this as a sample & bought 2 jars after, but went through them so fast! I used this product twice a week. But darn that price tag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this mask probably the best chemical peel mask I have ever used. This gel mask goes on clear and dries creating this firm glossy clear look. It is gently enough for even sensitive skins. I used to used Blue Tansy chemical peel mask, but found that it was too stripping of my natural oils. Just like any other mask or cleanser you must use more than once to notice results. The first time using this product my face was very smooth and moisturized. After using for about three weeks i have noticed clearer skin with a slight dewy glow. I like a lot of Tata Harper's products, because of the natural ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love resurfacing masks. Anything brightening is my go-to. That being said, this mask did literally nothing for my face. I washed it off and was blown away to see nothing had changed. Given the glowing reviews and the high price-point, I expected the same results I get from my other high-end resurfacing masks.  Iu2019m a total beauty addict (with combination-skin), and there isnu2019t much I havenu2019t tried in the way of skincare- especially masks that are resurfacing/peeling. Since many others use this mask and love it, I have to assume itu2019s a good option for someone who has very sensitive skin and canu2019t use the stronger masks that I see real results from (you do have to build up to using those). For someone like me that is used to stronger masks, I recommend The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution Mask. Itu2019s way less expensive, and you see instant, glowing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this mask!! My skin is SO glowy after I use it.  I always give this to my friends as birthday gifts and they become just as obsessed too! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading the full ingredient list I am quitting this. It has Benzyl Alcohol . Copy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve shopped for YEARS to find a mask Iu2019ll actually take the time to use. None have made the cut, until Tara Harper. My skin feels SO soft after using this, itu2019s unreal. Reduces dullness, makes pores look smaller, and when I combine with the resurfacing serum, I finally understand what u201cglowing skinu201d is. Will definitely repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shocked by all the good reviews on this. I got a sample of this and thought it smelled awful. I read some other reviews and only saw other people who had samples say it smelled bad, so maybe it's an issue with that. Normally with an exfoliating or resurfacing mask I'd expect to feel some tingling or warmth but didn't get any of that with this which makes me think the amount of BHA is not very high. The only thing I really felt was the tightening feeling like you get with the aztec clay mask you can buy like a pound of for $12, but not even as intense as that. Really didn't see a difference in anything at all and felt like I just wasted 20 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the best!!!! I use it overnight. Best thing for congested pores / acne. This doesnu2019t dry me out either. Itu2019s so worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on a whim after reading the reviews. I like how it feels going on and I think it makes my skin clearer and soft. I am not sure it lasts much more than a day but I am glad I purchased it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this stuff. Iu2019ve bought many jars of it over the years. My skin is always in top shape when itu2019s a regular part of my skincare. It really does revitalize, plump and brighten my skin. I have acne prone skin and I feel like this really helps me keep breakouts under control.

reviews.review_title: Never thought I would be willing to spend this muc
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its a face mask. What could make it worth this much? The results. I recieve this as a sample and feel in love and I bought the full size. Pores? What pores? Acne? What acne? This stuff is worth it and a little goes a lomg way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my MVP all time favorite mask from any price point. Every type of mask is gonna do something different but this one is distinctly great for giving you that soft u201cnew skinu201d feeling. Noticeable difference in feeling and appearance after I use. Get a sample first but I highly recommend.
