reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a few of these in their samples sizes and was very excited to try them because I am a clean skin care junkie and face mask junkie. Lol. I also have never used any BHA or AHA products in my life so I was a little nervous to try, having sensitive skin and all. The directions actually werenu2019t on the jar, itu2019s a tiny 7.5 mL jar, I had to look them up and it said to leave on for 20 minutes and apply a generous amount. Very unfortunate, that there was only enough in the jar for 1 use. Spreading it thinly even only left me with a tiny bit smudged at the bottom of the jar. I used this after cleansing my skin with my Raeka tumeric facial scrub. It was a little hard to apply to my skin because it has like a jello consistency lol so sometimes it slides off my face if I donu2019t rub it in immediately. There was no burning feeling but a slight tingling sensation during the first few minutes. I could feel my pores start to breath while wearing the mask. Rinsing it off was very easy and quick which I enjoyed! After removal, I was surprised to see that my face was not inflamed, dry or burning. It was a welcome surprised. I either apply my usual moisturizer or a hydrating sweet chef kale facial mask but I donu2019t feel that I need to after using the mask. Thatu2019s just what I like to do when doing a facial. I definitely notice right off the bat after removing the mask that my pores have been cleaned. It makes my acne scars disappear, evens my skin tone, adds a glow to my skin, hydrates my skin and heals any acne that was there to start with. It also keeps me acne free while I use it!!! I definitely suggest this mask since it is made of the best ingredients for your skin AND it worked for my sensitive skin, so it should work for anybodyu2019s!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin but also have dry patches. My skin isnu2019t the greatest and I tend to have little bumps on my forehead that are a hassle to get rid of. I also have very acne prone skin, so Iu2019m always scared to try out new products However, this mask is AMAZING. I got a little jar from a friend of mine and I fell in love instantly. You notice brighter skin after the first use. It doesnu2019t clog pores, and leaves your skin so soft and clean. I know the price is scary but it truly is worth the cost.

reviews.review_title: Get the LE size jar and get it now.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never review anything but this is one of my favorite masks. You see instant results after the first use which, to me, makes the price worth it. Iu2019m only giving four stars because of the price. For sixty-some dollars, this isnu2019t a mask that I use all too regularly, so I canu2019t say how skin might be if used once or twice a week. Iu2019m sure results would be amazing with regular use and if the price was lower to be able to test that theory, Iu2019d probably give it 5 stars.  Iu2019ve repurchased the 1 oz full size jar a few times after first receiving a sample. I just caved and bought the limited addition 3.33 oz jar and if you can splurge, do it. The brush alone is worth it. Before I was using a MAC flat shader foundation brush, as I do to apply all my fake masks. But the Tata Brush that comes in the set picks up the PERFECT amount of product so you can apply a thin, even layer. Any other brush you use will require you to u2018scoopu2019 up a glob to apply a thick layer, which we probably all like because we feel like more product means better results. But in this case, itu2019s not needed, and the Tata brush will help to make this huge limited edition size jar last even longer.   I waited almost a month to decide to buy the LE size and I caved because I didnu2019t want to miss out if itu2019s unavailable after the holidays. Iu2019m so glad I did. Get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If a company is going to charge $65 for 1 ounce, the bare minimum is to make sure it smells decent.  I received this as a tin foil sample enough for one time use, I didn't notice any difference in my skin that would justify me buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this about 4 times. I have acne prone skin and I love doing AHA/BHA masks because they slough off all the dirt and dead skin cells. This is definitely a staple in my skincare because it leaves my skin soooo soft and has helped me with my acne and scarring. I also notice a difference in how my serums are absorbed after using it.  Plus, I really like how the mask is almost translucent on my skin tone. Itu2019s nice to have one go-to mask that I can wear and not look like a ghost or Shrek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mask as a sample from Sephora, and used it around 5 times so far. What I loved about it is that, compared to leave-on masks, you need quite a small amount of it to get the results! My pores look smaller and my combination skin - smoother, thanks to willow bark (BHA), enzymes and pink clay in it. It didn't dry my skin as willow bark tends to do as aloe vera is the FIRST ingredient on the list. I'm knocking off a star due to its price though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off this masque was very gentle on the skin, the brown gel spreads to clear color on my skintone, provided instant hydration during winter months..what I was not very happy about is that it did not provide long lasting results for the price tag. It worked as instant pick me up to revive skin just like a daily moisturizer. No visible results in skin texture with regular use. This would work great adding moisturization to skin before a event or take off effects of long flight but not a regular staple with skin changing benefits. Atleast not for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! Iu2019m a repeat mini size offender. I have bought the value pack about 3x after receiving a free sample from Sephora. ...Finally went ahead and purchased this value size with a discount! This mask decreases the size of your pores, resurfaces, as mentioned, and gives you glowing, smoother skin. I always use with the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser 2-3x a week. I love the affects of the mask on my skin! It is a new u201cmust-haveu201d in my skin care routine. Iu2019ve given 4 stars because of the price point & ingredients. I feel the price is a bit ridiculous (even though in comparison to the normal sized product this value size is a steal) AND because I donu2019t think itu2019s necessary for great products like this to use fragrance in their formulas.

reviews.review_title: Well Worth The Time And Money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't a big fan when I first began trying this generous sample but, by the end, I was scraping every last bit from the bottom of the jar (and am buying a full-sized product).  It made a subtle but really substantial difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my HG products for when I have texture on my face. Before I purchased I read quite a few reviews and stumbled across one where a girl had said she wasnu2019t seeing results until they tried this as an overnight mask.. amazing. This helps when Iu2019m having breaks out or issues with texture on my forehead/cheek bones. I only use this as an overnight mask and I wash off in the morning. There is a fragrance to this product so if thatu2019s something that bothers you I would get a sample before purchasing - besides that I think this product is a must-try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift and I was so excited.  I have dry and dull skin so I used this! Wow, did it do nothing.  I would not recommend even if it was 10 dollars for the bottle.  My skin felt and looked no different before and after the mask.  I was expecting a little tingle or something considering it is exfoliating, but nothing.  This is a waste of money and a waste of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because I've been meaning to try this brand. I like this mask, it does give my face a little bit of glow. So far this 1 oz bottle has lasted for at least 6 masks and I still have a little bit left. Unfortunately, it's pretty pricey and not sure if I'll purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely a price splurge for me, but worth every penny. I have very a sensitive skin and this makes it glow!! If you are on the fence Iu2019d encourage you to try it

reviews.review_title: great for acne, gentle enough for everyone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time buying this. My skin freaked out after having surgery and being on an antibiotic drip, small hard pimples all along the jaw : it was what I call acne with an agenda. No matter what you do what you use itu2019s coming up until your body gets back to homeostasis. This has been a godsend treatment. I doubt itu2019s preventing acne like I said acne with an agenda but itu2019s treating it beautifully. It drys up everything, while calming the skin and shrinking cysts. It doesnu2019t burn or sting at all and your skin feels softer and more at peace after. Normally acne vanishing masks are incredibly harsh and drying. Honestly donu2019t know what I would do without this right now. Is working better than Differin and Aczone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Tatar Harper face mask. This product is my absolute favourite to use right before going out to work events, parties or when I just want to give my skin some love and attention. This luxurious face mask leaves my skin glowing and bright. I highly recommend buying this product; I always repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The jumbo edition is 3.55 oz - 1 oz is 30 mL, so thatu2019s 106.5 mL, not 150 mL. This is Sephorau2019s error, not Tata Harperu2019s. Yes, this mask is expensive. Itu2019s also the best mask Iu2019ve used for my acne-probe combo/oily skin. It leaves my skin super smooth and calms down inflammation from acne super quickly - if I use it in the evening, active breakouts look calmer in the morning. It doesnu2019t irritate my sometimes sensitive skin with two to three times weekly use. Iu2019m trying to decide if itu2019s worth the price tag for the jumbo size during the VIB sale (with 15% off, it comes out to ~$36 per oz, which is the size of the regular size mask that costs $65 regularly). The product is awesome, but the price tag definitely makes me pause before purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this stuff! my face feels so smooth/glowy after and my makeup goes on super smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I slept with this mask over night. When I washed it off in the morning. My skin looked so refreshed and I was glowing. My skin was so smooth and my pores are nonexistent now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously received deluxe samples of both the Tata Harper Rejuvenating Serum and Exfoliating Cleanser and really liked them, especially the serum. For reference, I have normal/dry skin with minor aging concerns. Although I find physical exfoliants to be most effective for my skin, I do like to augment that with things like masks and peels.  I have to say, this Resurfacing Mask just didn't wow me like the serum did. This is a decent mask; it smells good and left my skin feeling softer than before I applied it. I do like Tata Harper's commitment to producing natural, clean products, and I liked her other products so much I think that I was just left underwhelmed by this. To me, this is comparable to a great many resurfacing masks that are on the market in both specialty retailers and drugstores. No better, and no worse. But for this price...I want something that is holy grail status. There is absolutely nothing that sets this mask apart in my mind, especially when I can go get a tube of Alba Botanicals enzyme peel for a fraction of the price with the same results. I would recommend to only the most die-hard Tata Harper brand loyalists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really is the best - face is left looking radiant and clear of blemishes. I got it as a sample and I've been rationing it for as along as possible because that price point?? Girl what.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This, upon application will tighten a lot, it didnu2019t make my skin red or irritated. Once washed off skin was more glowy, pores slightly smaller, but skin felt drier then before use, almost as if the mask pulled  moisture out. I followed with lamer regenerating serum and lamer soft cream which helped a lot.  I got this item in the play box luxe vol.5. Donu2019t think Iu2019d purchase this as a full size, since I like hydrating mask(revitalizing lamer is a fav). If you donu2019t have dry skin and more of a pore/texture concern you may find this works great for you.  The consistency of the product is jelly like, fragrance isnu2019t overwhelming and packaging is standard jar.

reviews.review_title: I can't recommend this face mask enough
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this face mask! I like the texture and smell and it makes my face glow immediately! It works really well as an overnight pimple treatment too. It'll be my 3rd time buying it, I literally cant be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it leaves skin super soft and truly gives you that glow. I hate the Tata prices. they are super expensive but like the saying goes you get what you payed for and i don't mind spending that chunk because it truly helps your skin. you don't need an entire collection of creams. with just a good set of their face products your skin is super set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute BEST Resurfacing mask I gave ever tried. And Iu2019ve tried them all being a Esthetician. The skin just glows I don't want to put on makeup. But if you do put on makeup after it will never look better. I do however wish it came in a bigger size. And different packaging. If you Layer this mask over the Regenerating Cleanser itu2019s even more amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mask, just bought my second bottle.   I call it Botox in a bottle gives your face a nice tightened feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is... okay? Giving it 2 stars only because it didn't break me out or make my skin any worse, but I certainly didn't feel resurfaced, or see any other real benefit.  - The name is misleading. Willow Bark Extract is not a BHA, and does not provide the chemical exfoliation experienced with salicylic acid. - Why does any skincare company, let alone a high-end skincare company, still use jar packaging? It isn't hygienic or stable. - Quality ingredients are expensive, but $65 for one ounce of a mediocre fragranced aloe mask (grown on the finest organic farm or not) is insulting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is one of my all time favorites! It is effective without burning or being too harsh. I suggest trying the method Tata recommends on her site: use it one a day for 3 days, then reduce usage to 2-3 times a week, then 1-2 times. If you already use exfoliants you probably donu2019t need to use this mask 2-3 times a week but I definitely suggest initially using this 3 days consecutively with a gentle cleanser and no other exfoliants!  Itu2019s expensive but thatu2019s what I would expect from a brand like Tata Harper. The jar is small but always seems to last longer than I think it will! Iu2019ve repurchased several times over the years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: literally obsessed... everyone needs this mask !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin with some redness, and I found that using 2x per week for 15 mins reduced the discoloration and actually gave me a glow. I have previously found some retinol or AHA treatments too harsh, but this mask is both effective and gentle on my skin. Smell is pleasantly light and floral, texture is fairly gel like, easy to apply and feels luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: YOU. WILL. GLOW.   I leave this on my face for 20 min. before make up or skin care routine for days I want to look ethereal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mask a lot! I I used half of the jar, here is how I feel: Pros: 1. a clean and effective mask  2. made my skin soft, kept it hydrating 3. brightens skin after several uses 3. improved my skin texture  4. it made my skin glow, anti-dullness 5. good for sensitive skin 6. treated my blackheads  6. controlled my acne condition Cons: 1. don't use it on broken skin (after you pop the pimple) 2. expensive for such a small amount

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The entire Tata Harper line was a big disappointing for me. I like the fact that itu2019s clean and all but not worth the price point

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So surprised that this works so well, my pores were visibly reduced after use. Just a slight tingle with use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! If I'm having a bad skin day, I can put this on and wake up the next day with SIGNIFICANT improvement. I knocked off 1 star because of how much product you get for the price. The first time I bought it I thought I was sent a sample size by mistake and had to get back online to double check. I was sent the correct amount, it was just so little for so much $$$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After one use I noticed a dramatic improvement in the overall look and texture of my skin. I've probably tried hundreds of masks over the years and it's rare that I'm really blown away by something, but this is the real deal. I'd recommend for anyone with large pores, combination skin, roughness, and discoloration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin glow and super smooth. This is so pricey, so I only use it to prep my skin for big events

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this and the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser as a sample. I do like the way the two work together. The mask is very light and you might even forget you have it on.  A little goes a long way. After using the mask my face feels very soft and refreshed however, I do not notice any major changes in my skin. I would not purchase a full sized because of the price. It is very similar to Fresh's Rose Face Mask (same texture and smell).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: truly gets me to baby soft skin. a little goes a LONG way so the price is well worth it. I am a convert.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a nice compliment to the resurfacing cleanser. Skin has a much nicer tone and is more smooth. The product also seems pretty gentle to my sensitive skin. Not highly scented which is nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask , gentle and really makes skin soft. Changes skins texture after just a few uses . Favorite of all my masks .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third time that I have purchased this product by TATA HARPER, and I am now a true and dedicated consumer. This mask truly leaves your skin glowing after use. I use my Clarisonic scrub brush for removal and afterwards my skin is glowing. GREAT PURCHASE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 'Instant glow' is all this gives. I've noticed no longterm benefits or differences after using the entire jar--I even did the 3 times in a row method and didn't see any improvement in my skin. It's overpriced and does not deliver.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this mask. The sample was gifted to me and so glad someone introduce me to this.  Iu2019ve always been a drugstore type of girl but I can def understand now that some pricey items like these just work in a way drugstore brands wonu2019t.  Going to be purchasing this and will be solely for special occasions lol!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I initially tried a small sample pack of this and loved it so much I immediately purchased a full sized jar. It's a really great resurfacing mask.  I could see a difference after the first use.  After 3 weeks of subsequent use, I definitely see a texture difference all around.   It's expensive, but truthfully no where near as expensive as a lot of resurfacing masks on the market. I have zero complaints, and will be purchasing again when the jar runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this mask after the first use. Unlike other peeling masks such as DE babyu2019s facial or Omoroviczau2019s copper peel, this one leaves me only moisturizing and tightening sensation without the stinging feeling. My skin feels supple and refined with every use. This is not magic but the results are definitely visible. Given the mild nature of the product, I am beyond impressed by its efficacy. The only downside is the price. 30ml is very little product considered you have to use a thick layer for each application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this for free via a Sephora code. Iu2019ve always wanted to try this product because of how hyped it was, but never wanted to spend $80+ on it. So I jumped on a free sample. Iu2019m glad I didnu2019t pay for it, and Iu2019m glad I finally tried it so I know how BAD it is for me. It did not like my skin AT ALL. Immediate results were my skin felt very soft and I enjoyed the scent. The next morning I had horrific breakouts. Itu2019s not anywhere near that time of the month and all the other skincare Iu2019ve been using are my usual go-tou2019s so it had to be this. So now Iu2019m trying to deal with the resulting breakouts. Iu2019ve been using the Clinique all over clearing treatment to spot treat the white heads and Freshu2019s Umbrian clay purifying mask as a spot treatment on the massive cystic spot I have. So far they seem to be helping. If you have very reactive skin I suggest asking for a sample to try a little bit at a time. Or just avoid it altogether.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was on the market for an exfoliating mask that did not have any physical exfoliation ingredients. I got a sample of this mask and did not want to love it because it is very pricey! However, it is incredible, like most of Tata Harperu2019s products! It is a small size for the price but I was really surprised by how little mask you need to cover your face, so I feel that the tub will last a while. When I rinse it off my face is sooooo smooth and soft. It feels hydrated, revived and glowing. I can also leave it on for the 20mins and  not worry about my sensitive skin having a bad reaction. Every time I use it my skin is happy. My previous favorite was the Summer Fridayu2019s Overtime but I prefer this since it does not have granulates or beads in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Refreshing but did not make any difference on my skin.  Also a bit pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and fell in love after first use. First: I can use this on my sensitive skin. Second: thereu2019s no tightness after using it. My face just feels softer and younger looking. My usually large pores look so much smaller! It goes on like jelly (but itu2019s not sticky), and is easy to apply and wash off. The smell is pleasant too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say that Tata Harpers entire line is life changing, but I just canu2019t afford it. The one thing I will splurge on without a doubt is this mask. It makes my skin glow, evens out my texture, and doesnu2019t dry me out. Its the only mask Iu2019ve tried that I see instant results with and actually believe in. Itu2019s truly amazing. I cannot recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. That feeling you get after you wash it off is unbelievable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely!! Makes skin feel so smooth. Resurfacing Serum is amazing too!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t realize how small the jar was until I received it... with a price tag of $78, itu2019s just not with it, especially since it didnu2019t do what it says it will do. The product does smell great and is gentle, it didnu2019t harm my skin it just didnu2019t do what it claims to do. There are way cheaper alternatives that do work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this product as part of a set.  Itu2019s fantastic for making my skin feel smoother, brighter, and clearer!  I love the way my skin glows after I use it!  Iu2019ve had problematic combination skin.  My T-zone would get dry yet be very oily and my cheeks would be very dry.  I would have to multi-mask when I did masks at home.  That got a little annoying. This product however, is one I can use on my whole face!  I donu2019t have acne but do have pimples that pop up in my T-zone.  This has helped even out my skin and I couldnu2019t be happier!  I really love this mask and highly recommend it!  I have sensitive skin, and this does not irritate it at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this and thought I would because I love all the other tata Harper products Iu2019ve dried but this was such a lackluster experience. Plus itu2019s expensive. Definitely feel like Iu2019ve had better, natural masks. It didnu2019t make me break out though which says a lot, so maybe it just didnu2019t jive with my skin to seem that noteworthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not really sure how this has so many good reviews, over priced and over rated , this product absolutely does nothing

reviews.review_title: Favorite all around mask for glow and pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: SO worth every penny! This mask after the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser makes my skins so smooth. The combination of the cleanser daily and the mask a 2-3 times a week for my oily, extra large pores/t-zone and dry cheeks and redness has been my favorite for the better part of the last year. I have been trying to get breakouts under control and I thought starting with pores in my t-zone would be the best and this mask works. Even if I don't use the cleanser as often as I would like, it still works wonders. I rarely need to use pore strips anymore and when I do, the extractions are tiny. The only complaint I might have is that it is a 30 minute mask vs 10-15 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this mask for years and it's amazing for resurfacing the skin and eliminating congestion. I love the way it dries down and can notice a visible difference when I wash it off.

reviews.review_title: Try AHA PEELING FROM TO, & Alpha Lipoic Acid $ave!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It says resurfacing....after using 2 sample jars as directed...my face did NOT look like it was glowing it looked like I had a skin burn, not sunburnt just an artificial looking redness. My husband asked what was wrong with my skin, did I put a bad self tanner on, and I NEVER tan. I donu2019t know what I thought to expect...at best soft supple skin like most masks do, Iu2019ve used AHA/BHA MASKS before, and also Alpha Lipoic Acid from TO which IS FAR SUPERIOR for a fraction of the price....thatu2019s the type of just came from a spa glow that your looking for! Not re-coloring the tone of my skin.  Completely turned OFF- it makes me wonder if ALLURES winners are rigged...):

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the texture, smell and experience of this mask are all very pleasant. I really wanted to love this product since it's a cult favorite, and the whole Tata Harper line is appealing. And maybe I would have liked the mask better if my skincare products were different. But I just didn't see any results that I don't already experience from using my regular exfoliant and a product with AHA's in them. I was waiting for the infamous glow from this product to emerge and it just didn't. Also, I know this isn't a hydrating mask, but my late 30's semi-dry skin was left feeling a bit tight after using it, just further driving home the point that this mask is not a necessity for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: literally would use this every night if i had the money, SO GOOD

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What an all around great product! My face feels soft and glowy, soft, and fresh after using this. The smell is a bit strong at first, but it was easy to get used to it, and now I actually like it! I love that Tata Harper products are cruelty free. The only thing that keeps this from getting 5 stars is the price. The cost is a bit prohibitive, especially given the size of the container. Despite this, I probably will purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite mask. I have combination skin and normally just use clay masks, but I got a sample of this and am addicted! It removed any dead skin, helped diminish problem spots, and left my skin feeling new! It was so refreshing and easy to wash off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MY HOLY GRAIL! AMAZING mask for texture, clogged pores, dullness. BHAs (willow bark and meadowsweet) removes dead skin and unclogs pores. Pomegranate enzymes also for exfoliation. Cleared my skin of texture, gave me a fresh awakened radiant look. I love BHAs for exfoliation! they get deep down into the pore and have anti-inflammatory properties as well. PRICEY for a mask, 1 oz jar for $62. But my FAVORITE mask of all time.   I love the Tata Harper brand for their philosophies and natural ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Did amazing things for skin around eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this about 2 years ago, when i received a sample. I didn't read the directions for it (maybe I couldn't find my glasses?)-- I thought it was an eye mask. So my use, originally was limited to the area around my eyes. And WOW! I could see incredible improvement in the appearance of my skin, it looked definitely younger and more radiant. I actually had people tell me i was glowing, looking like i was feeling great.  When I went to get more of this, i discovered it was intended for my whole face! Anyway, It's a definite go-to if you want to look like you've been away at a spa.

reviews.review_title: Basically a brightening facelift in a jar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This really does give you instant results. The smell in the jar is a little off putting but it doesnu2019t linger on the face and the results outweigh and scent cons!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this mask and it was all downhill from there. Itu2019s amazing. Clear (so you donu2019t look like a crazy person if someone sees you) - softens, tightens. Makes me feel great. Once a week luxury!
No notable difference after 5 uses. I bought this based on the reviews, unfortunately it has done nothing for me. Not worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been masking and trying different skincare for years and I can say if any mask is worth the hype itu2019s this one. A little bit goes a long way with this mask and after a few weeks of use I have seen a huge difference in the texture, evenness, and overall quality of my skin! It doesnu2019t just make your skin feel u201cniceu201d it really takes your skincare to the next level.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have noticed a huge difference in my skin since using this. Now that I'm in my 30s, my pores are getting larger and my skin is losing it's glow. This product is bringing it back and quite honestly, making it look better than it did 10 years ago!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does very well with keeping cystic acne at bay when used the night before.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I had hoped
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best Resurfacing Mask , I was looking forward to an instant glow but that never happened. I am on my fifth try with the mask, the positive part is that my pores look smaller and my skin is more even toned but I am not sure if it because of the mask or the other products that I wear.  I also find that it dries my skin out a bit and makes it feel very tight... I really wanted to love it but it underwhelmed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I looove this product.  Great for an instant glow and leaves the skin smooth and supple.  I have sensitive/reactive skin and have no issues with this product.  My new fav!!

reviews.review_title: Read about it and had to try it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product.  I read about it and had to try it.  I did what I read and used it 3 nights in a row to start, now I use once a week.  I saw a difference in my skin after the first night.  It is a little pricey, but so worth it for how your skin will look.  It also makes your skin incredibly soft.  This will be a staple in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a huge fan of any skin that utilizes all natural ingredients and essential oils.  This mask is no joke.  I have a pretty high tolerance for peels and resurfacing products, and boy could I feel this one.  After my first use, my skin was tight, bright and super soft and smooth.  I don't know if I would recommend this to someone with super sensitive skin, because it is strong! Totally worth the money.

reviews.review_title: Saved my skin from oil cleansing method breakout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail! So long story short I tried oil cleansing method and it broke me out so terribly! The infection would spread from my chin up, it was painful and inflamed, and skin was very bumpy and irritated. I could not hide it under makeup at all. I tried Farmacy, Philosophy, Caudalie aha/bha products - nothing helped. Then I read the reviews for this mask, I already had it but before I applied it for 20 mins only and didnu2019t see any results. Some reviews suggested leaving it overnight on affected areas. I did this every night for a week and completely got read of the infection. Of course, since the mask contains acids, youu2019ll get dry skin, you are basically burning skin with acid, and youu2019ll have to take extra care of it, it might not work for you if you have super sensitive skin but it literally saved me! I donu2019t know how bad it would be if I didnu2019t start applying it every night, and Iu2019m so grateful for this product and for all kind people leaving reviews for products and telling about their experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing. I have had a mini jar (deluxe sample) for a while but only recently started using it. I have combo skin (oily t-zone, dry cheeks with redness) and this mask leaves my skin so soft and clear. I have also been using Sunday Riley's Good Genes and Luna sleeping oil the last two weeks and have used this mask twice now and my skin is definitely improved. It's expensive but I am definitely going to buy the full size when my sample jar runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally IN LOVE with this resurfacing mask. My skin doesnu2019t have the smoothest surface from acne damage during my high school days, but I do notice after I use this product it does appear to give my face a smooth look. It also does help minimize breakouts.  I have combination skinu2014oily on my T-zone and dry on the cheeks.  It does have a super drying effect of the mask during treatment; however, AFTERWARDS I do notice a hydrating effect on my cheeks and a less oily T-zoneu2014especially more so in the morning. I usually buy the value package deal bc alone this product is a little on the pricey side. However with this last purchase I just went ahead and got the jar only bc I love this product the best out of the Tata Harper line. I use this product roughly every other day, so roughly 2-3 times a week depending on what my skin needs. Use at night before bed for best results! Seriously try at least a sample next time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a deluxe sample, and I used the entire little jar in a couple of uses. It was a really nice mask. A little bit of jelly went a long way. It tightened and dried up quickly. The more I used it, the more I saw my dull winter skin start to look smoother and more refreshed.  I cleansed, exfoliated, and then applied this. Folded laundry or did other tasks before bed and washed it off and completed my routine. I would recommend this mask and buy a full size of it!  Thereu2019s no overpowering smell or redness. Great product overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 1fl oz. lasted me a year when using this before an event or when I wanted a special glow. Honestly, no mainstream face masks can compare to this. It's definitely worth the price, due to the fact that once the mask is off your face has a natural glow and illuminates the face. Will definitely be buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't see any difference to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This seems to be the go to mask for all skin issues. Every time Iu2019m having breakouts, texture, or dry patches, I use this and boom! All clear the next day. Itu2019s like a reset for the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels soothing on with no burning or tingling.  Leaves my skin looking tighter with smaller pores & a nice glow.  It also seems to even out my skintone.  The results are immediate.  I got this as a Reward & love it.  Will probably buy the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: $62 for this tiny thing?!  I know I should try it because it received such amazing reviews but that is way too much money for a product that small, especially when the directions say to u201capply a thick layer over face and necku201d.  If I applied a thick layer, the product would be gone in 3 uses!  All other masks I have (some more expensive like tatcha) give you at least 1.7oz.  Iu2019m obsessed with skincare and spend way too much money, and I really love the all natural thing, but there definitely isnu2019t enough product to justify the cost unless itu2019s fricken magic!  I could totally be judging a book by its cover, and maybe one day when Iu2019m rich Iu2019ll try it, but for now itu2019s going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in the morning. I use this at night.  It isnu2019t too harsh. It treats my skin just right.   It exfoliates like a champ. It smooths and evens my skin-tone. My skin is beautifully revamped. And my most favorite skin magically becomes the one I own. :)  The end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry, sensitive skin, that is prone to breakouts.  I love this stuff.  I got it in a sample size and I can't afford the full size so I use it once a month.  I see a difference on my face for a full week after using this product.  I can't wait to buy the full size.  I LOVE this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: brightens and gives an instant glow. Also very pretty pink colour, pleasant smelling. A favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore absolument tout de ce masque mis u00e0 part sa senteur qui n'est franchement pas exceptionnelle. En mettant cela de cu00f4tu00e9, les ru00e9sultats sont assez incroyables laissant la peau lumineuse avec une texture des plus agru00e9able.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give it more stars. I donu2019t know whatu2019s in this but my skin loves it. I have tried to find cheaper alternatives but nothing comes close. Want glowy radiant skin, use it. Have a breakout put some on it overnight and let it work itu2019s magic. It just makes your skin happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I was shocked at how small this jar is (1 oz) for the cost. It looks like a trail size version. Apparently, I should of looked at how much I was getting before I purchased. It works well, I like how it gives you a glow after using but it's not worth the cost vs. amount. I'm kicking myself for not paying better attention.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this stuff is so good!! It is kind of expensive but a little goes a long way. I was looking for a good mask this winter that didnu2019t dry me out and this one was perfect. My face glows after and feels so smooth. Definitely will be restocking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really enjoying this mask! I have dry and sensitive skin, and I exfoliate daily at night with a BHA solution. I felt like my skin needed something a little extra once a week, to get rid of any flakiness and dry patches. I was worried that the DE and Kate Somerville resurfacing products would be too harsh for me, so I decided to give Tata Harper a try, since it's all-natural. I am so impressed with the results. The mask definitely exfoliates without leaving my skin red and angry. It takes some practice to get the thickness right - I usually slather it all over and then build up the product in areas that need extra help. I would definitely use a brush for application, because I found it difficult to grab the product with my finger. The smell is also lovely without being overpowering!

reviews.review_title: give it a try and renew your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a fan of Valmont prime renewing pack, but Tata Harperu2019s resurfacing mask works THE SAME on my skin and the price is amazing! It came to me in a Sephora set: beauty unmasked, and I use it without thinking too much. Right now, while writing this comment, I am now seriously regretting spending $$$$$ on Valmont, I should have tried it much earlier. I respect both brands but would definitely switch to Tata because I can achieve the same result with paying less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask. I do tend to use a fairly thick layer of the product, because otherwise it doesn't seem as effective for me. But I love the immediate rescue effect it has when my skin is flaky, broken out, clogged, or dull.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper products are simply made for me.  I wish it wasn't true, I do not have money to spend, but after sampling some of these products I decided to stop trying low cost skincare and just stick to a few basic products; this is one of them along with the Resurfacing Serum.   My skin normal with the exception of the area right around my nose, here I have rosacea. You know, the normal place it shows up, inner cheek area?  I can't use any BHA, just inflames my skin in this area. I apply this all over the face except right on my rosacea and the result is truly unbelievable.  I can't believe this is my skin, it is so smooth!  I do have melasma spots and there are still there, but after foundation my skin is almost flawless which is not the norm for me.   Sorry this is such a long review, but there is so much to say about this mask.  It's what I hoped to find in so many products that never delivered.  The hype is real on this one and I couldn't be more surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is the best, it makes my skin feel as smooth as a babyu2019s butt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect, spa at home. Fall in love with it right away. Targeted for all other masks they have for oil skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't notice much difference after I used it. My skin was maybe a little smoother, but not enough that it really wowed me. I find that there many other masks that make a much bigger difference and longer lasting effects. Not sure why this is hyped. For me this mask is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh so amazing !!!! Its the best mask ull ever use. Instant skin tightening and the smoothness from day 1!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this as one of the reviews suggested...a thin layer overnight,3 times a week. The difference is noticeable. I get occasional breakouts and have some skin congestion, and it really clears it up. I'm a product junky and have tried tens of brands and products and this is the most success I've had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mask worked ok. However Tata want you to gloop it on thick but the container is soo small it ends up being terribly expensive being only 1 oz jar. Will not be buying again unless they at least double the bottle size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes skin super clear and bright. Leaves skin soft and plump. I love using it mid-week to get a boost. And I use the herbivore mask on weekends. AMAZING SKIN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask truly transforms your face. I bought this mask due to a reaction I had all over my forehead from a new primer hoping it would help. This mask not only cleared up my forehead within 2 uses but itu2019s brightened up my entire complexion. Listen, every time I break out my skin decides to scar for what feels like months but after using this for 3 days straight theyu2019re almost undetectable. Iu2019m not over exaggerating Iu2019ve never seen my skin look so beautiful. This mask is in fact pricy but the results make it so worth it. I will continue to purchase this mask over and over. Its magic! If youu2019re questioning buying this mask, donu2019t! But it. Youu2019ll be amazed and extremely happy with the results. Beautiful skin is what we all want and with this mask beautiful skin is what youu2019ll have.

reviews.review_title: Feels lovely and true to its name
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my skin felt resurfaced just like the name suggests. Feels gentle. it's clear so you can't tell you're wearing a mask so you don't look strange while wearing it. Doesn't give that ttight mask feel. I really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this little gem while on the hunt for pregnancy-safe face masks. I know this is very pricey for the amount of product you get, but I swear it works wonders. I only use it once a week to make this tiny jar last me a couple months. My skin is always refreshed, brightened, and feels extra soft after every use. Super effective! I also love how it smells!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiny jar like an eye cream size for a mask not acceptable. Mask is good   .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, I LOVE this mask. I just wish it was more affordable!! My skin is super dry but not particularly sensitive. When I use this mask I see an INSTANT difference. My skin looks so much brighter and smoother-- like that post-facial glow in 20 mins! I am hooked for life!

reviews.review_title: lose no hope for tata harper is here !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YOU GUYS. this mask is everything... just found out that it   works even better when you wear a thin layer overnight! I wake up with glowy-pore refined-skin. I had a couple of breakouts and by cleansing, extracting black heads/ white heads with a metal extractor, toning, and then applying a thin layer of this overnight my skin has transformed totally! I have a good amount of hyperpigmentation too and this has totally lightened those spots as well. I usually don't review products (in fact this is my first) but I need all my troubled skinned peeps to try this <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is EVERYTHING. It leaves my skin soft and glowing. I like using this when I have acne that wonu2019t go away it really helps clearing out my pores and leaving my skin nice and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works GREAT! I actually stayed away from Tata Harper products because of a certain blonde actress/celebrity influencer, of whom I am not particularly fond, was promoting the brand on her website. Fast forward to two weeks ago. I was at Sephora and it was being promoted with their boutique brands or emerging beauty brands or something like that. My face (combination skin) was feeling congested and based on the description (and, not gonna lie, scent) I decided to try it out. I began using as directed several times a week and noticed a change in my skin within the first week. It was smoother, seemed more even and the few small bumps I had on my face disappeared. I am in love. I use another brand of serum and night transformation gel and the three seem to work beautifully together... though based on my experience with the Tata Harper resurfacing mask, I'll definitely be trying more of this brand's products. Despite being associated with that influencer ;) Well done and thank you for making such a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin looks and feels after using this product. I have to be really careful when exfoliating my skin and this product does not irritate my skin. Its also an efficient product because you don't have to leave it on too long to see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my very first review ever. I had to write one for this because this resurfacing mask has done me wonders. Every time I use it, my skin looks radiant. Since I have dry skin, the dead skin cells are removed and I donu2019t get acne anymore. Definitely recommend it for those who have dry skin that causes you to have acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive but always worth it. If Iu2019ve had a bad skin day or even WEEK, when I use this mask my face always glows afterward and there is always a noticeable difference. The best results are when used as the box suggests, which is pretty often but worth it for a reliable glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used this, I kept in on for only 20 minutes and didnu2019t really like it. The following week I used it for 3 consecutive days, an hour each and boy what a difference. My skin looked brighter and pores were minimized. Now Iu2019m hooked. I donu2019t like the smell but the results are worth putting up with it. I will definitely be repurchasing this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Crazy expensive for a small amount of product. I originally received a sample of this, but I keep coming back for more because it's amazing how quickly it works and how effective it is.  Instant glow is actually true. I'm a skincare product junkie and not particularly loyal because there is always something new to try.  I will keep buying this resurfacing mask though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and wasnu2019t much of a fan. It claims to create an instant glow but it was very subtle. It could have been because I didnu2019t apply a thick layer as instructed but I just wasnu2019t a fan of it. I donu2019t think I care enough to try the remaining of the product that I had left from my sample. I also didnu2019t see much hydration but like I said, it couldu2019ve been because of the amount I applied. I was very excited to try this, but unfortunately this is a pass for me. (I have normalu2014combo skin depending on the season). It wasnu2019t sticky and I didnu2019t feel like it clogged my pores thoughu2014 so thatu2019s a win. Still a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The mask has a natural strong scent. Course granules and easy to apply to the skin. Tingles a bit, no burning sensation though. Rinses off without excessive rubbing. A great biweekly mask for texture concerns.

reviews.review_title: Fades acne scars and evens texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample first and immediately noticed my acne scars starting to fade and my uneven skin texture becoming even! Definitely worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask it makes a dramatic difference to skin tone and texture. The only problem is the packaging. Air exposure dramatically reduces potency... for example you will notice this if you ever use a sample packet of Tata Harper resurface serum or mask it is more effective than the full size because it was sealed fresh. Put this in a container like the Drunk elephant product and you have the perfect mask...I think Tata can afford to improve the packaging...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so gentle on the skin and gives you a nice glow and refreshed sensation! My only complaint is the price for the actual amount you get. If my skin loves it, I will keep repurchasing though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice mask that made my skin feel very smooth afterword. It's kind of pricey but fortunately a little goes a long way in covering the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this mask in a foil packet enough for me to use two days in a row.  I could feel my face tighten as the mask dried and I will tell you that for two days my face did have a pretty radiant glow to it and my face looked a little refreshed and the fine smile lines we less noticeable.  Overall I do like the mask and have been looking for a new one as my normal weekly mask but price point is pretty high for the amount that you get some going to think about it.  I took off one star for the price but if you can afford it I would recommend getting this product to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this mask and wasnu2019t expecting much out of it. Iu2019ve been having issues lately with too much texture on my skin. After that first use I had to buy the full size. My skin hasnu2019t felt this smooth or soft in years. I wish I didnu2019t love it because it is expensive for the amount you get, but the results are worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I got this as a sample and now I must add it to my skin care routine. My skin is so soft and radiant after one time use.

reviews.review_title: Left red spots all over my face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO This mask was the best mask ever, and honestly I got it in the trial size and then considered buying the full size I used it in the early afternoon and I LOVE how it felt while it was drying. You could feel a cool effect and when I washed it off my face looked flawless all day and night. HOWEVER the next morning I woke up with a bunch of red dots on my face. This had me looking like I had chicken pox. Overall this mask is really great and my friend had zero problems using it, so maybe I am just allergic to one of the ingredients. Even with the red dots on my face, my blackheads were significantly reduced after the one use and my skin felt amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super goopy thick jelly that dries to a thin tight peel.  Didn't notice any difference after one use.  Meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Got it as a sample and bought the full size. It makes your skin feel so soft. One thing I have noticed is that every time I use it, but skin feels less dramatically soft, but I think it is because it has improved the quality of my skin so much that thereu2019s just not as much to exfoliate. It is pricy but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really awesome, made my skin so soft and smooth after just one use and it made my skin look glowy and really pretty. definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There was definitely an improvement in my skin's texture. downside: the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: doesnu2019t do anything for me ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks 'resurfaced' after using this mask!  I wish I could use it daily, I love it that much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it.  First experience was a facial at Banff Springs Hotel. So I bought some there and now I am glad it is at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the past year I've been playing with different masks at Sephora. The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask has been the only one to have an impact on my skin. I use this once a week and consistently notice an improvement in the texture, softness and overall glow of my skin each time I apply it. It lasts a long time and is worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this mask and I am hooked!  When I use it, I see instant results.  I have a little hyper pigmentation from occasional acne, but I feel like this mask lightens the discoloration each week that I use it.  The texture of my skin is becoming more even toned- this is hands down my favorite mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the ingredients. Love everything the brand stands for. Skin does glow. I want to use it every day, but now when i do itu2019s a treat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask so much after receiving a sample. So I splurged and bought this and the cleanser after reading you can combine the two for a quick mask. Uh, no. My skin is combo/oily and Iu2019ve never experienced dry skin let alone dry, rough patches in my life. So I still give it 4 stars because I love this mask by itself but I wonu2019t be mixing both the mask and cleanser as Sephora suggests as a tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It hydrated my skin after one use but for the price and considering it didn't do anything spectacular I don't see the need for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t get the hype with this??? It ruined my skin after one use!!! It left my skin bumpy and caused micro comedones. I cannot get rid of them now. Yes it left the skin soft but thatu2019s it. Itu2019s drying as well. I love her Clarifying moisturizer but this mask didnu2019t cut it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but this is my favorite mask and I recommend it to everyone! I use it 1x per week and only need a thin layer and the jar lasts about six months - yes it's pricey but so worth it. This helps keep my hormonal acne under control, and makes my face look bright and clear every time I use it. I also use it as an overnight spot treatment when needed and it works wonders. I use the Tata Clarifying Mask 1x per week as well and the two work so well together.

reviews.review_title: Worth the Hype and the Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say I'm a HUGE fan of Tata, I just can never afford her products. This mask is an exception and splurge I choose to make regardless, however, because it's that good. My sister (who works at Sephora as a skincare expert) gave me a sample of this for my dry, dull skin. This mask left my skin so baby soft and with a healthy, incredible glow even after the first use! I'm so obsessed with how it makes my skin look and feel, I tell everyone about this mask regardless of skin type because I think it would boost anyone's radiance. Buy it, buy it buy it - that's all I can say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive but wow. I had a sample and put this on my skin after a tough day. Had it on for two hours. Washed it off and did my usual nighttime face routine. Woke up in the morning and my face was glowing, brighter, and clearer. I had to do a double take because I could not believe what I was seeing. I wonder what my skin would look like if I actually have used this three days straight as instructed. Definitely, on my list of things to purchase next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my experience with this mask has been underwhelming,  it is a nice mask,but overpriced. It leaves skin feeling soft and glowy, but haven't notice any improvement in overall appearance and radiance of skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask after years of tanning I never realized how it had made my face rough to the touch. I used this and may I say you need very little and it is a game changer. I love how smooth my face feels I use it once a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am able to use this product without any inflammation afterwards but with reduced blemishes and dry patches. It is a very gentle resurfacing product and since it is a mask there is less wear time (compared to an overnight  serum). I find that some resurfacing products cause an initial breakout before results but I did not experience that with this mask. I have used two travel sizes and plan on purchasing the full size. A little goes a long way so it is worth the price. I love how it smells as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 30 years old struggling with pregnancy acne, dullness/uneven skin tone. This product goes on smoothly, and makes my skin feel so soft afterwards. I only gave it 4 stars because its not a miracle worker

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love me some masks, and this has to be my favorite for immediate results (immediately following the 30 minutes youu2019ve spent with the mask on, that is). It simultaneously softens and firms my aging finicky skin, and gives it a nice radiance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have mature combo skin.  In general my skin, though sensitive, has responded well to AHAs.  This is well worth the price.  I use it once a week and it seems to get rid of the texture on my skin. A little goes a long way, so the jar will last a long time.  I like this as much as the Ren mask and much more than the Herbivore Blue Tansy or the PTR Pumpkin one, both of which stung and broke me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't believe my skin when I use this product!! It really does what it says and at first I balked at the price, but a little goes a long way and it really takes off the patchy, dry dead skin flakes common with a retinal product. Love it!
I love to use this after I cleanse my skin. I give myself a good massage and let this sit and do its magic. It is amazing along with Tatas elixir vital line . Glad Sephora carries this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a mask. I didn't notice anything special about it, but it didn't harm my skin either. I like the smell. It has a gel-like consistency which is kinda weird when you're applying it. it tightens your skin when it dries, but again, I didn't see a huge difference after few uses. I am not going to purchase a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so, here's the thing; this is an expensive mask. I'm paying close to $2 per 1 mL. I don't mind spending the money, but I want to see results. I've been using this twice a week for almost 2 months. Yes, my skin is softer and hydrated after I use it but I can get that same result from a number of different masks and at a MUCH better price. I was honestly looking for for MORE, I was expecting to see some difference in my uneven skin tone and pores but I didn't. I am extremely disappointed in this purchase. I am not expecting an overnight miracle after one mask treatment, but I feel like I've given this product the same trial time amount as I do any other product that incorporate into my skin routine. Definitely not for me and will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works great for those stubborn large forehead pores!! Makes my skin over all look very smooth!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask did nothing for my skin. Didnu2019t add any moisture, brightness, or make my skin even - nada. If anything, it made my pores larger.

reviews.review_title: Won't regret! Little glow in a bottle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this after a sephora employee gave me a sample! This is an AMAZING product! Gives your skin glow, radiance, tightness. Whenever I need a little glow from a long day, I just use this to revive my skin and reapply makeup. It's def. worth the price and goes a long~ way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of this product and fell in love the first time I used this. Using 1-2 times a week for the last 4 weeks I have seen a noticeable difference. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. I love what it does for my mature skin. My skin texture is gorgeous now. Thank you Tata!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first received this mask from Tata at an event, and have found it to consistently improve the quality of my skin after use.  It is refreshing, not abrasive or too strong, is all-natural, and really does leave one with a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sleep in this mask, sometimes Iu2019ll put a moisturizer over it.  In the morning my face feels like silk, and I get very textured skin.  This stuff is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. A bit pricier than I'd like, but nothing beats the insta-glow I see right after I wash the mask off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a skeptical about products sometimes, but this truly works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely amazing product. I go to bed wearing this and wake up with absolutely fresh, glowing skin. It is the best thing I have ever tried for acne scars. I have done so many peels and used so many products but this is the best and it's natural. I do keep it on longer than the recommended time but I'm trying to get my moneys worth and it works very well. I cannot recommend this product any more. Nothing I have tried has helped shrink my pores as well as this product either. When my skin is dry I mix this with Fresh's Rose hydrating mask because this isn't hydrating. Many products make me break out but this has not and I would say has helped my acne. I have gone through 1 full sized bottle already and am on my second, my skin has been so much better since using.

Meilleur achat u00e0 vie ! J'ai reu00e7ut en premier lieu un u00e9chantillon et j'ai adoru00e9! Je l'applique sous forme de masque et sur les petits boutons. Ce masque a fait diminuer considu00e9rablement mes imperfections tel que mes points noirs et mes petits boutons de grossesse. Ma peau est devenu automatique Glowy et pas besoin de beaucoup de produit. Un peu cher pour un format de 30ml mais je peux plus m'en passu00e9. C'est un essentielle, il est comparable au Blue Tansy de Herbivore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had higher hopes for this product. It didnu2019t really work for me and I didnu2019t feel like my face had any significant difference after applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask religiously for the past year. It truly is better than most masks (and I'm a maskoholic). It's natural, it's good for sensitive skin, and you really notice a difference after one use. Much easier on the skin than tata's clarifying mask. This is my favorite mask ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has received a lot of hype, but it is well deserved. It leaves your skin glowing, refreshed and youthful. You can feel it tightening your skin as it dries, but when you wash it off, skin feels soft. Oh, and your pores are smaller/non-existent and all those little lines are magically diminished. (Did I bury the lead there?) I use this mask every week. The more regularly you use it, the better the results. I actually adore almost everything I have tried from Tata Harper. Their products are completely luxurious feeling, do what they promise, and are 100% natural with no questionable chemicals. To say Iu2019m a big fan would be an understatement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product, it makes my skin so soft and glowing once I wash it away. it removes texture and I my pores are noticeably smaller. Definitely will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best mask I own. I always automatically see a difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and really liked it. It made my face feel really smooth. Resurfaced. However, I can't bring myself to buy this due to the small amount you get for the price and how much you have to put on. I'm usually not that price conscious, but the pricing of this just does not make sense to me.
