reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt nice going on, but it did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not quite sure there is anything that I liked about this. I guess my skin felt SLIGHTLY more smooth but nothing to write home about. I definitely looked more dull, what? And the smell... No thanks. It didnu2019t linger the 20 minutes I had this on but still, not for me. Hard pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my face feel fresh but it smells so bad

reviews.review_title: I even bought a jar for my best friend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask in the small trial size or maybe got it with my points can't remember.  What I do remember is that I used it up really quickly and bought more.  I even bought some for my best friend and she loves it.  I just turned 50 yrs old and I really like the way this makes my skin feel after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best mask on the market. Itu2019s a literal miracle worker. I try to use it sparingly because of the price, but it makes my skin feel so good that I never succeed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have extremely dry, breakout prone, sensitive skin. This is my favorite mask, I notice an immediate difference in the texture of my skin after using. It really does provide an instant glow to the dull texture of my skin. I also notice a difference in my makeup application the day after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harperu2019s resurfacing mask saved my skin. Got a deluxe sample of it and have continued to purchase the full size product. I make sure to use it two days in a row, once a week. It clears up all breakouts (forming and current) as well as had made a noticeable difference on old acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mask. Before using this product, I had never often experienced with masks so this is really the first mask I use regularly. It leaves my skin feeling so soft (and GLOWING) and slightly reduces the appearance of my pores. I highly recommend this product for first time mask users and anyone who needs a little lift/glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this magic jelly. After a long bout of sickness I needed a miracle to get my skin back on track. The first week I used it 3 times. I now use it once a week to remain bright, soft and flake free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This honestly ruined my skin. It made my skin texture SO BAD. I was hoping it would help with the texture since it's resurfacing, but it made it so much worse. I followed the instructions exactly. The positive thing though is that it didn't have an offensive smell or burning feeling like other resurfacing masks I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to give this product one star, 58 dollars for 1 ounce of product??? I would buy this on a regular basis if it came with twice as much product. I gave this mask a 2 star rating because it actually works.

reviews.review_title: Sheet masks are fun but this is better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only downside to this amazing mask is that it's not a fun sheet mask. It's natural, non-irritating, and leaves your skin feeling refreshed. My naturopath actually recommended it for hormonal acne and using it once a week has been helpful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tata products, but this one was too drying for my skin. Perhaps if I tried it in the dead of summer instead of winter, it might go better, but it didn't wow me and was a tad too drying.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use  for mask beginners!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No wonder why this is out of stock!  It is on my top lists of masks! One for ease, you just spread it on your face and neck and I use a warm washcloth to remove it after 20 minutes. When I wake up the next morning my skin is bright and so soft that I only use my micellar water to cleanse my face on those days! I highly recommend this mask and I'm not one to write reviews unless I really love a product!!!

My skin felt a bit tighter and I did notice if I used this when I had breakouts it would help make them disappear a bit faster. overall, I was disappointed with the product as it did not live up to the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Makes your skin super nice!

reviews.review_title: smooth, glowy in 15-20 minutes! not bad

reviews.review_text: Was not convinced initially when putting this mask on. It dries quite taut and looks pretty bad when its drying. However my face felt smooth and glowy after i washed it off. I would use it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample of this either as a reward or maybe a beauty offer. I was a little wary of trying it because I do have sensitive skin, especially on one side of my face around my cheeks. In fact, that part of my face broke out pretty badly and the texture in that area flared up noticeably after I tried a Murad moisturizer. After the skin anger died down, I decided to try this product and I really really like it! I used it once to make sure it didnu2019t irritate my skin, then did it twice the next week, and once the following week, and it totally cleared up my skin irritation and smoothed everything out. The deluxe sample is a great size too - Iu2019ve only gone through about half of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! Iu2019ve never used a mask before, so bare that in mind. My skin was smooth, soft and moist. And taking the time to sit and relish the mask was a treat. Check the ingredients - this was allergen free for me.

reviews.review_title: Makes your skin so soft and glowy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing! I use it once a week and always before any special occasions. I have oily, acne-prone skin and this doesn't irritate me. I usually use my Origins Out of Trouble mask or the Charcoal mask, then apply this afterwards for 30 mins and follow this with the Fresh Rose face mask. The process leaves my skin so soft, radiant and glowy. My skin looks amazing. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this using my points, so it was a small sample. I still got a couple uses out of it, but it didnu2019t do anything for me. I noticed absolutely no change in my skin. I donu2019t think Iu2019ll purchase a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product !! My skin was transformed instantly after the first use. My skin was glowing ! My makeup looked ten times better and I got so many compliments!! This product is worth every dime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty sensitive skin and this broke me out really badly. I tried it multiple times over the course of a month and each time it broke me out.

reviews.review_title: very gentle, maybe too gentle for normal skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For people who have very sensitive skin, this thing is like heaven. But for people who have normal skin, i think it is too gentle. Especially given the high price, there are so many products that are more efficient in any sense and won't come in a cheap, cheap jar that can't keep the ingredients stable after opening. I only recommend this to people with super sensitive skin but want to do a bit risky facial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This truly works. I use masks regularly, lightly exfoliate daily, and get a chemical peel every 6 weeks.  Even with all that, every time I use this mask I get noticeable results - baby soft skin, smaller pores, and even texture. When I first used it and followEd the directions to use for three days straight, I got some irritated redness on my upper cheek and some pimples came to the surface but all that quickly disappeared and my skin has been great since and am using this every 4 or 5 days. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s fine... has a nice tingle.  Smells identical to barbecue sauce which is sort of good and sort of disgusting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down best mask I've ever tried. 100% worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is flawless. It creates the most beautiful texture and pore-less finish for your skin. Smells great, feels great. Havenu2019t found anything else like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this before my makeup makes me pore free and glowing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This single mask replaced every peel and exfoliator Iufe0f own. My skin is transformed and Iufe0f now have the perfect skin Iu2019ve been dreaming of all because of this mask. This mask is exfoliating, clarifying, and brightening. My dry skin and enlarged pores are a thing of the past. Tata Harper girl you betta werk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a must-do in my beauty routine before an event or if my skin just needs a bit more pampering. It really makes my skin glow as soon as I remove it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whenever Iu2019m having any skin issues, this product is my go-to. I truly believe this can solve anything!

reviews.review_title: Did nothing for me, get a sample of this before yo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this, I had gone on a swap website and Guy the mini quarter ounce size to try and was excited to try it because of all the great reviews on here. I followed the instructions from the manufacturer's website and slept with the mask on I did wake up to have a glow but as soon as I washed my face the glow went away with it and my skin actually looked more dull than it had before. I'm not impressed with this and it will be regifted or swapped to someone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got about four sample sizes when this became a points reward, which lasted me approx. five uses. I followed the brands suggestion of using it three nights in a row, and then again once every few days. Honestly I think this is a fantastic product, my skin, which had been starting to break out with the change of the seasons and drier weather, cleared up almost overnight. I donu2019t have a single blemish currently, which is amazing for my sensitive and slightly acne prone skin. However, I just canu2019t get past the price/product ratio; 58$ for 1oz. is just not sustainable for me. Will probably wait to buy until Iu2019m suffering a major breakout again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample 5 weeks after my second daughter was born. With a newborn and a toddler, my complexion has seriously suffered. My skin was just so dull and rough. I couldn't seem to clear it up no matter how much I scrubbed trying to exfoliate. I decided to give this mask a try one evening during my toddler's bathtime. What a massive difference! The dullness was gone and my skin was so smooth and bright. I'm back to buy a full size. I don't usually bother with masks as the ones I've tried before are uncomfortable while they're on and a pain to remove completely. This one is very light and comfortable and wiped off easily. Plus didn't cause any problems for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo in love with this!! It is my go to now if my skin is having any problems at all, it instantly gets it back to normal. I love how easily it goes on, not messy at all. It is also great to do before a full face of makeup, evens out my skin leaving it glowing! It is a bit pricey but well worth it for what you are getting and the amazing ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle enough that it keeps irritation at bay but effective enough to see results. I use a thick layer and leave it on for 15 minutes then slather Drunk Elephant's lala retro cream and finish with argan oil. My skin is left looking vibrant, smooth and healthy. Good stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On the fence on this one. It did make some areas of my skin more glowy, but it also dried out my skin like crazy in other areas and was quite uncomfortable afterwards. Would use again on certain areas of my face but not everywhere.

reviews.review_title: a tiny by of exfoliation, maybe?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used a whole deluxe sample once, applying quite liberally on face and neck. It dried quite quickly and reminded me a little of PTR cucumber gel mask which is a staple in my stash for hydrating my oily but dehydrated skin. I left it on for 45 mins. When I washed it off my forehead looked and felt smoother. Rest of my face looked fresh and moisturized but nothing else really. When I woke up the next day my skin looked same as usual, no enduring results. May be even a little more dehydrated than usual.  I had high hopes coz the first two ingredients are aloe juice and source for BHA. Certainly not worth the price for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't leave the mask on for long enough for first time and was disappointed. After leaving it on for the correct amount of time I loved it! My skin feels smooth and less congested. Doesn't feel like much when on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this, I found no difference in my skin and the product stunk really bad. My face was pretty red after using this for 20 mins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this but have not seen a difference in my skin since beginning to use it! :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work for me at all!  My skin actually looked worse after I used it and it dried out my skin.  This mask is too expensive to not work I don't understand how it won awards/how so many people love it.  I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say enough how much this product and the Laneige hydrating kit has saved my skin. Just after one use of this mask I noticed EXTREME brightness. After a few uses my parenthesis lines around my mouth are only noticeable when I smile, before they were noticeable 24/7, and the start of expression line wrinkles on my forehead have nearly diminished. My makeup also goes on so much better. Keep in mind I had dull, dry, irritated skin and this has fixed all my problems. It also helped plump my skin. Most results were noticeable right away but my skin looks even better the day after. I highly recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if this is worth the expensive cost (depends if you can afford it) but this is definitely an awesome mask.  It feels great once you put it on and when you take it off.  It feels slightly tightening for the time its on but nothing you are going to visually notice.  If you can afford this I say go for it as your skin feels awesome after.  I see this being good for all skin types.  Wish this was not in a jar.

reviews.review_title: Great mask for cooling the face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for about a month now and the best use I've had is for a cooling face pack after a hot day. It has an amazing fragrance that has a calm effect.  The only reason I gave it a 4-star is because of the I didn't really get the glowing effect as it is supposed to be. But then I got cooler skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a deluxe sample with one of my orders and didn't know anything about this product. I love face masks and I've never tried a resurfacing one before so I thought I'd give it a go. I was so pleasantly surprised! It really made my skin baby soft, and noticeably brighter and more healthy looking. The only downfall is the price for the amount of product you get. However, using it only once a week, it should last for a while. I might have to cave and buy this during the Rouge sale. I've fallen in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS STUFF IS INCREDIBLE. I wish it wasn't so expensive, but I can see why it is. After using this just for a couple of nights, my hormonal breakout was gone. My skin looks so much smoother and my blackheads are allllll gone. I already have a pretty intense skincare routine and I noticed when adding this mask my skin has gotten leaps and bounds better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got it as a sample, it works sooo well. It is definitely on my wish list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I HIGHLY recommend this kit! Like HIGHLY!!! This is a great kit. And believe me when I say a little goes a long way. I first started out with a sample of the mask. Absolutely LOVED it! So I thought well I want to get the full size, then I saw this kit was only $2 more and it has the full size. At first you think THIS is the size?! But you serious do not need a lot! So not only does it feel amazing on your skin, but I have VERY sensitive skin and it does not irritate it whatsoever. I havenu2019t had a product I was this happy with in a while. There were dramatic results for me overnight! A little story about my sensitive skin for you - this past weekend my mom got a new laundry detergent and when she hugged me I could tell it was different. That very day my face started breaking out. I had about 20 teeny tiny zits on my cheeks. Made my cheeks extremely red. I got the kit on Monday, by the way, Monday morning I woke up and my face was so red it looked like I just put blush all over my cheeks. So that night I got home from work, washed my face, put the mast on, cleaned it off then used the moisturizer. Tuesday - Not only did I only have THREE zits but ALL the redness was gone. This has been like a miracle kit for my sensitive skin! It feels great, it doesnu2019t burn, and the mask doesnu2019t get so hard it hurts your face. I definitely recommend this to someone with highly sensitive skin. I donu2019t know if itu2019s supposed to help with breakouts too but it definitely worked for that too!

reviews.review_title: Now a permanent product in my skin care routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first applied this gel-like mask, it didnu2019t seem like anything special. However, it dried quickly and felt cool and fresh during the 20min I kept it on. I rinsed it off as directed and yes, my face had a very noticeable glow! I think this will be a permanent part of my skin care routine! I havenu2019t tried any TATA Harper products that I donu2019t love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the u201cminiu201d with my Sephora points one order and I looked up the u201chow tou201d and what not and used the mask as directed. My skin is so sensitive lately and dry and patchy- this mask was amazing. Iu2019m glad I tried it but to buy the full size product $77 seems a little steep, but used accordingly it should last a while! So I will buy again :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a mask I haven't noticed a huge significant difference BUT I do like it as an overnight spot treatment. I noticed it reduced any dark marks that would be left behind from these blemishes. Will try as an overnight mask. Received as a sample and it's a little pricey but I think I will make the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I slept with this mask on overnight and literally woke up a new person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in my last sephora order.  I have used the mask once.  It did take away the dead skin cells and left my face very smooth.  I would like to purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see this as a reward and went for it! Totally lived up to my expectations, I saw reduced puffiness and and overall smooth and balanced completion. I love this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Actually made my combination/oily skin look worse. It looked blotchy, dull, and less smooth than before I put it on. Horrible.

In love with this mask. No tightness afterward, just left with a beautiful healthy glow.  Celtic skin, prone to redness and sensitivity with acne u2014 healthy skin maintained with various products, including this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face mask, works great without drying out your skin. I use the cleanser too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didnu2019t get this product because it is so gentle and non-abrasive, I thought it wasnu2019t working. After using it per instructions, Iu2019ve noticed my skin tone even out, the flakes are gone and itu2019s ultra moisturized... done in the most subltle of ways! I had a minor sunburn from a sunny holiday this summer and my skin was dry and uneven in tone. This mask definitely fixed those issues. Plus the scent is delicious and the consistency is pleasing to touch. A definite thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 2 to 3 beauty routines/ day , I use serums and oils and have many day, night face creams and I exfoliate 1-2/week AND NOTHING gave me the same results has this mask !!!! Even a glicolic acid night cream by Caudalie. It removed a small bump I had for years. I did not notice any difference at first use, but I followed the 3 days in a row instructions and on the 4 day... I really saw the difference!!! I have sensitive skin that is normal or mixed and would recommend this has a spa for your skin ! Enjoy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been having nonstop cystic acne for the past 6 months. I would get a new pimple if not more every single day. I have been trying to find something that will help. This is it! I got some small samples with my beauty points, you get about 4 uses per jar, Iu2019m on my third use, and my acne is clearing up! I havenu2019t gotten a single new pimple since Iu2019ve used this. The redness has gone down and my skin is finally starting to feel smooth and healthy again! I loved this so much that I purchased the full size today and canu2019t wait to get it in.

reviews.review_title: if nothing else deep cleans u anymore, this will
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleaning product ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as part of a Playbox and immediately fell in love. It does an amazing job of moisturizing and reducing wrinkles. I did read the other not so glowing reviews and I wondered, what was the age of those reviewers? I'm 58. I'm thinking that they were not. If you're under the age of 45, please don't buy this product, revel in your beauty and donate the sixty bucks to a charity or take your mom out to lunch. It won't do much for you because you don't need much done. Otherwise, snatch this one up ladies and gents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: first use.. and no words.  Honestly you skin feels so alive and perfectly even, especially If you have blemished and dry spots.  amazing worth the purchases. As good as a facial itself.

I am shocked at how well this product works! I have a ridiculous number of freckles and after using this mask 3 times they are nearly gone. I use a flat brush to brush it on and leave it for 45 minutes or so before washing off. My sensitive skin is not dried out or irritated at all. So happy to have found this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously my favorite mask. I have oily and acne prone skin and this helps so much. The natural ingredients in it also help keep your skin from getting too stripped or dry. This mask is also a great spot treatment too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple of months now and it is amazing! I found it randomly on a day where I just felt like going into Sephora and getting a face mask. The lady at the store suggested this because it is all natural and she felt it'd help with my sensitive combination skin. I work a lot and my skin was just feeling clogged up and dull. The first day I used it, I came home from work and removed my makeup as usual, washed my face with warm water and cleanser and applied a bit of the product all over my face. I know the box suggests it be left on for 15 - 30 mins but I kept it on a whole hour. It was great because it's colorless and drys very fast. I then went in the shower and let my face steam a bit before washing it off. Later, I toned and moisturized my face and I could already feel the difference. I then applied the mask every single day for the rest of the week. My skin has changed. It feels amazing now. No clogged feeling, nothing. just smooth and soft. Now I use the mask once or twice a week. the frequency depends on how my skin is feeling. I love using it when my hormones are off balance, helps keep the oiliness under control and prevents any hormonal breakouts. Try it if you haven't already! It's well worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is kind of a little miracle in a jar.  It really works - I'm 56 and used once per week, after the first application I saw an immediate difference.  My skin is brighter, smoother, more deeply moisturized and the overall condition feels better. Very much recommend adding this to a weekly regime.

Got a sample and just tried this. Skin looks glowing and polished. Usually these acid peel type of mask makes my skin dry and irritating, but not this one. Only give 4 stars, while it's a great product, I like their clarifying mask better, the latter gives even more amazing result. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Provides a beautiful glow, and allows makeup to go on more smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the set with moisturizer, serum, etc, etc. and I love everything! So far I have bought this mask and the moisturizer, since the products are higher in price. But this mask goes a long way, I used it about one a week.  This mask does something for my skin that I love, it leaves the skin glowing and soft. Its one of the products I can compromise for something more affordable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin smooth and happy every time time I use it. Love the scent and the fact that it never irritates my skin.

reviews.review_title: Makes my skin feel and look AMAZING!
reviews.review_text: My skin looks amazing since I started using this. I never believed people when they say a product made a huge difference with one use BUT now I do! My skin looked amazing after the first use. I left it on for about 30 min because I got a phone call and when I rinsed my face my usual redness was 90% gone and my skin tone looked more even. I can't wait to check out more of their products.
I love this product. My face glows and feels cleaner

Me: 39 years old with parched but good, healthy skin. No breakouts, no wrinkles. My only persistent issues are dryness, dullness and a little redness on my cheeks.   Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask: Whatever kids say now instead of the bomb,  that's what this is. Can't speak for everyone, but I lost ten years in ten minutes.
This mask truly did leave my skin brighter than before I used it! I received this sample in my Allure Beauty Box and I will DEFINITELY be buying this mask!

I generally prefer masks I can use in the shower so rinsing is super easy, but when I actually talk myself into using this one, I'm always glad I did.  This mask helps my face feel smooth and calms redness/irritation in my cheeks. It's also very comfortable to wear - no overpowering scent or painful tingling.

reviews.review_title: a stable of my skincare routine
reviews.review_text: I can always count on this mask to do it's best and Im never disappointed after using it. I will use this for as long as possible before getting ready for work or if my skin needs a pick me up. it's really gentle on acne prone skin too. makes my skin super glowy. It lasted me about 4 months of consistent use and I don't feel duped or like I ran out too fast. Totally worth the price if you're into actual green beauty and don't want to compromise on quality. Will repurchase asap!

I got this in my playbox and finally got around to trying it out. I was really excited based on the packaging. The smell was weird and the consistency was weird, but a lot of makeup products are. I put the mask on and waited about 10 minutes and then I started to feel a tingle and turned into full blown burning. I immediately washed it off but it felt like I just couldn't get it off my skin. It seems like this product has high ratings but perhaps there's something in it I'm allergic to.

I gave this two tries but will not be going for round three. While I do not mind the smell, I did notice that it left an extremely weird feeling on my face. My face felt very dry, almost like I had a thin layer or something on my face. It was very weird and I hated it. I have combination skin and this did not work for me. Definitely not worth it for me.

This came in my play box. I decide to try it because my face has been going thru so much lately. I have more breakouts in the summer and I need something to relax my face so I said let me try it and see what it can do for me. MIRACLE IN A JAR!!!! I noticed a difference in one use. I have the worst skin and this made me glow, it reduced my pore size, it love this mask. Sephora play box is the best way to find new items because I may of not even known about this if it wasn't for play. Great investment !!!
I got it on my Play by Sephora Box, and it was amazing. It help me with some acne as well. After I put the mask I could feel my face really smooth.  I would definitely buy this :)

I have combination (leaning oily) skin and don't have any problems with acne or texture. After using the Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask, my skin turned red and dozens of closed comedones appeared all over my cheeks by the next morning. No glowiness either. I hadn't changed anything else in my skincare and makeup routine so it definitely resulted from introducing this product. I did try the product again after my skin cleared, but saw the same result. After reading the ingredient list, I suspect it was the Lactobacillus Ferment, and strongly urge trying a sample of this mask before purchasing if you haven't used any products with ferments before. I wish it had worked, I love what Tata's company stands for!

I've used this a few times since receiving a sample of it, and it's not bad but I haven't seen any difference in my skin. I didn't have any sort of bad reaction to it, but for the price, I would expect to see some kind of result. Would not purchase the full size of it.

I bought after reading about it constantly on Intothegloss and noticed an immediate difference after the first use. Followed the diections exactly and my face looks brighter and firmer and clearer. The smell is nice too. You only have use a little bit too so it lasts

It started off great. the first time I used it my skin felt so nice and looked brighter but the third use (not consecutively) I noticed that it actually worsened the appearance of my skin! I suddenly had lines around my eyes that were NOT there prior to use, and my skin looked parched. Thankfully it was temporary & the effects wore off by the next day but...
Since my skin is most dry, I really didn't feel the effects of this one. Indeed makes the skin feel firmer, but also remove moisture. I would say, for me,  it's ok, but not a must have.
I really love this product I saw a big difference in my skin after a couple uses
Really nice but tiny jar and won't last but a couple applications. Too bad. Way too expensive for what you get.
I am a mask addict, and this is one of my faves! It feels good. leaves skin soft and glowy. I feel like it did help minimize the appearance of my pores. I would recommend this mask for sure!

reviews.review_title: Amazing mask for all skin types.
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this mask, and after one use, I ordered the full size. I am a mask aficionada and this is the best one I have used. Not only is it very easy to apply, but it is also very comfortable to have on your skin. But the big pay-off is the result! My skin looked so good. I'll never be without this mask, it's THAT good.
I didn't enjoy the smell of this mask. I don't need a lot of resurfacing but I wouldn't purchase just on smell alone.

It's a good mask and I see a small difference in that my skin looks healthier and more nourished. But, for $58 and how quickly I used it up, it is not worth it at all. I'm still convinced the effects were a placebo because it's so expensive!!

I came into Sephora looking for a way to fix texture on my skin. A tata Harper representative told me to get this, and included samples of their cleansers and moisturizers with the mask. I was skeptical to say the least, of course she would suggest her own brand, but I was amazed at the results. Can't say enough good things about this mask. Only wish it came with more product for the price, but I guess that's the price we pay for natural skincare. Works miracles when you use with the cleanser.

I've only used this product twice and my skin is already different.. I was just reading everyone else's reviews to see if anybody else had the same experience.. I have oily skin at after 2 days of use I no longer have oily skin!! I have done nothing else different in my skincare routine this product is a miracle worker.. thank you to those who have recommended it as a spot overnight treatment. I do do have some acne scars, I'm going to try it on and see if I get results.  but I have definitely seen my hyperpigmentation start to fade after only two uses.. I'm so excited!

reviews.review_title: Made the mistake of trying a sample
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample this past spring and made the mistake of trying it. I've never experienced such an amazing and immediate effect. My face feels as soft as baby's skin after each use. I was appalled with myself when I had to splurge on such an extravagance, but I bought a jar and now I look forward to Sunday evenings because I know I get to use this amazing product.

I got this in the Sephora Play! Reward Bazaar package and I used it once and I don't think I will be able to again. It broke me out (I don't have sensitive skin or anything), it didn't do anything, and the worst of all it smells like BUGSPRAY. I don't know if that's how the samples are or if i got a dud but the smell on its own was bad enough to make me not pick it back up.

This mask is really awesome. I got it in my May box and I'm repurchasing once my sample is empty. I've read some of the reviews where women are using this mask multiple days in a row. I've used this once a week (as it is still a resurfacing mask) and got great results. Stripping your skin of it's natural oils with a mask isn't going to help. Be patient and follow the directions and you'll love the texture of your skin!

I've been on the hunt for a good mask to help with the texture on my skin, so when this came in my May box, I was pumped. I followed the instructions - used it three nights in a row. Each time I washed off the mask, my skin looked okay, but nothing a cheaper mask couldn't deliver. When I woke up the morning after the last application of the mask, I was extremely disappointed. I had dry patches everywhere - forehead, around the nose, upper lip, on my chin! And I do not have dry skin...I am oily in my t-zone and normal on my cheeks. It has been a few days, and I've gone through a few moisturizing masks/sheet masks trying to correct my skin, but I am still dealing with the dry patches. Beware!
didnt see Glowing results and i would break out after which isnt like me since i do not have sensitive skin. i have buyers remorse, get a sample 1st before paying a high price tag

reviews.review_title: you'll see a difference after one use!
reviews.review_text: I received this mask as a sample and after trying it once I went out and purchased it. It made my skin feel and look great after just one use. It doesn't smell bad but it has a gel texture and you'd think for 77 dollars (cad) they'd provide some sort of spatula to make the use easier and not as wasteful, that's the only reason I'm giving it a 4 is because they should provide one.
Pros:  Smells great Appealing packaging Leaves skin soft  Cons: Doesn't minimize pores Doesn't help fine lines Makes skin shiny, not glowing

This came in my May box and am just now getting around to using it. I have no idea why I waited so long. At first, I was a little put off by smell and wasn't sure how many uses I would get from this small bottle. I kept it on for 30 minutes and was super pleased with the results. My face was a little red after but smooth.

Received this in my May Play box and I absolutely love it that I purchased it this month. I saw results after the first time of using this. My face is brighter, smoother, and clearer. It is definitely a must have for me in my mask collection. I use it 2-3 times a week, but initially everyday for 2-3 as directed on the directions. I also like the fact that you don't have to leave it on for a long time, just 15-30 minutes I believe. The only thing is this is pretty expensive for a small amount. But it's worth it.
I cannot say enough great things about this product! First of all it smells fantastic. When applied it almost has a cooling sensation that just perks up my skin. After r

I received this in my Play box and love it. I used this as an allover mask and it made my skin really smooth, but I love it more as an overnight spot treatment. It makes my breakouts go away faster and I think it helps my hydroquinone fade dark spots faster too. I even like the way it smells, and the smell doesn't last long if it bothers people. I will be buying the full size when the little jar is empty.

i frequently use masks and have had mixed results. i have very sensitive skin for example and so its common for me to have burning, redness and sometimes break outs after masks. not the case with this one! my skin was super clear and felt very smooth after just one use.
My skin feels so light and smooth and soft after using this. I can put on three layers of makeup and feel like I'm not wearing any after using this.
one big thing for me is the fragrance in a mask, I feel like that it enhances the experience of using one and I did not like the smell of this.

My skin has been troublesome over the past few days (too much sun and not enough sunscreen). I used Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask yesterday thinking that it certainly couldn't make my skin any worse, though I wasn't expecting noticeable results either. I was blown away by how awesome my skin looked! It looked so radiant and healthy that I didn't even bother with foundation today.

Received from Sephora Play box, able to get 5 uses out of the tiny bottle.   Consistency: Gel like and I didn't have high expectations for it but was surprised with the scent and texture.   Scent: Not over powering and light. I am very particular about products that I put on my face, I guess it because I really dislike using products that smell or have a unnatural scent. So this was great  Effectiveness: It does what it says it does & then some.   Overall: Very happy with the product and saw amazing results.
This is an amazing mask. My skin feels so incredibly soft after doing it. I do it twice a week and have notice a difference in my skin
This mask smooths and hydrates in 20 minutes flat. it leaves my skin soft and my makeup goes on like satin. one hundred percent worth the price
Got this in my Sephora play box. I'm definitely going to be pitching this fullsize!  Instantly made my skin brighter and almost clearer looking. I love it!

I got this product as a sample in the May play box and am usually the least excited about trying a new kind of face mask. This is unlike any other face mask I have ever used. My skin felt amazing immediately! So soft and smooth the minute I rinsed it off. My pores looked smaller after 1 use. I already ordered the large size. It is pricey but totally worth the splurge. If you're on the fence about this product, just try it! You won't be disappointed

reviews.review_title: I Really Didn't Want to Love This
reviews.review_text: But I love it. I already have a 16-18 step skin care routine, with occasional facials and dermablading, and I don't need another add-in product. But I love it.   I could tell the difference immediately. I don't have much dry skin due to diligence and natural oiliness but my skin felt smooth and my complexion looked even after using it. I think if your skin is properly prepped for the product to absorb it does wonders but it is a thin quick drying jelly so I could see it not being as effective if it can't melt into the skin.
Absolutely love this stuff. I got a sample, and want to buy a full size. Skin feels tight and so fresh afterwards.
This did beautiful things for my skin. I got it in my play box and it made my skin smooth and lovely after the first use. Now I have to buy the big one. Well played.

I got this in my Sephora Play box. I used it once and had an allergic reaction to it. My face became extremely red (looked like a bad sunburn) and felt hot and tight and it hurt (again like a sunburn). Also, I had a large breakout throughout the next couple of days that I *think is from this mask.

I got this in my play box, and followed the instructions to use 3 days in a row. After day 3, my skin's texture has not improved at all...if anything my pores and breakouts actually look worse, which I'm not sure is from the mask or something else but it certainly did not help or improve anything. It may work for some but still can't imagine spending the high price on this when there are so many better products out there.

I very much enjoy using this mask. I see results instantly and my face is so soft afterward. I do alternate between several masks and exfoliaters so I honestly can't pinpoint exactly what it's doing, but my skin does look and feel better after using. The ingredients are very good for your skin. I highly, highly recommend.
Easy to apply, goes a long way, and feels great. My skin looks and feels refreshed and rejuvenated! I received this in my play box and I will most likely purchase this product again!

This mask is so incredible that I am taking the time to write my first review ever. Which is saying alot! I'm in my 40s, so I have many years of products used that have not compelled me to take the time. I wasn't expecting much, given the 10 or so other masks I currently have. I have been thinking about botox for the lines on my forehead and that vertical line between my brows. After three days of using this mask, my lines are barely visible. A sunspot is gone, and my skin is so smooth and radiant my husband does not believe it came from a jar. He's a former USMC officer and is going to try it himself! TBH, I didn't use exactly as directed: I leave it on overnight (no problems), and put an extra layer on the problem areas. I'm buying another jar for my chest and hands so they match my face. Ha! I hope you have the same amazing results I have had. Enjoy!

I got this item in my Sephora play and was excited to try it out but I'm so disappointed. The reviews are raving but it just didn't do it for me. I have oily skin, no acne no scars just large pores on my nose. It felt nice when it dried but other that that I can't see myself giving it another chance. It's aight, but don't let my review discourage you like I said it's me.

reviews.review_title: MY MOMMA DON'T LIE! THIS WORKS!
reviews.review_text: As usual, I read the reviews before I tried the product. After using the mask just once, I was not initially overly impressed. My skin felt nice. BUT DAB IT IN SCARS & PITTING AND THE MIRACLE HAPPENS! I am 47 years old and have used more skin products than I can shake a stick at. I am not easily impressed, but this resurfacing mask has knocked me out. I got it free in my Sephora play box. I bought a full size before I even finished the trial.  I AM NOT RICH! I AM BROKE! THIS IS WORTH IT!!  JUST DAB A LITTLE AND LEAVE ON OVERNIGHT. IT WILL LAST YOU FOREVER!   I did not try it out initially because I already use Erno Laszlo double cleanse (deep cleanse black bar...that is awesome, too) and a Japanese peeling mask (the kind you put on and rub immediately and produces eraser-like particles.) I was very happy with how my skin was progressing to absolute smoothness. I must add that I am Black, so my aging process is significantly slower and I do not have any wrinkles. That being said, I do have issues with very oily skin and large pores. Not much in the way of regular acne, however I do have some texture issues.  I followed the advice of a previous reviewer and dabbed the product on some acne pitting and a weird keloid scar, my skin has a tendency to react poorly to damage. The first day, after leaving it on all night, was surprising. I thought I saw some changes, but thought perhaps I was just trying to see things. I tried it again the next night. The following morning I saw that the scarring was going away. I still thought I was crazyu2026 Until the third night.....  I AM NOT CRAZY! THE SCARS AND PITS ARE GOING AWAY. I asked others if they were seeing the same thing and they agreed. I am on night number 7 and still using the trial size and dabbing in a little bit on with a Q-tip. I expect my scoring to be gone in another couple of days. I plan to continue using the mask on an occasional basis and this will justify the high price.  As it says in the title, my mama don't lie and she sees a difference. So do I and this stuff works!
I was absolutely Blown Away after just using this mask 1 time. it is absolutely amazing it worse it did not make my skin red. is amazing for sensitive skin definitely a win-win in my book
Shrunk my pores near my nose and cheek area to nearly invisible! I don't know if it actually has smoothed my skin but my pores are definitely gone after using this mask!

I have dry skin mostly on my t zone and this mask removed the little flakes I had on my forehead. Best part about it was that it only took one try to see results. If you don't believe me go ahead to a Sephora near you and try a sample, what do you have to lose? This product is so amazing, the smell is earthy but smells really good. Do not use a lot of this, a tad bit goes a long way.
Did not notice any differences in my skin after using a whole jar.

reviews.review_title: Helps to keep acnes at bay
reviews.review_text: Got it as a free sample first. At that time I was having a crazy acne outbreak and the mask helped to bring it down. So I bought a full size and it still seems to have the same effect.

reviews.review_title: THIS IS A LIFE CHANGER BUT WHY SO EXPENSIVE
reviews.review_text: I also got this as a sample in my may box, not expecting much because i feel like masks and whatnot never really work for me but this was SO GOOD i literally just took this off my face five minutes ago and raced here to write a review and i'm still touching my face in awe of how smooth it is. i just wish it wasn't so expensive because i'd buy it EVERY TIME I RAN OUT and every time i think about it i'm going to be sad that it's not in my budget range right now

I FINALLY FOUND MY HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT!! The Tata Harper Resurfacing Mask is pure MAGIC! I have horrible hormonal acne which for me means I get tiny bumps covering my entire forehead and super deep, huge cystic acne on my cheeks and jaw. It got so bad I seriously googled the words skin transplant. I had a sample of this sitting on my makeup table for months and then finally got around to trying it. I was surprised by the texture when I first opened it, a very slippery watery jelly. I love the scent and am very glad that it's not perfumed, it's real plant smells. I left the mask on for the whole 30 minutes. My face did get super tight while the mask was on, but it felt nice like it was actually working. When time was up, I swiped the back of my hand over my forehead and I actually gasped. The gross scabby texture on my forehead was gone! I washed it off as fast as I could and immediately noticed that my skin was really glowing. I used 2 Sunday Riley oils after and when I woke up in the morning about 1/4 of the acne on my forehead was gone and the deep purple cysts on my cheeks looked so much lighter. I ran to the store the very next day to get a full sized tub! I've been using exactly as recommended - 3 days in a row and then 1-2x a week from then on. So in total I've used this probably 7 times and my skin has dramatically changed. The forehead acne is 1/2 gone and I only have 2 smaller cheek cysts remaining! Plus, all my old scarring is so much lighter. I am so happy to have found this product and will continue to use until all of my acne has disappeared!

GUYYYYSSS THIS IS LIFEEEE. got it in my may box and wasnt expecting much. but WAS I WRONG. it IS SO AMAZING. i dont write reviews unless i am super passionate about the product in my may box or hate it and want to warn people not to use it becuase it affected me negatively, but this stuff is seriously life changing. what i did was put a little on my forehead cheeks and chin and rinsed it off after fifteen minutes and my skin is seriously so soft now. i do not have acne and have pretty smooth skin as is, but this seriously made it feel lielvet. i wish i wasnt a broke girl or i would get the full size. if you can afford it GET IT FOR REAL.

I received this in my May play box. I have some uneven texture on my cheeks and it definitely smoothed it out. For me, it was effective and I would consider purchasing the full size. It was very gentle so I imagine it would be good for sensitive skin. The only thing I didn't like was the smell.

I got this mask in my Play box and was somewhat excited to try a new mask but nothing really remarkable about it. I have sensitive skin but this did not irritate/tingle/cause any sort of sensation while it was on. The results were....just what you would expect after using a mask. My skin felt soft and clean but again nothing outstanding or unique.i absolutely would not spend almost $60 on a full size container.

I received a sample jar in my May Play! box. While I do enjoy it as I enjoy masking in general, I do not think I will pick up a full size of this. The ingredients can be found in much lower priced masks, and don't really resurface. That said, I did not find it irritating, and did feel my skin brightened up a bit after use. It could be an option for you if you find AHA/BHA or retinoids irritating.
It is a fairly nice mask ,but not for the money. I really didnt see a difference in my skin,plus you have to use a lot it seemed like .
Got this in my May play box. Tried it out right away. Sadly it didn't do anything for my skin but it didn't burn my eyes and smells good! It did give my skin a bit of firm feeling though!
After i used it my skin felt very smooth, i liked it but did not give me the glow
My skin felt remarkably smooth after one use but didn't see any glow

don't really know whether I like or not because I never use mask or cleansing products on my face. I've never had bumps or acne or any other types of skin problems so I've never felt the need to use these type of products

reviews.review_title: reminds me of Juice Beauty Apple Peel
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and after the first application was shocked at how smooth my skin felt. I'm definitely adding this into my skincare routine. It reminded me of the Juice Beauty Apple Peel being that it's all natural, has a similar texture and the end result was almost the same but this was a bit more effective. I'll use the rest of the sample as a spot treatment on an old pimple scar to see if it lightens up or better yet goes away completely!

Love this! I first tried this as a sample and was obsessed! I really didn't want to spent this much for the full size, but I finally caved. I can truly feel and see a difference with this mask, and can see myself repurchasing.

I got this as one of samples from an online order. When I applied it, my skin was really tight. After removed the mask, my skin looks younger and softer. Highly recommend this for a skin treatment after a while.

This mask is one of my favorites to go to when my skin is on the verge of a freak out (thanks, PMS).  It somehow manages to deep clean without making my skin dry and smooths any rough texture in just one use.   Try a sample and you'll see what I mean!
Totally changed the look and feel of my skin

reviews.review_title: Why Must I Love Expensive Things?
reviews.review_text: When I turned 25 a year ago I started a loooooong journey of quality skincare. I've always been a fan of makeup and as someone who works in the beauty industry I eventually branched out into exploring the world of skincare. I'm at that super sweet spot where I still get pimples but am now worried about crow's feet, plus I have a bum thyroid which makes my skin suuuuper dry. This can make it challenging to find products that cover all my bases! That being said, I received this in my Birchbox and immediately loved it. The scent is lovely, and the little sample I got lasted 3 uses. It makes my skin look AMAZING, no exaggeration. Bright and clear and even-toned skin is what I wake up to the morning after using this magic goop. I just had to repurchase some of my Sunday Riley products so I'm going to wait a minute to buy this in the full size, but I can hardly wait! Literally saved the tiniest bit to put on the night before an event I have this week... it's that good. (Also it smells fantastic)

This mask is good and does what it says it should do but when you look at the cost of it and how often you should be using it in order to maintain the glow you would probably run out in 2/3 weeks. I think there are better products out there for resurfacing skin such as the first aid beauty radiance pads that are way less money.

This absolutely works! I had first tried this as a sample that was in a sample bag and At first glance I just assumed it was not going to work at all but just cause it was a mask I gave it a try. Putting it on was so weird and I was really annoyed by how thin the consistency was. While removing the product I noticed my skin felt very smooth, so I didn't think much of it as my skin looked about the same. For the next 7 days my skin looked so luminous and bright. I had so many compliments on my skin looking great but all I had done differently was this mask. Give this one a try it's clearly does what it says. Your skin feels soft, looks smooth, and gives a glowy look without makeup. Btw the more even a layer of this stuff is on your skin the better it works.

I have a few deluxe samples of this mask, and I like it (but don't love it). It immediately reveals smoother skin after just one use! However, the results don't last; you would have to keep consistently using this. I have sensitive, combination skin and this doesn't irritate it. However, this isn't a HG product for me, and I don't think I'll buy a full size.
this mask really does work! for a nice smooth complexion, you will see it almost instantly..as soon as you wash the mask off your face! I can't wait to use it again!

This stuff instantly works!! After you wash it off you can already tell a difference in your skin. I was really blown away at how much and how fast this worked. I use it once a week like it says, and I totally look forward to the benefits. My skin looks so healthy, smooth, and glowing. It helps with uneven texture and dullness. I really love how clean this product is and how well it works. I have normal to dry skin that is not sensitive. It doesn't irritate me one buy or cause break outs if anyone is wondering! This and the blue tansy mask by herbivore are the best masks I've ever used. Your skin definitely feels healthy and looks great after this. I usually leave it on for an hour vs 20 mins. Why not keep it on longer lol. Highly recommend!!

This smells nice guys. It has an interesting light, fruity smell and when you have it on for 15-20 minutes you feel it TIGHTEN your face.   However, when I rinse it off, I don't get any resurfacing results at all. I've used this mask maybe 4 different times and each time my skin looks the same as always. Skin feels smoother maybe, but I don't get a glow or anything. I wouldn't buy it personally. Seems expensive when for me I see no results. I'm just using it until the sample empties out, but that's it. :/
I get that it's resurfacing but I don't break out and this gave me two HUGE AND JUICY ZITS. RETURNING.

There is a lot of hype around Tata products and I've tried EVERY product ok her line, not just the ones Sephora sells and a lot of them Are hype accept  this mask ... they have a limited edition honey one too that is gorgeous. This mask is worth every penny
My skin is noticeably smoother and softer, and glows more too. I love that it's natural too. The only thing it doesn't do for me is minimize pores.
Just tried a sample and I am thrilled with the results! Got to buy it now!
Received a deluxe sample and I couldn't have been more excited! Besides using it as a mask, I put a dab on those hard to surface red pimples and it helped dry them out overnight!

I am a mask junkie and this is one of my faves. I'm 37 with dry skin. A thin layer of this mask is all you'll need. You can feel it tighten on your face. When you rinse, your skin is glowing and just honestly looks better.

I received a deluxe sample of this and I HAD to buy the full size.  Now that is almost gone and I'm purchasing another... I wish I didn't love it, because it is a small amount of product for the price, but it is more than worth it.  It doesn't irritate my dry, sensitive and reactive skin at all! And by the next morning, any existing zits I have are definitely smaller.  I'm addicted!! Feels very cooling and tightening on the face.  Perfect for troublesome yet sensitive skin.

The Resurfacing Mask: this mask is for instant glow leaving the skin feeling smooth and fresh. After a stressful week or a long flight, its perfect for a boost! The size of this jar in the collection is small, so its easy to bring for travel. To use, apply a generous amount over the entire face and neck. Leave for about 15-30 minutes and rinse throughly with warm water. Immediately, youu2019ll notice the effects of this mask. No wonder why itu2019s award winning!

This is not a drill, you guys. I have actual baby skin after using this stuff just ONE TIME. Super soft, even toned, glowing. It seems more effective every time I use it. I love masking but there's a lot of gray area when it comes to effectiveness. To be totally honest I feel like most of them don't do anything at all. I don't know how it works, but if you're looking for a mask with immediate results, get this one. It works. Promise.

Despite being a VIB Rouge, I hardly ever have time to think about writing review but this product is worth it, you guys. I have struggled with hormonal chin acne pretty much my entire adult life, even resulting to prescription oral and topical treatments that still didn't completely do the trick. I also happen to be blessed with very sensitive skin which severely limits the products I can use. I received a sample of this with some Sephora purchase and decided to give it a go. I can't recall where specifically, but I remember reading online about someone saying it helped with their acne, so I decided to try it.   When I used it as a mask and left it on for only a few minutes, I saw minimal results. However, somewhere along the way I decided to see what happened if I left a light coating on just my problem area chin for an entire night. I woke up and my acne and scarring was visibly better. I kept doing it, thinking I would soon enough see some evidence of sensitivity or other negative effects but to my surprise, my skin only continued to improve. I now put a very small amount on my chin (and sometimes my nose in the hopes of reducing pore size) every night, and to be honest, my skin has never looked better. Needless to say, this product has become a must-purchase for me.
I use this once a week and it really brightens and smooths my skin with effects lasting for quite a while. Would definitely recommend this product!

First, this is an extremely small product for the price. I didn't realize how small the jar was when I ordered it. It's very gentle, can definitely be left on my sensitive skin overnight. With that in mind, it isn't as effective as I'd hoped. I really didn't see a difference in skin, except extremely mild exfoliation. It's definitely over-hyped.

PROS  Nice luxe packaging Light fruity scent Left skin feeling smooth  CONS  I didn't get that radiant skin result Neither were the results instant Used for about 2 months once a week, did not see any remarkable changes to my skin Too expensive for too little results - would not re-purchase
Ok - great for t-area! Smells herbal - nice.

I'm not entirely sure what is the best way to describe this mask as smoothing. It makes my skin feel softer, plumper, calmer. It clears out tiny invisible bumps I get on my forehead sometimes (dead skin? not sure what else this can be). The effect of it is quite instant and lasts for a couple of days. My only complaint is the size of the jar, it is quite small for the price, but well worth it if this is within your budget.

This is by far the best face mask I've ever used. My skin looks brighter already after only using it 2 times. A little goes a long way. The smell is floral but pleasant. Worth the $$!! I'm very excited to try the other products from this line.

I swear there is just something about this that just makes me want to put this on my face almost everyday!!   It does what it says, but I think it's quite pricey for the amount you get. If you appreciate face masks, then this is a great addition... If you aren't, then you wouldn't be outstandingly impressed.   I am big on masks..... And this is def one of my top!

I love the natural scent of the mask and the glow it gives.  I usually use it at night for about 30min. but have also used it in the morning or before an event for 10-15min to feel extra radiant.  Expensive, but it lasts longer than I would have thought.

This is a great mask.  Every time I use it I see instant results.  I have fair, super sensitive skin.  Often, with masks my skin will look red and irritated after removal and I don't see the positive effects until the next day (after my skin has had time to calm down).  Not the case with this mask.  My skin looks glowing instantly! I picked a free sample of this mask upon check out a while ago and loved it so much I immediately got the full size. this isn't a large container- 1oz.  I feel like it won't last very long even when using a small amount.  That's the only negative I can think of.  I'm rationing and using once a week.  If I used it as they recommend by applying a thick layer I'd be out by now.  I use a thin coat and it does wonders even w a small amount.  It's a bit pricy for the amount, but def worth it.

My skin was gross and textures and I desperately needed to do a mask. I got this as a sample so it looked promising. I put it on and left it on for about 25 min... OMG my skin was gorgeously smooth I didn't feel any texture it's glowy.. Amazing amazing product . As for clearing blemishes I have a few on my right cheek I don't think overnight it will make your pimples disappear but maybe after a few nights....

This mask is so worth the money. I have combo skin oily t zone and normal cheeks. I'm definitely prone to clogged pores . I use this 3 times a week sometimes layer it with Tara regenerating cleanser as she recommends for extra exfoliation and if I have a breakout coming on this nips it right away!!. and leaves my skin so smooth and glowy!! For me the price is not high because when you go to a spa to get a facial you will be spending at a minimum $65 !! Here you get many treatments out of one jar!?
This product leaves my skin feeling soft and rehydrated. Love it!

reviews.review_title: this whole line is a blessing
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. A friend recommended it, and I trust her with my life when it comes to skincare so I bought it.  I wear a thin layer overnight about once a week and wake up with baby soft skin. It also helps to even the tone and give you a little radiance. A little goes a long way so I'm going to make the best of this jar and then get another.

I recieved the sample of this product, and i'm not usually one to go out of my way and buy a full size, but this was amazing! It left my skin perfectly even upon application, and right after washing my face, it looks absolutely flawless even, and glowy. I use this twice a week and I plan on buying it once it runs out!

Given the price I use this as an as needed mid week pick up for my skin. Great product with natural ingredients. Works as a gentle peel/exfoliator + deep cleanser + plus a brightening effect all in one.

this mask works so well for an instant glow & tightening effect. I love using it before special occasions or when I want my skin to look radiant and refreshed. there's also the added bonus of this working better than most acne spot treatments to dry pimples out literally overnight. love this!

reviews.review_title: Great instant pick-me-up for your skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely lives up to the hype! The mask gives an instant glow that I haven't had from other similar products  I use this once a week (usually during my lazy Sunday routine) and it's a great resurfacer. It feels like I get new skin for the start of each week  I got this as a sample, and after one use immediately bought the full size

I noticed after application that my skin had a serious dewy looking glow that was not at all oily. However, it was diminished after using my face cream and didn't make my face look any better with makeup on. But, for an all natural non toxic product, you can't expect much more. I did not love the feel of the mask on my face as it was drying, very tight.
I didn't really see much difference when used as a mask for my skin but great for spot treatments!

I am so pleased! I received a sample of this and after one use my face looks and feels amazing. I can't even believe it. I am definitely going to be purchasing this. My face looks pretty much flawless (minus my few tiny wrinkles haha)

This in conjunction with the Tata Harper Purifying Mask is like the VIP pass to quick, effortless, flawless skin. Yes it is pricey, but on those days when you really need that extra oomph.... this delivers. Will smooth out texture and leave your skin refreshed and radiant. I prefer Tata's products over Glamglow's. Yes, that good.   I was so hesitant to try this for over a year just because of the price tag, but honestly if thats the only thing thats keeping you from it, bite the bullet and try it out. It has changed my life.

I received a jar of this as a gift and fell in love with it. I just purchased my second jar for myself, and I'll continue to forever- it's that good. I try not to buy into the hype with face masks, but this one truly does what it says it does- reveals brighter skin after one use. I use it on my skin at night, about once a week or once every other week, followed by my normal moisturizers, and in the morning my skin is noticeably glowing. It's definitely pricey, but worth every single penny.

Holy glow!! This mask definitely delivers beautiful, glowy skin. I use it 2-3 times a week and notice a difference in my skin. I took away one star just because the jar is so darn small!! And it's expensive.. But a little does go a long way and I will repurchase.

I got this mask as a sample. I used it and after I took it off my face felt super tight and in the morning a pimple that was forming was practically gone. I gave the rest of my sample to my mom, who has very large pores. Her pores were much smaller after the one use and they stayed that way for a few days. I just purchased the full size and I love it. It's great as a spot treatment for any problem areas.

I got a sample of this mask in one of sephora's skincare packs, and it is incredible. Expensive, yes, but each time I used it - and I got three uses out of the one sample - I woke up with prettier, more glowing skin. The kind of skin that doesn't really need makeup. The kind of skin that, to be honest, I have never woken up that way after a regular facial, or after using any other type of mask. Will definitely be buying this one in the full quantity.

I use this 1 to 2 times per week for exfoliation.  My skin is very sensitive and I had no problems with this mask ( I typically do with other exfoliation products)  but follow the directions EXACTLY for sensitive skin.  I haven't had to use it as an overnight spot corrector yet.  I also got this as a sample and bought the full size immediately.  My skin just glows after using this product!

After receiving a sample, I fell for this mask and purchased the full size. I haven't yet used it for it's intended purpose but rather as an overnight spot treatment for trouble areas. Just a light dab on whatever is forming or already has formed and voila, its noticeably smaller come morning. I have dry, sensitive skin with occasional breakouts and am hesitant to use this as a mask. However, I will definitely repurchase the full size when I'm done with the current jar.

This stuff is amazing!! I have sensitive, combination skin & large pores, redness etc etc...i use this 1x a week over night and you wake up with such a glow & pores refined & just smooth calm skin that last for days.  & it also helps as a spot treatment for acne (over night). Love this product! Worth every penny!

I used this for about 12 minutes -- when my skin started to heat up/redden I took it off. I have sensitive combination skin with some oiliness in the t-zone but drier cheeks. This made me look like a baby -- not as much as the Luna Oil, but without any tightness.

I love face masks, and bought this because of the glowing (no pun intended) reviews this product had received. I didn't find it effective. It smells nice. But it didn't do anything positive for my skin. I've tried a ton of masks, but for the price, I really hoped this one would deliver. No such luck.

I bought this after receiving a free sample, and now I know why they give free samples. I didn't pay attention to the size. I liked the smell and it worked well with my sensitive skin, but wow are you paying for it. For that 1 oz at that price I'd just as soon go get an actual facial.

reviews.review_title: Love this as I've sampled it several times
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely mask. I feel it works very nicely. However, the full size price and amount is not something I am ready to splurge on. I much prefer  REN Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask. Talk about baby smooth. To feel my forehead afterwards is like silk. Or glass. It's a repeat buy for me. The price point is nearly the same as this product, but it lasts a very long time since you only need a smidge.  *I do love Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser as a sample as well

I bought this product to remove my acne scars like I read it would. I was surprised about the price, but the reviews reassured me that it was worth it. In the end it wasn't worth it to me. It made my skin soft and feel fresh, which was nice, but it didn't do anything for my acne. I applied it every other day and let it sit for atleast half an hour for about a month then I ran out of the product. I looked for any progress, but there was none. If I wanted softer skin, I would've made a DIY face mask that's a lot cheaper. I didn't even really want that though. All I wanted was to resurface my skin, but that's not what I got.

I bought this thinking it would help with breakouts and acne scars. It did nothing. Some dry patches that I had were gone but a basic exfoliator does that. Definitely not worth the price. I'm trying glycolic acid treatments for much less. Also, I ended up using more than half the container within the 2 weeks I tried it and for that price I'd expect it to last longer.

I love love love this company and was super excited to try this mask. I tried it the very night I got the sample. For some of you, this will be an amazing product. My skin was soft and my pores were visibly smaller this morning. Unfortunately, my sensitive Rosacea skin did not like it beyond that. I was noticeably redder this morning and a relatively minor breakout. If your not sensitive like me, it's worth a try.
Tried a sample.  It  has the classic peel tingle.  Afterwards my skin looked sooo fresh.  Can wait to finish my current peel product so I can buy this one.

This works just fine to lightly resurface-nothing extraordinary. Tons of other similar products for way less money. Use two samples and will not spend $58 for full size. Also I find her entire product line overpriced for what it is.

I received a deluxe sample of this with a VIB code some time ago and was pleasantly surprised at the results. A you tuber mentioned sleeping with it on overnight. So I tried that the second time I used it and was amazed. It truly provides a glow, makes the skin baby soft and in some way balances the skin. Needless to say I purchased the full size as soon as the sample ran out. I started to deduct a star because it is such a small jar for the price. But it's packed with amazingness, the packaging is beautiful and let's be real, I've paid more for less. For reference I'm African American in my late 20s with combination, acne prone skin and large pores.

Love this as a full on face mask but OBSESSED with this as a spot treatment for my cystic adult jawline acne. Seriously two nights using this as a spot treatment and viola cystic acne stopped in its tracks! Love

This mask was great. I have sensitive, redness prone skin and this did not irritate me at all. No itching, burning, or redness while using the product or afterwards.  Woke up the next day to soft, plump, smooth skin and saw some improvement in my pore size right away.  A little goes a long way.

Baby skin alert! If you're wanting soft, radiant, touchable skin, this mask is all you need. It truly does what it claims...after leaving a generous layer on my skin for 15-20 minutes then washing off with warm water and flannel...my skin had a refined, ultra smooth and soft texture. Can't wait to apply my foundation and look forward to purchasing a whole jar.

I read great things on Into the Gloss and pulled the trigger on this mask.  As a lover of anything rosy, the smell made me happy!  Natural, not perfumery and chemical.  It felt nice and my skin looked refreshed, but you do have to try to get a thick layer on or it doesn't really do much.
