I feel that I could get similar results for far less $ but we need to remember that chemicals are cheap and natural things take time and work to turn into luxurious slatherings for people.

I have normal skin and have used this mask 3 times. I first got it as a sample and loved how it made my skin look so soft and bright. I purchased the full size and so far havent been disappointed. Even my sister in law tried it out and kept touching her skin because her skin felt so soft.  Its a nice, gentle exfoliator, and does make the skin look radiant. That its all natural is a plus!
I've never had a product seem like it worked right away but this stuff seriously made a difference, I have sensitive dry skin but large and clogged pores and this stuff worked like a charm

This is a such a great mask which leaves a noticeable difference in my skin after just one use! Acne scars have finished rapidly after using and it also works well as an acne spot treatment. It's a must try!

I tried a sample and wanted to really like this product for the price.  I used in place of an exfoliant and didn't find a huge difference.  I love the natural ingredients, and it felt luxurious and indulgent.  I didn't feel that I saw an immediate difference, but noticed the next morning with makeup on that my face looked glowing. Not sure if it justifies the price, especially since I used a lot on my face.

This mask makes my skin glow the next morning! I use it at night for about 20-30 minutes and in the morning I have healthy glowing skin!  It doesn't irritate or break put my finicky sensitive skin. I tried the other Tata products; a moisturizer and the essence spray, but my skin got tiny little bumps and some pimples. So I will just try to mask often with this.

Received a sample and decided to give it a try.... Was fantastic!! Cleared a stubborn clogged pore that nothing else seemed to work on.  I will definitely be telling friends and purchasing the jar for myself soon!

I received in the Naturals sample bag promotion, and one application and I am really impressed!  As it dried it did not aggravate my skin, and rinsed off easily.  My skin felt great afterwards.  I will be getting this in the full size.

I received a sample of this product and used it one night after washing my face, I loved how it felt on the skin and how it dried down tight! It seemed like I could feel it working while it was drying, and when I rinsed it off my skin did look slightly better.  But the next morning, my skin looked MUCH better than it typically looks in the morning, and I know it was because of this mask.  Planning to purchase in the future!

I received a sample of this mask, and I enjoyed using it. It made my oily skin feel much less so. I could feel it tightening my pores as it dried. The scent didn't bother me at all. The only thing I didn't like was that it really takes some effort to get it completely rinsed off. The price is pretty steep, and that is the only thing preventing me from purchasing the full size product.
i got this as a sample and loved it so much i bought the full size. my skin has never looked better!

I receive this as a sample as I'm literally scrapping the package. Instantly see the glow on my face it dries sticky I leave it over night and wash it in the morning. My face feels really nice afterwards. Price is always an issue but I would use this product again for sure.
The product was a nice mask, it was nothing too outlandishly special. But it worked well and left my face feeling refreshed.

This product I had some high hopes for, but it didn't seem to make my skin glow or do anything significant once I cleared off the mask. I like the fragrance and the fact that it's 100% natural. Though I feel like the product is over-hyped.   The plus side: My dull skin felt cleaned and refreshed afterwards. I expected a bit more of course, from the item's description, but Tata Harper is a great company overall. I won't be purchasing the full container.

I got this mask as a sample on a whim, and WOW! I was having a stress breakout and tried this out before bed. Used as a mask on my whole face, and my skin felt smooth & soft. My pores were tightened, and my 2 problem pimples were greatly reduced in size. I used what was left of the mask as a spot treatment overnight, and my breakout was hardly noticeable. Will definitely be purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_title: Does what it claims to do
reviews.review_text: This mask was super gentle. It left my skin smooth and petal soft. To me it's like a natural and more gentle version of the glamglow clearing mask! I hated the scent although it wasn't too strong or overbearing.

I received a sample of this and I will definitely be purchasing the full size. My skin often gets irritated from using different peels, this one was gentle and had a cooling effect.. And it applied very smoothly. It helped to clear my pores and instantly gave my skin a nice glow

This mask has a gel like consistency and it goes on very smoothly. As it dries it has a cooling effect and eventually hardens. It left my skin feeling clean and smooth. I noticed it had lifted dirt from my pores which I loved. Will be buying full size.

I received this as a sample...I was in bed for a couple of days with a summer cold and it left my skin looking dull.  I decided to try this...the smell is off putting. Not super gross, but it smells somewhat like industrial lubricant (a garage-like smell).  I put it on for about 20 minutes.  When I rinsed off, my skin was fresh, soft and glowing.  If you can deal with the fact that this has a chemical smell, it's a great mask.   Bonus in that it doesn't sting/itch like glycolic.

This mask is some witchcraft. I cannot believe how luxurious and effective this is. It dries to a film-like mask, as if you would be able to peel it off. But once you rinse with warm water you're left with GLOWING skin as if you just left a facial. I'm very impressed and will repurchase indefinitely.

At 46, I started getting bumps on my cheeks close to my ears. It wasn't acne or rosacea but wouldn't go away. When I was at Sephora, I saw this, and not expecting much got a sample. After checking out Tata Harper's website, I saw some people left the mask on over night and gave it a go. Next morning, bumps were much better. After 3 days, they were gone. I know it says put it on thick, but I put it on lightly for these results. I quickly bought the full size. Hope this review helps someone experiencing similar problem.
I absolutely loved it.  I received this as a sample so I decided to give it a try. My skin glowed and felt like baby skin.  I'm definitely buying this.
I got a sample and I liked it but didn't notice a big difference. Maybe with more regular use I would see better results. I wasn't impressed enough to go out and buy a full size.

Got this as a sample and didn't want to try it because it smelled bad to me at the store. But of course I'll give it a chance, it was free! I was impressed with the results. I would want to try it consistently to give a more thorough review but I felt it did was it promised. My skin felt clean and glowy and soft after I rinsed it off. I don't mind masks that recommend longer wait time to rinse off. I consider it me time! Would purchase the full product to give it another go

I received a deluxe sample of this. I really like it. It provides a mild exfoliation, leaves skin glowing and hydrated. I was a little pink after the first use but that's not uncommon as I have sensitive skin. I would definitely purchase a full size and use this once a week in conjunction with my other products.

I have received the sample, and used it last night , and this morning , I was AMAZED on how my skin reacted, my acne scars were diminished, almost gone, I was in SHOCK, my skin was tightened and glowing, I can't really describe it. If you on the fence , get a sample, you will be going to Sephora for the Big one, I ASSURE YOU. I already both mine today, I have tried others from the sample bag, and this is the winner !!! AMAZING!!!! Go get yours!!!!!

I received a sample of this and tried it out today. The mask is supposed to give you an instant glow and work like a peel. I've used peels and peel-like masks before. This was nothing compared to a peel. Did my skin glow? Yea right before I washed it off. I did notice that my skin was cleaner. But it didn't really have that glow that I can get with almost any other mask. I don't know what all the hype is about. It felt like a gel mask that dried like a peel. Only it doesn't peel off. I'm glad I tried the sample because I had been contemplating buying the full size for a very long time. This has completely changed my mind. Will I try it again? Maybe if I get another sample. But I probably won't be buying it on my own.

This mask has become my holy grail mask. It is so gentle yet does wonders! It has completely changed the texture of my skin; it looks and feels smoother, scars have basically disappeared, and any breakouts are gone. Even after 1 use it works. The directions say to apply a thick layer and I have found that is exactly what should be done, I tried using a thin layer and it didn't take as well. I have read the owner of the company uses this as an overnight mask, I want to try but it does get a bit hard and I don't think I can sleep in it. I love this mask so much and I can't wait to try the rest of the line, I want everything!
Love the instant difference! It made my skin smooth and look more radiant. Any dull areas were diminished in my combo skin. Excellent natural ingredients!

I received a deluxe sample of this mask and I gotta say I really enjoyed it!  My skin looked brighter and glowed after I used it, and even with my sensitive skin there was no problem the next day.  It did make the skin around my cheeks and nose feel a little tight, and you do have to use a generous amount of the product to get a thick layer so the sample was only used 2-3 times by me.  Would I purchase this? Yes possibly in the future when I have some extra spending money and want to invest in a weekly mask.  Is it a game changer? Not really. It does add radiance but there are other methods to getting that look that aren't as expensive. I have very clear skin, so I can't say how it would work for those with skin issues.  I would definitely recommend for those with clear but sensitive skin that just want a little extra boost to brighten them up.

I got this as deluxe sample with purchase. I was underwhelmed with this mask. I followed the instructions, and left it on for 30 minutes to give it a good chance to see results. I found it difficult to remove, and my skin felt just a bit smoother; definitely not worth the price. I could get the same results in less time, and for a lot less money.

I got a sample of this mask, and even though I like treating my skin with masks, I never saw any difference from using any of them, UNTIL I used this one. My goodness!! I have rough texture on my forehead and around my mouth, and this mask did away with it completely, with one use!! It is amazing! If you have texture, you have to try this. I am buying a gallon of this stuff!

I got a sample in the mail. And the FIRST day I tried this it completely changed the texture it my skin! And I have dry skin and after using this it gave me a brighter complexion and gave my skin the hydration it needed in just ONE USE! Will be purchasing full size!

Omg!!!  Oh my mother goodness!!!  I have had rosacea for about fourteen years now.  Nothing gets rid of the redness and the bumps except antibiotics and I want nothing to do with that.  This did.  The first time I tried it.  I had tried a Tata Harper face oil before and hated it and assumed I would hate this as well but got it as a free sample.  Didn't notice much the night I put it on and took it off but the next day my skin looked brighter.  The day after that my redness and skin bumps were almost non existent!!!  I am out of town now and left the sample home but will be tackling it and muttering about it being my preciousssss once I am home.  I ordered the full size and am actually hopeful for my skin for the first time since this horrid skin issue reared its head.   My skin also feels much smoother, like porcelain.  Putting makeup on made me look ten years younger (I'm 37) and I didn't even have to use concealer on what are normally terrible hereditary dark circles under my eyes.  I would spend $500 on these sorts of results!  I didn't have to use much either.  I could probably get five or six more uses out of just the sample.

I decided to buy this one after I watched an ecobeauty youtuber. She was introduced to use this product as a spot treatment for acnes overnight and she raved about it. I tried a few times as spot treatment, and it seemed to absorb the white stuff and dry the acnes. But it won't work as a magic to heal those acnes on my chin for sure. I also apply it all over the face for 30 mins to see the resurfacing thing. My BF commented that my face immediately brightened and glowed after I rinsed of the mask. So I am pretty happy with the result. But the other thing is, Recently the sides of my nose are super dry that it tingled too much when I applied the mask. I literally wanted to wash it off! So I don't know if it suits those super sensitive skin.

First off this makes my skin feel tingly like it's working. Second it's all organic products that I can pronounce and understand. Also makes me feel better what is going into my skin and cleansing it. If this product could sing it would sing that it can organically make my beautiful, not hurt the environment and make me feel good
It feels a little weird when it's dried on your face, but it's easy to rinse off and afterwards my skin felt amazing. It looked clearer and brighter. I will definitely be using this in my routine.
I tried a sample of this resurfacing mask and my face feels so soft, and feels luscious! Will definitely be purchasing this product!

I liked this way better than I thought I would. I noticed results right away. It quickly brightened my skin & cleared up a few breakouts. But it was very gentle and left my face soft. I got this as a sample, but I'm going to be sure to buy a full size before this runs out.

I never use masks but bought this because of the hype. I have acne prone skin so I'm always worried about trying something new. I did like this mask- a noticed a glow the next day. I didn't notice any stinging while the mask was on. Light scent, kind of an odd smell, but not a turn off.

Admittedly, I'm kind of a mask fiend. However, they're usually pretty lackluster in results. More of a mental yay I'm being nice to my skin feeling than an actual wow my skin actually looks amazing result. However, I've used this for a week now and I can already tell you it's going to get bought again when I run out.  I followed Tata's directions and wear it overnight. I've been doing that every night. Immediately after the first night I saw the results. Pores were noticeably and significantly smaller. Skin was slightly more clear. My skin also just looked... brighter, healthier.   FYI: My skin is combination. Blemishes and wrinkles, the works. I feel like this product helps with both! I would avoid this if you have dry skin or have a sensitive nose. I personally love the scent but it does smell like roses.   TL;DR: At least try this. I swear you'll notice a difference after the first application.

I have combination to oily skin with occasional pustules and pimples once a month, so I usually sleep with this mask on once a week and cleanse it off in the morning with the Regenerating Cleanser. I got this recommendation from a Sephora employee and it works wonderfully for clear, glowing skin. It has improved my oiliness of my skin a lot!
Love this, after using I can go makeup free the next day.  Only wish for the price that you got a bigger jar.

My face was feeling dull and rough due to the winter months so I looked through all my samples that I accumulated and found this gem. I followed the directions exactly and noticed a difference in my face immediatly. My face hasn't felt this smooth and firm in years. I haven't had a facial in years, but this product made my face feel like I treated myself at the spa.

If you want a glowing complexion, this is a great mask! It's a bit expensive but I do see results after one use. If you want to detoxify or remove blemishes, there are better masks. But this one is gentle and natural so I like it when I need a little glow.

One of the best masks I've ever used! My skin glows and is so soft after using this. It also has a gentle detoxing effect, and helps with hormonal breakouts. You can also use it as a spot treatment over night on occasional breakouts.  Love the all natural ingredients!  The jar is somewhat small, so you don't get a ton of uses out of it, and it's fairly pricy.

After reading several reviews I'd say my expectations were pretty bang on for this product - average. From my personal experience, I don't think this item's price tag is justified for the size of the pot.  Product consistency is very thin and gel-like, smell is strong in the pot but less evident once applied to your face, gradually wears off as the product dries as well.  Felt an initial tingling when I first applied it to my face but this sensation subsided fairly quickly and did not happen again throughout masking. Mask sets and dries pretty quickly, maybe I did not apply enough product but it's so thin and peachy in colour that after applying it doesn't actually look like anything is on your face. I let it sit for 12 minutes and decided that that was long enough for my first application (as it indicates 10 mins is sufficient for sensitive skin), thinking I might try 20 next time and see if that creates a more dramatic effect?  Outcome of first experience: pores appear to have reduced, somewhat. Face seems maybeee mildly more glowy but nothing to rave about.

I'm in love with this mask! I have oily/acne prone skin and use this mask about 2 times a week after I exfoliate/use a charcoal mask. It makes me skin look so glowy and healthy, I've received so many compliments on how radiant I look so it must be working ;)   *took one star off because the price sucks for how little product you get, but it does work amazingly.
I decided to splurge and it was worth it. Like the title of my review says, it soothes and smoothes. I have combo/oily acne prone skin - I used this after I exfoliate and/or use a de-clogging mask.

not sure what the hype is all about, it doesn't really do much for me. It's doesn't give me a glow or help with my hormonal breakouts. The smell is a bit strong, rosy scented, but not the kind that gives me a headache thankfully. The gel like consistency sort of dries/hardens on my skin after 15-20 mins where it becomes tight and I can't really move my skin which is something no one else ever mentioned in their reviews. It does feel good on my skin, cool and refreshing but that's about it.

I just used this product for the first time tonight, and I have to say, I am in love. It instantly made my skin look better, not sure how or why but I can say no other product has ever done so. It has a nice light smell and goes on with a very cooling and calming feeling. I know the price is quite high, but you get what you pay for. As I get closer to turning 30 I believe skincare is something to invest in. I'd recommend this to all my friends, regardless of age or skin type.

I love Tata Harper products and this mask is no exception. I love it when a product is no frills and does exactly what it claims. This is a wonderfully, gentle exfoliator that can be used by all skin types. I have oily yet sensitive skin and it does not irritate my skin or cause any breakouts. I also love that it is super effective without all of nasty chemicals other brands have.

This is a really great product. I am happy with the results everytime i use it. I bought a kit with the resurfacing mask in it and i had to get the bigger product. However that was in January 2016 and this item was $69 and it's February 2016 and this product is now $80, this is ridiculous. Yeah i probably wouldn't purchase this again because of the price...especially for how small the size is.

This was a sample in the Daily Essentials kit and I loved it so much I ordered the full size. I am skin care junkie with super sensitive skin and I try everything - but will stick with this from now on. It improved the look and feel of my mature skin after the first application - removes dullness, reduces pores and smells amazing. I use it 2x per week.

I got a sample of this a few years ago from RTR I never stopped thinking about it. I can't really put my finger on what it does exactly but it makes my skin look luminous. FYI: My skin is very finicky (break outs, redness, dryness) about product, I have not experienced anything like that with this. I'm happy I finally purchased it! I also picked up the cheek/lip tint and love it.

What's interesting is I bought this product to give my skin more of a glowing look but instead it shrunk my pores better than any other product I've tried. What I really enjoyed was that it has a nice scent and wasn't overly drying. So if you're looking for glowing skin, you might want to try something else but if you want your pores gone then this is the one!

I've tried many different types of peels and exfoliants and none compare to this one. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate it in the least. My skin looks flawless and is super smooth after I use it. It also helps prevent my skin from breaking out. The added bonus is it smells beautiful!

Definitely gives a glow! Your skin has great tone after just one use. I like that it's gentle as well. No stinging or burning which can be typical with enzyme masks or beta hydroxy peels. The jar is small so I use it very sparingly.

Well, this was not a pampering feeling for a cold dry winter day. My skin looked fine afterwards but l could hardly stand the dry effect wearing the mask, it was very uncomfortable. I have normal skin, with a little oil in the summer. This mask will feel great in that season! For winter when hydration is lacking, l enjoyed 2 other masks for resurfacing: Ren overnight facial and Korres rose 2 step mask.

I got a sample of this and fell in love. I immediately bought the full size jar. Makes skin glow, smaller pores and overall smoothness, I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate at all. Try it- you will love it.
This mask delivers all it promises to do. If you try it once you'll be hooked.

it cleans and refreshes the face and brightens it. removes dullness. smells great and feels very natural. i have used it a few times after cleansing and efoliation. after applying this, i apply my regular serum or moisturizer and can feel a difference in how those products absorb so well into my skin. i did not notice any peeling effect such as flaking or redness etc. i say if yr skin can tolerate it u can use it more often then the recommended frequency in the directions.
Got this as a sample and was amazed how nice it was! It smells amazingggg, feels amazing, and once I took it off, my skin was glowing!

If we are talking about reducing pores this product is the one you need to get .. The results you get using this product its amazing I also recommended using this with no reason to hide serum by philosophy the two together will be the best cocktail your face will get . The choice is yours

This product is amazing! I first received it as a sample from an online order and was instantly hooked! It's definitely more on the pricey side but worth every penny. I use it every night whether as a mask or spot treatment and nothing has ever made my skin look or feel more amazing. Seriously, do yourself a favor and try this product. I've been using it for a little over a month now and plan to keep it in my beauty regimen for as long as it is produced.
This product is absolutely amazing! It really cleared up my old acne scars and my skin is always glowing after I use it!

All I can say is wow. Peels and such make me nervous... I don't like things that are too hard on my face but Oh my goodness, this mask. I had a few blemishes and pimples when I used this mask as a sample, left on for 20 minutes and literally the next morning my skin was glowing and my pimples were gone!
When I use this 3 times a week it really helps to keep my breakouts at bay.
this is amazing,love this product

I love everything Tata. I'm a mask girl so I was super excited to try this mask. Big disappointment. It didn't give me any glow, I didn't feel any cleaner and it dried really tight which I hate. I think it's best for oily and blemish girls.

This product left my skin feeling so soft, noticeably brighter and removed all the dry dead skin patches from the dry winter weather. My only complaint is that I'd preferred a more sanitary pump packaging for the mask.

Use it at least once a week and it leaves my skin feeling smooth, blemish free and just hydrated. I love it and get complimented on my skin after using it.. i have really sensitive skin and is one of the only masks that doesn't irritate

I expected to love this after all the hype I had read about it. It didn't do anything for my skin, good or bad. Just kinda whatever, and pretty expensive for what a small package it is. I'm a big mask user and I wouldn't recommend this.

I was not expecting to like this mask as much as I did. Even Amore Pacific's Treatment Enzyme Peel stings more on initial contact. (I base my peel potency on the sting factor).  Oh, but wait. This is a slow burn, that creeps up as the product sits and dries a touch. I went over the 30 minutes, as I have medium olive skin that marks easily and lives for a nice peel.  When I washed my face, I was blown away. It delivered the results of a solid basic facial. My face was happy, glowy, and smooth. I've repeated a few times, and the results are the same. Great product.

reviews.review_title: Did you work? I hope so!
reviews.review_text: I received this as a product in store. I put it on my face, left it on (it felt like a peel off mask), and then washed it off. Unsure what results I achieved, but I would like to think good ones because I'm a huge fan about the values that Tata Harper stands for.

This is literally the best product I've ever bought. I got it first as a sample with an order and the day after I used it, I got compliments on how great my skin looked all day long. Of course I had to buy the full size!! Best money I've ever spent on my skin--it's smoother and brighter than ever.
I used this mask once or twice a week and it's amazing! Leaves my skin feeling very soft and bright.
I received this as a sample and was amazed the next day. I'm oily so it may not have the same effect on others. I will be buying a bottle.
my face felt so weird after putting this on. it dried my face.
I received a sample of this product and now wish I hadn't. It left my face dry and rough... My face has NEVER felt like it did after using this product.

I received a sample of this product with my latest online purchases and I must say, it rocks. I'm a huge fan of brightening/pore reducing masks and this does both. My skin is glowing & I would happily pay the $55 on the full sized product. (I plan on it)

I was searching through a box of samples I keep on my make up table the other day and noticed I had a sample of this mask. I gave it a try and was completely blown away by the results. After one use, my skin was brighter, several small blemishes had shrunk and even a patch of hyperpigmentation was lighter. I purchased the full size and have been so happy with it. Yes. it's quite pricey, but I think it's absolutely worth it.

I've owned this mask since the summer and I can't believe that I haven't reviewed it yet! It has become a once-a-week miracle for my complexion. (it's now half-way after four months)  It is phenomenal to prevent breakouts, however the smoothing and glowing results from this treatment are the most immediate difference you'll notice.  It a small jar, and it's completely worth it!

While definitely pricey, the Resurfacing Mask does an amazing job of reducing the appearance of pores, decongesting the skin and exfoliating any dullness. It is also incredibly gentle, and doesn't irritate at all. I am used to a burning sensation when using a product that works this well, so when I first used it I thought something was wrong and that it wouldn't give me the results I wanted. Very pleasantly surprised that it is so effective without any burning, redness, or itchy dry skin.

The resurfacing mask with the lovely fruity scent has a gel-like consistency and goes on smoothly. A little product goes a long way and a light application is better than globbing it on. You can feel a slight tingling sensation while it is on the skin but you will experience no irritations. Be certain to remove after recommended time if you have sensitive skin like me or it will cause a slight redness. After rinsing the mask off, my skin felt softer, smoother and glowing. The dead skin was gently wiped away. It's a fabulous facial treatment. Wish it was not that costly though...

It definitely gives a glow radiant skin and works excellent as a spot treatment. The acids are a great way to make your skin 'behave' if you will. I use it once a week, usually weekends when I'm treating my skin. I leave it on for the recommended 30 minutes, and it's perfect for my normal skin.  The only thing that I dislike about this is that it dries out like the masks from the 90s making it very stiff and uncomfortable. However I don't mind it. I take it as a spiritual exercise, where I stay quiet and focus on my thoughts ( I know I know, but it helps)

I got this as part of the Glow on Demand set. The first time I used it as instructed on the box: first apply the Regenerating Cleanser, then the Resurfacing Mask on top of it, then leave for ten minutes. I couldn't see any difference in my face. The next time I used it I followed the directions under the full size product on the website: apply to clean skin, leave for 20-30 minutes. This time, the mask made a world of difference. It did irritate and burn my skin and turn it red (only the second time), but the results were amazing. (Note: I do not have sensitive skin.)  I always have these dry, flakey, textured, porous patches on the sides of my nose. I could never seem to get rid of them no matter how much I tried with granular exfoliants and enzyme powders. However, this mask completely eliminated those rough patches, and it is the only thing I've found thus far that does. When I was applying concealer around my nose afterward, it went on soo smoothly and looked flawless. Putting foundation on was like painting a ceramic figurine, my skin was so refined. It's like the mask really eats away the tiniest of dead skin particles and refines every pore.  If you don't have super sensitive skin and can withstand this mask for 20 minutes, it is definitely worth it.

I've used this for about a year now, both for instant glow and blemish spot treatment. On days when my skin is just not cooperating, or I've been lazy with my skincare routine, I sleep in this and wake up with a whole new palette. I really love this mask.
Saw instant results after just one use. The next day really transformed my breakout into barley there without even having to use a second time. Great product. Highly recommend!
Nothing special. I don't like the smell and it didn't do anything for me. Felt really tight on my face and it left my face a little rough.
I love this mask! Great for 30 mins for glowing skin AND as an overnight spot treatment for blemishes! Doesn't irritate my skin. It is a must have! My skin always looks better after using this!

I got a sample of this last time I went shopping. I happened to get a pretty bad breakout soon after, and I had a big event in few days. I used this product and I expected it to be a little harsh with all of the dead cell removing, resurfacing propreties. I thought wrong! It felt really cooling and amazing, and I can't wait to get a full sized one! My skin was super soft and luminous afterwards, although it didn't really help with the breakout, but I didn't expect it to :)
My favorite mask! I use it often. I leaves skin bright and glowy and so so soft. You can feel it tightening while you're using it!

This is my new favourite! This mask works so well on my sensitive combination skin. I use it twice a week as a mask. And on days I have break outs I use it as spot treatment. It has the most beautiful smell and feel totally luxurious, AND it doesnt irritate my skin! I love this mask!

In love with this product! It does not irritate my very sensitive skin but leaves it beyond soft and glowy! It smells absolutely gorgeous (although I may not recommend if you're sensitive to scents...) I've also used it as a sleep mask as the sephora associate recommended to me which can irritate my skin a little bit. Also a fabulous spot treatment left on overnight for any blemishes!

As a pre-information: I have normal skin, I use makeup almost everyday, I am a LUSH addict but always have some redness kicking around my cheeks, chin, and nose.  I received a sample of this Tuesday night, well last night (Thursday) I decided to try it out. I did not read about it prior to using it, I did not want a bias. I have never even heard of Tata Harper until I put this on my face. This morning I woke up and for the first time in a long time my skin was basically evenly toned all over, NO RED. INSANE. I usually always carry red on my cheeks..so to not have even the faintest amount WOW. My skin also looked rejuvenated and had a beautiful glow. I have basically been ranting and raving about this product all day to anyone who will listen. I cannot go wait to buy the full size..I am also tempted to try the rest of the line, it seems like a really stand up company with amazing ingredients!  If you haven't tried this..DO IT, yesterday.

This is one of those expensive products that is actually worth the money! The jar looks tiny, but you really don't use very much product. It has a jelly like consistency and you just apply a thin layer which then dries on the face. There interesting thing is that I have extremely dry skin but this mask doesn't make me more dry, but isn't necessary hydrating. I would say the best thing about this mask is how bright and even it makes the skin look! I notice a difference every time I use it so I know it is definitely because of the mask. I'm sensitive and very acne prone and this mask does not irritate. It is definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_title: Saw a difference after the first use!
reviews.review_text: I rarely ever feel products live up to the hype but this one does. I have been using this 1-2 times per week, putting on a thick layer and sitting with it for 10 minutes and my face definitely has a glow and looks smoother after. I haven't used too many masks before but am now a convert.

Holy grail mask! I love this mask so much! It gently exfoliates my acne-prone, combination skin making it super soft and glowing. You also need a super small amount and I've easily used it 10 times and I'm not even halfway through. I also use this on breakouts overnight as a spit treatment. It dries out the pimple without creating a nasty dry patch of flaking skin like a lot of spot treatments do. I seriously will never use another acid mask ever again! So worth every penny!

i love the smell, the glow is great. i have tried more powerful masks but they were not all natural. its a good product and i will keep re purchasing . i bought may be 5 in total but it lasts me 3-4 weeks and so it is very expensive. i will purchase again as i love the smell and the fact its all natural. i believe it does some good for my skin and i always have it when travel.
But thus far loving the glow that this product delivers to my very tired, overworked skin. Have only sampled Tata Harper in the past, and plan to add more of these products to my repertoire.

reviews.review_title: The one Tata Harper product to use
reviews.review_text: If you're only going to buy/use one Tata Harper product because the line is so expensive, I think this is *the* product to get.

This is the product you want to use after you have pulled an all nighter studying, been in the sun all day, or like me-spend your weekends being a horse barn-bum. I use this before any big event because it really wakes your skin up and gives your face an amazing glow. I love this all natural line. I'm a Vermonter so I can appreciate the local grown aspect. I love the smell. The texture is very light and gel like. Does not burn my face but noticeably tightens. This will always be my go-to feel better mask!
This is one of the best mask I have ever tried. It leaves my skin so soft, supple and moisturized. The best thing is that the makeup applies so beautifully. I would definitely repurchase this mask.

If my skin is flaky or dull I use this mask. It's all natural but it does have some zing to it. I leave it on for the suggested 30 minutes - usually use it about 2x a week. It's good. Not life changing. I'm don't know if I'll re-purchase or keep trying other masks.

I was in the market for a new mask type treatment as my skin was looking a little dull. I had read mixed reviews of this product and I'm so glad I got it - it's amazing!!!  It might not be as good if you use it all the time but the night before a big meeting, event, etc. it makes my skin look so bright and clear. I usually wear at least concealer but after using this mask I often skip face makeup.  Definitely try this one.

I have always had trouble with blackheads, but this mask has completely helped rid my T-zone of any. I can see an immediate difference right after using this product. I generally use this product at night, and the next morning my skin looks glowing, plump and youthful. I cannot rate this product enough. I love it. In addition, although 1 oz seems like a small amount, I have used this product once a week for 3 months now and have a little less than half of the jar left.
I feel this product is over priced based on results. Noticed no difference after using. Skin felt dehydrated after using.
Best!!@ gave me satin skin!!! Not one bump or blackheads.

After only one use, my skin was instantly renewed! I had a whitehead near my eye that wouldn't come to the surface and that I couldn't lance. 24 hours after using this mask, the salicylic acid cleaned out my pores and this whitehead was gone! The rest of my skin? Smooth and glowing!

I like the concept of the Tata Harper line, but some of the products I've tried, including this Resurfacing Mask, are somewhat irritating (perhaps due to the essential oils?). I didn't notice any benefits from using this mask. In fact, the only thing I noticed was it left my face a bit red and I don't have particularly sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: If you want a glow, try this!
reviews.review_text: This resurfacing mask is just the thing if you want a glow. It is not a scrub but upon removal, your skin just looks rosy and healthy.

I'm not really sure what this mask does for my face. I've used it many times and while it smells good and feels good on the skin, I honesty don't see a difference in my skin after using it. Overall, it is just an ok mask.

Smells great, nice texture, skin responds looking brighter tighter. Every time I use it I am flooded by an incomplete memory of a $5 drugstore product the same colour, texture, result, and smell, just cannot remember the name. It is hard to justify the large price it isn't that good and knowing it does or has had a much cheaper version bothers me.

I am a big fan of this mask; I use it about 2-3 times a week, and it took no time at all to acclimate my skin to it. My skin is somewhat sensitive, and will usually be a bit delicate or even red following a new mask, but this wasn't the case here at all. It's a pink-tinged jellylike texture that feels a bit like smoothing grape jelly over one's face. I leave it on for about 25-30 minutes, it dries transparent and only mildly tightens as it dries (not uncomfortable at all; if you make to effort to talk a little bit around the 5-10 min mark, you won't feel like you're breaking the seal when/if you suddenly get chatty 20 minutes in). I then wash it off with warm water and some mild massaging (this takes a few moments actually, to remove it fully from the face and neck). After patting dry, my skin feels very fresh, definitely like it's been exfoliated but not at all sensitive or raw from the experience (even following it with an exfoliating toner or serum doesn't feel like overkill). I'd almost even describe it as matte looking/feeling, but you still definitely get a little glow going on afterwards. I realize that saying something gives you a matte glow seems totally contradictory, but just trust me and go with it. I'd definitely recommend it to almost anyone, people both new and experienced with chemical exfoliation. It's gentle but very effective. I'm slowly falling in love with Tata Harper's entire line, the products I've tried so far are super solid, but this is definitely their star product.

I got this mask as a sample and tried it out, I was so happy with the results. I felt like I was glowing after using this product. The 1 oz jar is a little pricey but I could not, not get it! I love it and can't wait to get it in the mail!!
I love face masks and this is a new favorite! the gel texture feels so great going on and the smell is light and fresh. The results reminded me of a peel.

One night I stayed up extremely late to write a paper for Psychology. That was the night I decided to use my sample of this face mask. Figuring I'd look like heII the next day and I could use all the help I could get I decided this would be a good time to put the mask to the test. Even though I only got 20 minutes of sleep and cried throughout the paper which is a long story I awoke with beautiful glowing skin! I will admit it wasn't fair circumstances to test the product under and when I tested it I had no intention of purchasing it, but it worked so well I did. This is an amazing product and I hope to always have it on hand! Especially when pulling all nighters.
I love the way this mask makes my face feel soft and moisturized. I only leave on for about 20 minutes.

I just used a sample of this and based on first impression I really like it. I left it on for 25 minutes. I would recommend not being around people because it freezes your face but it does dry clear. My face felt so refreshed and not irritated at all. Sometimes deep cleaners or masks can burn or make your skin red but not this. I think I'll be purchasing full size.

I tried a sample of this product last night and was blown away. I've tried a few different masks and this is my favorite thus far. In the directions in advices those with sensitive skin to only leave it on for 10 minutes. I threw caution to the wind and left it on for the full 30 and experienced no discomfort or irritation during or after. I love that it's essentially invisible once applied, so it would be ideal for the airplane followed by a moisturizing mask (I like GLAMGLOW THIRSTYMUD, also clear). I'm currently battling hormonal acne, which means a lot of bumps either new or old that I'm trying to heel. After one application I have noticed a decrease in size of these bumps- PRAISE! So I absolutely intend on purchasing the full-size and would recommend it to others who want to help shed the old and bring on their new, healthy skin!

This mask saved my congested and breakout-prone skin. I'm very oily so this mask wasn't drying to me. I actually applied a layer over my clean skin and let it dry then topped it with the Tata moisture mask. When I woke up my skin was smooth and radiant. Love it!

I received as a sample & won't be purchasing. I have sensitive & acne-prone skin. While it caused no irritations, it sapped my skin of all moisture, making it dry & look awfully dehydrated. Roth laser free resurfacing scrub is a staple for me & I'd give it infinity stars if it was an option because it leaves my skin smoother, brighter with a healthy-looking complexion--without the dehydration.

reviews.review_title: excellent natural mask for smooth skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and this does not sting or cause breakouts. I am trying to use more natural products though it's hard due to all the strong oils most products use. This one is a winner as it is natural but non irritating and does work.  This makes my skin feel very smooth, no redness and you can leave it on from 10-30 plus minutes with no bad effects! There is a nice glow and my pores do look a bit smaller. The mask is pricey but worth it for gentle chemical exfoliation without unpronounceable ingredients.

I honestly can't fathom why the overall rating for this product isn't 5 stars. If you read my reviews, you'll know I excitedly moved to Los Angeles several months ago only to have my hair and skin try to ruin my life. I was getting twice a week facials, stopped wearing makeup for a bit, but nothing really got rid of the bumpy texture and erratic dryness/ breakouts. Enter this knight in shining armor. First use, skin is calmer, more clear, bumps reduced, pores smaller. By week 2 (using 3x/ week), the bumps were almost totally gone. 1 month in and I'm back to people stopping me on the street to ask what products I use. I *glow*. No pores, no bumps, no melting makeup, no red or dry spots, no weird afternoon oil slick. I feel like the amount of product and benefit you get for the price makes this mask the best bang for your buck in Tata's line. I have no idea what the directions say (I'm far too impatient and arrogant to read those things), so here's what I do: after exercise/ work out I wipe down the the hydrating essence, slather on a generous layer, step into the shower and do my hair/ body thing with the mask on for about 10 mins. Rinse. Cleanse. Done. You're welcome! Just kidding, but I swear by this stuff, and it's become as much a part of my life as a proper deodorant and toothpaste.

I didn't notice a glow & it made my skin a little flaky (that doesn't go away even with using a scrub exfoliator until a few days later). My pores did appear a little smaller but it didn't really make an overall noticeable difference.

I bought this last year about six months before my wedding and used it regularly, about once a week. Since then, I've purchased a second jar and still love it. The smell is flowery but not fake, and the texture of the gel is great- it's lightweight and totally unnoticable. I definitely notice smoother and firmer skin after applying the mask for about twenty minutes. It doesn't last that long, but it does work and I have hopes it's giving me some sort of long term benefits. I usually apply it on Monday mornings (I work from home) to repair skin after a weekend of drinking and staying out late. I've even applied this mask on a flight returning from my honeymoon in Thailand, so I wouldn't look exhausted when I returned! It's a little pricey, yes, but a whole jar lasted me about 9 months, using once a week- I'd say it's worth when you consider cost per use. Recommended.
Although it's expensive, it makes my skin glow and helps rid my face of blemishes. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

I first learned of Tata Harper from Spirit Beauty Lounge. I like Tata's line. All of her products smell pretty wonderful and work very subtly and gently and are clean. This mask is great before a night out or a special occasion. It really will make your skin beautiful prior to any make up application. It really minimizes any pores and smooths the skin. I'm giving it only 4 stars only because of the price. I am willing to pay for wonderful clean products, but compared to others in the market I feel this $15-20 over its worth.

I had two samples to try. While I didn't notice any skin brightening, my dry skin patches were gone after I washed the mask off. Per the directions, I had the mask on for 30 minutes. No skin irritation or tingling sensation. It washed cleanly off. I didn't experience any skin tightening afterwards. Not a bad product.

Really nice mask. Comfortable, didn't tingle, easy to use. Only thing: Smells a bit like bug spray when you're putting it on, but as it dries, the smell goes away. Don't let the smell put you off, though. It's not that strong.

The sample packet I got was the perfect amount for a full face and neck application. This mask is a lightweight green scented gel that feels slightly tight on your skin after drying but results in a clear bright complexion, with smaller appearing pores and no oil or dryness. with no regard to price, the best mask I've ever tried even compared to origin and Sephora brands
This mask gives you a nice glow for a couple of days after using it. It has a tingly feel but doesn't leave your face red after use.
Got this mask as a sample and bought a whole jar . Gives instant glow
Seems to work fairly well, but scent was very strong and unpleasant.

I was a little iffy about buying this at first because of how expensive it is. But it may just be the best face mask I ever tried. The great reviews speak for themselves. When I read for instant glow at first, I thought yeah right, but those words really do deserve to be written on the package.  After using this mask, your face feels very clean, smooth, clear, and super fresh. A little but also goes a very very long way. I've used it a couple times and every time I open the container, it still looks like I've never used it. It's also very comfortable to wear, you don't even feel like you're wearing a mask (no stinging, or drying feeling, or even feeling like u have goop on your face)

This is a great and effective product; you can really feel it getting to work on your skin the second you apply it. The reason I gave this mask 3 stars however, is mostly because of the price. For the amount of product you get, this seems quite expensive to me, even compared to pricier brands. I only get a handful of uses out of one jar- maybe enough for 5 or 6 applications.  The consistency is very different from most masks I've used in the past. It is goopy and gel-like. You can feel the gel hardening and drying on your face, which eliminates pores and tightens skin big time! I leave this on for about 30 minutes and my face feels fresh and revitalized afterwards.  I would recommend this for use in summer rather than winter, because, if you're like me, your skin tends to be a little more sensitive/dry in the winter. On sensitive skin, this mask can feel a little harsh. A mild burning discomfort. It can leave my face quite red and irritated after rinsing it off.

After hearing about Tata Harper and discovering that there was no place close by to request samples, I actually called the number on the website. I was told that for a $5 shipping fee I could request some samples (I requested 4 and they sent me 6!). The customer service was OUTSTANDING! One of my samples broke while in transit bc of the below zero temps so I called to request another and they promptly overnighted a very, very generous sample size! This mask is super lightweight and translucent. I expected it to be drying on my sensitive fair skin but it was very gentle and left my skin soft and with a brightness that I didn't have 30 mins before. My husband even noticed! Based upon my experience with the products and the fantastic customer service, I will without a doubt be purchasing from TaTa Harper in the future!!

reviews.review_title: New staple in my beauty drawer!
reviews.review_text: Got the sample, tried it out after cleansing my skin and was really impressed. This is one of those masks that really delivers on the glow factor. It's not going to deep-clean your skin if that's what you're hoping for. This is perfect for pre-date or special event nights, when you want your skin to really shine and don't want to cake on a bunch of makeup to do that. I'll be buying the full size asap.

reviews.review_title: Deceivingly moisturizing. A+ for being natural.
reviews.review_text: I dig the natural aspect as an eco friendly gal. I received the free sample and was assuming that as an exfoliant it would leave my sensitive skin really dry, but my face is actually really soft! I did not compare a before and after as far as a glow, and it might be a product that you use regularly to get a full effect, but as a first try it feels like a boost in moisture instead of an exfoliant. I'd be interested in trying it for a longer time.

I really like this stuff, but I don't think its worth the price. I had a $20 discount from sephora, which put it in the more reasonable $30 range, and that is probably the most I would be willing to pay for it. I like it, it does give me a glow, but its not a miracle product and its a pretty small jar.  However, I think it will probably last a while, I don't need very much. I think it smells nice, not artificial at all. Also, I think more consistent, continued use would show the best results. (As with all beauty products, ha!)  Its one of the only product lines sephora sells that has completely natural, food grade ingredients, and it is a very good brand with products that actually work, they're just on the pricey side.

reviews.review_title: Expected more and did not deliver
reviews.review_text: I got a sample on my last order and I was excited to try it. I read that it gives you an instant glow and makes skin radiant. I used as per the instructions and 30 minutes later I washed off with warm water. I was so disappointed, there was no glow or radiance. I will go back to using Glam Glow, at least you get the instant results as they say. Will not try or buy this product

the mask felt pretty oily, the whole time I was waiting to feel something work, but nothing. when I washed it off I didn't notice a big difference. I'm glad I just got the sampler, I would've hate to purchase this.
I recieved two samples by accident and used both of them. After those uses, the acne scars I had on my cheeks faded significantly! I would definitely buy this.

I was really excited to try this product, but for some reason it didn't do anything to my skin. I observed my face before and after and honestly I could tell the difference at all. It felt relaxing having the product on my face... but that is it.
So, I got the sample packet...and I'm sure glad I did. It really did make my skin glow and look so healthy! My skin was soft for a few days following. I liked it so much I ordered the fill size.

reviews.review_title: Tightened, brightened and made me feel great!
reviews.review_text: I actually did a full review of this on my blog, brennabombshell.wordpress.com. Check it out! But if you only have a second and really want to know, then Ill give you a quick rundown.  I'm 25. I have very fair skin with yellow undertones. I have combination skin. My t-zone is pretty oily, but I'm not acne-prone. I usually have one random pimple every few months, but occasionally suffer from breakouts. I have blackheads on my nose. I have redness on and around my nose.  This mask goes a long way. It feels good when you put it on. It smells nice. The smell goes away when you wash it off. It tightens your skin. It brightened my skin. It reduced redness on and around my nose. It kept my face shine-free for about three days, so I'd recommend it as a twice a week mask for 30 minutes, depending on how sensitive your skin is.

There was nothing bad about this mask, I just didn't feel the results were anything special. The texture is a light gel, the smell isn't overpowering, but I didn't like the way it felt on. The instructions say to leave it on for 20-30 min but I don't have that kind of time!
Got a sample of this and really liked it. My skin was very smooth and soft after using.

I really like this product, it does all that it says it does, after using it I noticed an instant glow without breakouts. I would like to use more often than the recommended weekly usage. Only negative is not very much product in the tiny bottle so use very sparingly

I love this mask and have used it many times. I find it is quite gentle and unlike some other resurfacing masks I don't feel like it's burning off a layer of skin but rather it gently gets the job done. Your skin feels fresh, bright, and renewed after having used it. However, if you like or need masks that give you that burning/tingling feeling (for example, GlamGlow) then you may not like this one. As far as I'm concerned, if it works I would much rather go without the burning sensation and abrasiveness of other masks. Also, the Tata Harper line is the only one on Sephora with truly green/natural/clean ingredients if that is something you're at all interested in.

One of the best masks I have ever used. I have super sensitive skin and a lot of masks leave me dry and itchy afterwards, but that is not the case here. My skin feels silky smooth and bright immediately.

reviews.review_title: Love this for brightening and smoothing
reviews.review_text: I have trouble with clogged pores, rough skin texture, rosacea and early signs of aging. This mask is non-drying, brightening (that lasts beyond the first day) and helps to refine texture quickly. I won't stop using this - non-toxic and effective!

I cant say enough about this product. I did some research on the brand. Everything they use in their product is all natural and organic. My face doesn't feel tight or sting afterwards. Some don't like the fragrance but I love it. it is very natural and smells relaxing, like flowers. I used to have HUGE pores on my nose and this product helped out so much. Not only does it draw out dirt, makeup, and oil from your pores, it leaves your face hydrated and glowing. People have been commenting on how radiant I look. It's all because of this product!

I don't like this at all. No result, I don't see any difference in my skin other than making my skin feel dry. Also the scent is pretty NASTY. I can't describe it, but it's like a rotten vegetable kind of smell.

reviews.review_title: Best mask I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: This face mask is magic! I have used it as a quick mask and also as a spot treatment where I let it sit on a pimple overnight, both ways the mask has been incredible in exfoliating my skin without irritation. I used to have moderate/severe acne and am currently on acne medicines that leave my skin dry and red in some places, while other spots are oily and covered in clogged pores and pimples. This mask exfoliates my skin, making it easier for me to reach any acne for farther cleaning. My skin is baby soft for at least three to four days after I use the mask and looks incredible!  I often use the mask once a week, twice if it is a bad week. I have been using less and less of the mask each time, careful to apply only to my t-zone in hopes the jar will las longer.

I have oily skin with frequent clogged pores on my nose and chin, after using this I always notice a decrease in my clogged pores and the pore size. My only complaint is I only get about 6 masks out of the jar and that seems expensive to me, but to unclog pores the price is worth it.

I don't know about resurfacing in the true sense of the word, but this mask definitely leaves skin glowing and with an instant tightening effect.  I liked that it had natural ingredients and seemed gentle (though some people react to natural ingredients, too.) I felt like it was comfortable on my skin, though it does have witch hazel in it which made my eyes feel a bit watery for a minute or two.  It definitely temporarily tightens the skin (probably again due to the witch hazel) but nothing is going to actually shrink pores. It may temporarily make them appear smaller, which is as good as it gets. But in terms of realism in cosmetic treatments, that's important to note. That said, it does a good job at temporarily tightening the surface of the skin and making it look even and radiant.  Sometimes with masks, I can get a bit red or pink after, but this one just left my skin very glowing and moisturized.  Bottom line: I'd definitely recommend this, despite the somewhat prohibitive cost. If you're realistic about the short term effects vs anything permanent or long lasting, then I think you'll likely benefit and enjoy using it.

I've liked most of the Tata Harper products that I've tried and this one is my current favorite product. Ever. Not just out of what I've tried from the line but out of every product I've ever tried. It does exactly what it says: my complexion really looks refreshed (even when I'm beyond tired) and positively glows after using this mask. It's an exfoliant and treatment mask in one so no need for that extra step of a physical or enzymatic scrub before applying the Resurfacing Mask. I just do a once over with my cleanser to wash my makeup, sunscreen, etc. off my face, pat dry and then apply this directly. Easy and fuss free. It has the faintest of calming scents, slightly green and sweet (honeysuckle?) but the scent is so mild it wouldn't offend anyone sensitive to smell (like me). The consistency is, as one reviewer called it, a bit 'soapy' like a watery gelatin so it is easy to apply too much. You really only need a light coating across the face. Inevitably, you'll reach in and pull out globs so keep in mind that you'll most likely need less than you anticipate. Rather than filling my palm, I spread it on my face bit by bit so none of this precious mask goes to waste. It's excellent value too. The jar may look small but you only need a little each time. It's a very pretty pink color, like a gemstone, but fear not, your face will not look pink either during or after. The gelatinous texture has the added benefit of defusing the color as it's thinned out and spread across the face. It tightens on the skin as it dries but never stings, itches or is in any way uncomfortable. It washes off easily with a bit of water and cleanser and the result is instant luminosity. My skin literally glows after I use this mask, which I love. It also makes the texture of my skin noticeably smoother to the touch and any product that I use after seems to have a more pronounced effect. TIP: Because this is so effective at removing any material clogging the skin's surface, it's the perfect product to use once or twice a week before applying a serum that promises action packed results. I save my most complex (and delicate) serums for nights that I pre-treat with this mask. Just be careful not to use anything that might irritate your skin after the Resurfacing Mask (like AHAs or retinol) if you are sensitive. I love that the ingredients of this product are all natural and I don't need to worry about what any chemical nasties may do to my body over time. I also love that Tata Harper has thoughtfully packaged this in glass that is both environmentally friendly (reuse or recycle it!) and sturdy enough to withstand traveling and the occasional tumble from counter to bathroom floor. This is a wonderful product, a winner all around, and I couldn't recommend it highly enough!
I bought this product based on the raving reviews it received. I saw absolutely no difference in my skin after using it.
don't let the name fool you; this is a gentle mask that does a great job of exfoliating.

reviews.review_title: Best Mask and Spot Treatment Ever
reviews.review_text: I'm really glad this line has been getting better known. I have used every product from the line, and they are all amazing. There's not one product that does nothing. This mask makes your face glow. It's not irritating, last FOREVER (however, keep in mind that it is preservative free), and is so effective. Gets rid of acne spots in a night or two when dabbed on as a spot treatment. I can't live without this.

This mask goes on kinda soapy, but doesn't make yr skin feel tight or burn. The results are instant. I have or have tried every mask I could get my hands on. I bought it on a whim as a moms day present to myself, expensive, yes, but worth every penny! Plus all natural. If yr looking to spoil yrself go for it! So giddy sephora is caring this brand
